spec_nodes:
Your attacks have a chance to apply Sentinel on the target, stacking up to 10 times.

While Sentinel stacks are higher than 3, applying Sentinel has a chance to trigger an implosion, causing a stack to be consumed on the target every sec to deal 415 Arcane damage.

Give the command to kill, causing your pet to savagely deal 0 Physical damage to the enemy.

Kill Command has a 10% chance to immediately reset its cooldown.

Generates 15 Focus.
Each time Sentinel deals damage to an enemy you gain an absorb shield equal to 1.0% of your maximum health, up to 10%.
When you apply Sentinel to a target not affected by Sentinel, you apply 1 additional stack.
Raptor Strike, Mongoose Bite and Wildfire Bomb deal 10% increased damage.

Hurl a bomb at the target, exploding for 343 Fire damage in a cone and coating enemies in wildfire, scorching them for 668 Fire damage over 6 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Deals 80% increased damage to your primary target.
A vicious slash dealing 1,529 Physical damage.
When you apply Sentinel on a target, you have a 15% chance to apply a second stack.

When a target affected by Sentinel deals damage to you, they are rooted for 3 sec.

May only occur every 1 min per target.
When Sentinel starts dealing damage, the target is snared by 40% for 3 sec.

Each time Sentinel deals damage to an enemy it has an up to 15% chance to generate 5 Focus.

Chances decrease with each additional Sentinel currently imploding applied to enemies.
Wildfire Bomb now has 2 charges, and the initial explosion deals 50% increased damage.
Kill Command increases the direct damage of your other spells by 15%, stacking up to 3 times.
Whenever a Sentinel deals damage, the cooldown of Coordinated Assault is reduced by 1 sec, up to 15 sec.
For 8 sec after activating Coordinated Assault, all abilities are guaranteed to apply Sentinel.
Multi-Shot and Butchery discharge arcane energy from all targets affected by your Sentinel, dealing 477 Arcane damage to up to 5 targets within 8 yds of your Sentinel targets.

All Sentinel debuffs implode when a target affected by more than 3 stacks of your Sentinel falls below 20% health.

This effect can only occur once every 15 sec per target.
Targets you damage below 20% health gain a stack of Sentinel every 3 sec.
Auto-attacks with a two-handed weapon reduce the cooldown of Wildfire Bombs by 1.0 sec.
When you cast Kill Command, you have a 30% chance to fire an Arcane Shot at your target at 100% of normal value.

A brutal attack that deals 1,474 Physical damage and grants you Mongoose Fury.

Mongoose Fury
Increases the damage of Mongoose Bite by 15% for 16 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

Kill Command has an additional 10% chance to immediately reset its cooldown.

Tip of the Spear's damage bonus is increased up to 30%, based on your critical strike chance.

Every 30 sec your next Wildfire Bomb launches a celestial arrow that conjures a 12 yd radius Lunar Storm at the target's location dealing 531 Arcane damage.
 
For the next 12 sec, a random enemy affected by Sentinel within your Lunar Storm gets struck for 497 Arcane damage every 0.4 sec. Any target struck by this effect takes 10% increased damage from you and your pet for 8 sec.

Mongoose Bite and Raptor Strike have a 10% chance to reset Kill Command's cooldown.

Kill Command reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 0.5 sec.

Quick Shot and auto-attacks with a two-handed weapon increase the direct damage of your next Wildfire Bomb by 4%, stacking up to 3 times.

Casting Coordinated Assault grants 3 stacks of Wildfire Arsenal.
Every 3 Quick Shots is replaced with an Explosive Shot at 100% effectiveness.
Attack all nearby enemies in a flurry of strikes, inflicting 1,468 Physical damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

You and your pet leap to the target and strike it as one, dealing a total of 1,955 Physical damage.

Tip of the Spear grants an additional 15% damage bonus to Flanking Strike and Flanking Strike generates 2 stacks of Tip of the Spear.

Each stack of Mongoose Fury increases the chance for Kill Command to reset by 2%.

Kill Command extends the duration of Mongoose Fury by 1.5 sec.
Kill Command now has 2 charges, and deals 15% increased damage.
Kill Shot, Serpent Sting, Arcane Shot, Steady Shot, and Explosive Shot deal 20% increased damage.

While in combat, every 30 sec your next Kill Command summons the aid of a Beast.

 Wyvern
A Wyvern descends from the skies, letting out a battle cry that increases the damage of you and your pets by 10% for 15 sec.

 Boar
A Boar charges through your target 3 times, dealing 2,124 physical damage to the primary target and 849 damage to up to 8 nearby enemies.

 Bear
A Bear leaps into the fray, rending the flesh of your enemies, dealing 3,520 damage over 10 sec to up to 8 nearby enemies.

Wildfire Bomb deals 5% increased damage and has a 25% chance to reset the cooldown of Explosive Shot.

Explosive Shot reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 2 sec.
Kill Shot increases the damage enemies receive from you and your pet's Bleed effects by 25% for 6 sec.

Flanking Strike damage increased by 40% and Flanking Strike now increases your attack speed by 25% for 12 sec.

Butchery reduces the remaining cooldown on Wildfire Bomb by 3.0 sec for each target hit, up to 5 targets.

Enemies damaged by Flanking Strike bleed for an additional 2,816 damage over 8 sec.

Up to 5 enemies damaged by Butchery bleed for an additional 1,408 damage over 8 sec.

Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite damage increased by 15%.

Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite apply Serpent Sting to your target.

Serpent Sting
Fire a poison-tipped arrow at an enemy, dealing 143 Nature damage instantly and an additional 736 damage over 12 sec.

Kill Command causes the target to bleed for 235 damage over 8 sec.

You and your pet gain 10% attack speed for every bleeding enemy within 12 yds.

Howl of the Pack Leader increases the damage of your Kill Command by 50%.

Summoning a Beast reduces the cooldown of Barbed Shot by 10.0 sec.

Kill Command reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 1.0 sec.

Cobra Shot reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 1.0 sec.

Howl of the Pack Leader's cooldown is reduced to 25 sec.

Your pets gain an extra 5% of your attack power.
Harpoon has a 10 sec reduced cooldown, and deals 268 Physical damage and generates 20 Focus over 10 sec. Killing an enemy resets the cooldown of Harpoon.

Your chance to gain Deathblow is increased by 5% and the duration of Cull the Herd is increased by 2.0 sec.

Cull the Herd now additionally increases the damage taken from your Kill Shot by 25%.
Damage of Flanking Strike and Butchery increased by 5% and all damage dealt by Wildfire Bomb increased by 5%.

Kill Command's chance to grant Deathblow is increased by 5% and Deathblow now makes Kill Shot strike up to 2 additional targets.

Your chance to gain Deathblow is doubled during Coordinated Assault.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Your next Kill Shot can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.
Reapplying Serpent Sting to a target also spreads it to up to 4 enemies within 8 yds.
Each damage over time effect on a target increases the critical strike damage they receive from you by 2%.
Your Bear's periodic damage has a 10% chance to reduce the cooldown of Kill Command by 1.0 sec.
Initial damage from your Bear will consume Serpent Sting from up to 8 nearby targets, dealing 100% of its remaining damage instantly.

Your pet's attacks increase your Wyvern's damage bonus by 1%, up to 10%.

Casting Kill Command extends the duration of your Wyvern by 1.0 sec, up to 10 additional sec.
Each time your Boar deals damage, the damage of your next Cobra Shot is increased by 25% and Cobra Shot strikes 1 additional target. Stacks up to 4 times.
Wildfire Bomb and Explosive Shot damage increased by 2.5%.
Raptor Strike, Mongoose Bite, and Butchery damage increased by 5%.

Damage from your Kill Shot sends your pets into a rage, causing all active pets within 20 yds and your Bear to pounce to the target and Smack, Claw, or Bite it.

Your pets will not leap if their target is already in melee range.

When dropping below 60% health, summon the aid of a Turtle, reducing the damage you take by 10% for 6 sec.

This effect can only occur once every 1.5 min.
When Disengage removes a movement impairing effect, its cooldown is reduced by 4 sec.
When an enemy is stunned by Binding Shot, it is dragged to Binding Shot's center.

Furiously strikes all enemies in front of you, dealing 9,080 Physical damage over 2.7 sec. Critical strike chance increased by 50% against any target below 20% health. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You and your pet charge your enemy, striking them for a combined 1,707 Physical damage. You and your pet's bond is then strengthened for 20 sec, causing you and your pet to deal 20% increased damage.

While Coordinated Assault is active, Kill Command's chance to reset its cooldown is increased by 15%.
You give the signal, and your pet charges your target, bleeding them for 1,760 damage over 10 sec and increasing you and your pet's chance to critically strike your target by 30% for 10 sec.
Casting Bestial Wrath grants Howl of the Pack Leader and increases the damage dealt by your Beasts by 25% and your pets by 15% for 12 sec.

Fury of the Eagle's damage is increased by 10% and has a 20% chance to generate a stack of Tip of the Spear.

When Fury of the Eagle ends, your Haste is increased by 8%.
The cooldown of Coordinated Assault is reduced by 60 sec and Coordinated Assault now grants 3 stacks of Tip of the Spear.

Coordinated Assault sends you and your pet into a state of primal power. For the duration of Coordinated Assault, Kill Command generates 2 additional stack of Tip of the Spear, you gain 10% Haste, and Tip of the Spear's damage bonus is increased by 50%.

When you cast Coordinated Assault, you gain 1 charge of Wildfire Bomb. 

When Coordinated Assault ends, Explosive Shot's cooldown is reset and your next Explosive Shot fires at 2 additional targets at 100% effectiveness.
The cooldown of Spearhead is reduced by 30 sec and Spearhead's bleed now increases you and your pet's critical strike damage against the target by 30%.

Cobra Shot reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 1.0 sec.

Murder of Crows now deals Shadow damage.

Black Arrow's initial damage has a 25% chance to summon a Murder of Crows on your target.

 A Murder of Crows
Summons a flock of crows to attack your target, dealing 1,683 Physical damage over 15 sec.
You heal for 15% of all Shadow damage dealt by you or your pets.

Exhilaration grants you 3 sec of Survival of the Fittest.

Survival of the Fittest activates Exhilaration at 50% effectiveness.
While in combat, Disengage will chain the closest target to the ground, causing them to move 40% slower until they move 8 yards away.
While in combat, Disengage releases a fan of shadow daggers, dealing 2 Shadow damage per second and reducing affected target's movement speed by 30% for 6 sec.

Your auto shot now deals Shadow damage, allowing it to bypass armor.

Your auto shot has a 20% chance to grant Deathblow.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Your next Kill Shot can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.
Black Arrow is now usable on enemies with greater than 80% health or less than 20% health.
Casting Black Arrow while Beast Cleave is active causes Black Arrow to explode upon hitting its target, dealing 2,950 Shadow damage to other nearby enemies.
Periodic damage from Black Arrow has a small chance to erupt in a burst of darkness, dealing 399 Shadow damage to all enemies near the target. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

Each time Black Arrow deals damage, you have a small chance to manifest a Dark Hound to charge to your target and deal Shadow damage to nearby targets for 8 sec.

Whenever you summon a Dire Beast, you have a 25% chance to also summon a Shadow Hound.

When an enemy affected by Black Arrow dies, you have a 10% chance to gain Deathblow.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Your next Kill Shot can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.
When Kill Command deals damage, 8% of the damage dealt is replicated to each other unit affected by Black Arrow.

Casting Black Arrow has a 15% chance to grant Deathblow.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Your next Kill Shot can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.

Your Kill Shot is replaced with Black Arrow.

 Black Arrow
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 1,424 Shadow damage and 185 Shadow damage over 14 sec. Only usable on enemies above 80% health or below 20% health.

While Call of the Wild is active, you surrender to darkness, granting you Deathblow every 4 sec.

Casting Black Arrow while under the effects of Withering Fire causes you to additionally fire a barrage of 2 additional Black Arrows at nearby targets at 50% effectiveness.

spec_nodes:
Your Kill Shot is replaced with Black Arrow.

 Black Arrow
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 1,424 Shadow damage and 185 Shadow damage over 14 sec. Only usable on enemies above 80% health or below 20% health.
Give the command to kill, causing your pet to savagely deal 0 Physical damage to the enemy.

Your auto shot now deals Shadow damage, allowing it to bypass armor.

Your auto shot has a 20% chance to grant Deathblow.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Your next Kill Shot can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.

Each time Black Arrow deals damage, you have a small chance to manifest a Dark Hound to charge to your target and deal Shadow damage to nearby targets for 8 sec.

Whenever you summon a Dire Beast, you have a 25% chance to also summon a Shadow Hound.

When an enemy affected by Black Arrow dies, you have a 10% chance to gain Deathblow.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Your next Kill Shot can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.
Black Arrow is now usable on enemies with greater than 80% health or less than 20% health.

A quick shot causing 842 Physical damage.

Reduces the cooldown of Kill Command by 1 sec.
Your Call Pet additionally summons the pet from the bonus slot in your stable. This pet will obey your Kill Command, but cannot use pet family abilities.
Your pet damage is increased by 35% and your pet is 10% larger.

Fire a shot that tears through your enemy, causing them to bleed for 1,891 damage over 12 sec.

Sends your pet into a frenzy, increasing attack speed by 30% for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Generates 20 Focus over 8 sec.
When Kill Command deals damage, 8% of the damage dealt is replicated to each other unit affected by Black Arrow.

Casting Black Arrow has a 15% chance to grant Deathblow.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Your next Kill Shot can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.
You heal for 15% of all Shadow damage dealt by you or your pets.

Exhilaration grants you 3 sec of Survival of the Fittest.

Survival of the Fittest activates Exhilaration at 50% effectiveness.
While in combat, Disengage will chain the closest target to the ground, causing them to move 40% slower until they move 8 yards away.
While in combat, Disengage releases a fan of shadow daggers, dealing 2 Shadow damage per second and reducing affected target's movement speed by 30% for 6 sec.

Increases the damage and healing of your pet's abilities by 30%.

Increases the effectiveness of your pet's Predator's Thirst, Endurance Training, and Pathfinding passives by 50%.
Barbed Shot deals 10% increased damage, and applying Barbed Shot has a 50% chance to reset the cooldown of Kill Command.
Barbed Shot increases your critical strike chance by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Murder of Crows now deals Shadow damage.

Black Arrow's initial damage has a 25% chance to summon a Murder of Crows on your target.

 A Murder of Crows
Summons a flock of crows to attack your target, dealing 1,708 Physical damage over 15 sec.
Periodic damage from Black Arrow has a small chance to erupt in a burst of darkness, dealing 399 Shadow damage to all enemies near the target. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.
Casting Black Arrow while Beast Cleave is active causes Black Arrow to explode upon hitting its target, dealing 3,018 Shadow damage to other nearby enemies.
Kill Command deals increased critical strike damage equal to 100% of your critical strike chance.
Fires several missiles, hitting all nearby enemies within 8 yds of your current target for 398 Physical damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
When your pet attacks critically strike, they cause their target to bleed for 8% of the damage dealt over 6 sec.

While Call of the Wild is active, you surrender to darkness, granting you Deathblow every 4 sec.

Casting Black Arrow while under the effects of Withering Fire causes you to additionally fire a barrage of 2 additional Black Arrows at nearby targets at 50% effectiveness.
Casting Cobra Shot reduces the cooldown of Barbed Shot by 2 sec.
Kill Command now has 2 charges, and deals 15% increased damage.
Your auto shot has a 15% chance to also fire a Cobra Shot at your target.
Cobra Shot Focus cost reduced by 5. Cobra Shot damage increased by 35%.
After you Multi-Shot, your pet's melee attacks also strike all nearby enemies for 80% of the damage for the next 6.0 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Your auto shot critical strikes have a 20% chance to reset the cooldown of Barbed Shot.
Kill Shot will strike 1 additional target and deal 10% increased damage for each of your active pets. Stacks up to 5 times.

Direct damage from Barbed Shot has a 30% chance to explode on impact, applying Serpent Sting and dealing 627 Nature damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

 Serpent Sting
Fire a shot that poisons your target, causing them to take 159 Nature damage instantly and an additional 725 Nature damage over 18 sec.

While in combat, every 30 sec your next Kill Command summons the aid of a Beast.

 Wyvern
A Wyvern descends from the skies, letting out a battle cry that increases the damage of you and your pets by 10% for 15 sec.

 Boar
A Boar charges through your target 3 times, dealing 2,124 physical damage to the primary target and 849 damage to up to 8 nearby enemies.

 Bear
A Bear leaps into the fray, rending the flesh of your enemies, dealing 3,520 damage over 10 sec to up to 8 nearby enemies.
When you cast Barbed Shot, your pet stomps the ground, dealing 378 Physical damage to its primary target and 384 Physical damage to all other nearby enemies.

Casting Cobra Shot increases its damage by 25%. Stacks up to 4 times.

Upon reaching 4 stacks, the bonus is removed and you gain 8% increased pet damage for 8 sec.
While Beast Cleave is active, Kill Command now also strikes nearby enemies for 80% of damage dealt. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
All pet damage dealt increased by 5%.

Summons a powerful wild beast that attacks the target and roars, increasing your Haste by 5% for 8 sec.

Generates 20 Focus.

Howl of the Pack Leader increases the damage of your Kill Command by 50%.

Summoning a Beast reduces the cooldown of Barbed Shot by 10.0 sec.

Kill Command reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 1.0 sec.

Cobra Shot reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 1.0 sec.

Howl of the Pack Leader's cooldown is reduced to 25 sec.

Your pets gain an extra 5% of your attack power.

Every 5 casts of Kill Command summons a Murder of Crows.

A Murder of Crows
Summons a flock of crows to attack your target, dealing 1,698 Physical damage over 15 sec.

Rapidly fires a spray of shots for 2.7 sec, dealing an average of 1,660 Physical damage to all nearby enemies in front of you. Usable while moving. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Grants Beast Cleave.
Kill Command damage is increased by 10%. Barbed Shot lasts 2.0 sec longer.
Sends you and your pet into a rage, instantly dealing 0 Physical damage to its target, and increasing all damage you both deal by 30% for 15 sec. Removes all crowd control effects from your pet.
Kill Command has a 20% chance to also summon a Dire Beast to attack your target for 8 sec.

Every 3 casts of Dire Beast sounds the Horn of Valor, summoning either Hati or Fenryr to battle.

Hati
Increases the damage of all your pets by 8%.

Fenryr
Pounces your primary target, inflicting a heavy bleed that deals 1,699 damage over 8 sec and grants you 8% Haste.
When summoned, Dire Beasts gain Beast Cleave at 100% effectiveness for 8.0 sec.
Your Bear's periodic damage has a 10% chance to reduce the cooldown of Kill Command by 1.0 sec.
Initial damage from your Bear will consume Serpent Sting from up to 8 nearby targets, dealing 100% of its remaining damage instantly.

Your pet's attacks increase your Wyvern's damage bonus by 1%, up to 10%.

Casting Kill Command extends the duration of your Wyvern by 1.0 sec, up to 10 additional sec.
Each time your Boar deals damage, the damage of your next Cobra Shot is increased by 25% and Cobra Shot strikes 1 additional target. Stacks up to 4 times.
Kill Command deals 25% increased damage against enemies below 35% health.
Each time Barbed Shot deals damage, the cooldown of Kill Command is reduced by 0.50 sec.
Barbed Shot reduces the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 12.0 sec.
Casting Explosive Shot causes all active pets to Stomp at 200% effectiveness.
Dire Beast lasts an additional 1 sec and deals 30% increased damage.

Damage from your Kill Shot sends your pets into a rage, causing all active pets within 20 yds and your Bear to pounce to the target and Smack, Claw, or Bite it.

Your pets will not leap if their target is already in melee range.

When dropping below 60% health, summon the aid of a Turtle, reducing the damage you take by 10% for 6 sec.

This effect can only occur once every 1.5 min.
When Disengage removes a movement impairing effect, its cooldown is reduced by 4 sec.
When an enemy is stunned by Binding Shot, it is dragged to Binding Shot's center.

You sound the call of the wild, summoning 2 of your active pets for 20 sec. During this time, a random pet from your stable will appear every 4 sec to assault your target for 6 sec. 

Each time Call of the Wild summons a pet, the cooldown of Barbed Shot and Kill Command are reduced by 25%.
While Bestial Wrath is active, Cobra Shot resets the cooldown on Kill Command.
Activating Bestial Wrath grants 1 charge of Barbed Shot.
When Barbed Shot causes Frenzy to stack up to 3, your pet will immediately use its special attack and deal 50% bonus damage.
Command your pet to tear into your target, causing your target to bleed for 0 over 18 sec and take 15% increased damage from your pet for 18 sec.
Casting Bestial Wrath grants Howl of the Pack Leader and increases the damage dealt by your Beasts by 25% and your pets by 15% for 12 sec.
While Call of the Wild is active, each time you Kill Command, your Kill Command target takes 3% increased damage from all of your pets, stacking up to 10 times.
While Call of the Wild is active, your pets have the effects of Beast Cleave, and each time Call of the Wild summons a pet, all of your pets Stomp.
While Bestial Wrath is active, your pet's critical damage dealt is increased by 35%.
Bloodshed's pet damage bonus increased by 100% and Kill Command deals 20% increased damage to the target.
Bloodshed now hits 2 additional nearby targets.

Raptor Strike, Mongoose Bite, and Butchery damage increased by 5%.

When summoned, Dire Beasts gain Beast Cleave at 100% effectiveness for 8.0 sec.

While Call of the Wild is active, your pets have the effects of Beast Cleave, and each time Call of the Wild summons a pet, all of your pets Stomp.

Your auto shot has a 15% chance to also fire a Cobra Shot at your target.
Cobra Shot Focus cost reduced by 5. Cobra Shot damage increased by 35%.
Barbed Shot increases your critical strike chance by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Give the command to kill, causing your pet to savagely deal 0 Physical damage to the enemy.
When you cast Barbed Shot, your pet stomps the ground, dealing 374 Physical damage to its primary target and 374 Physical damage to all other nearby enemies.
All pet damage dealt increased by 5%.

Hati
Increases the damage of all your pets by 8%.

Fenryr
Pounces your primary target, inflicting a heavy bleed that deals 1,699 damage over 8 sec and grants you 8% Haste.
When Barbed Shot causes Frenzy to stack up to 3, your pet will immediately use its special attack and deal 50% bonus damage.

Increases the damage and healing of your pet's abilities by 30%.

Increases the effectiveness of your pet's Predator's Thirst, Endurance Training, and Pathfinding passives by 50%.

Every 5 casts of Kill Command summons a Murder of Crows.

A Murder of Crows
Summons a flock of crows to attack your target, dealing 1,715 Physical damage over 15 sec.

A quick shot causing 817 Physical damage.

Reduces the cooldown of Kill Command by 1 sec.

Casting Cobra Shot reduces the cooldown of Barbed Shot by 2 sec.

Your pet damage is increased by 35% and your pet is 10% larger.
Command your pet to tear into your target, causing your target to bleed for 0 over 18 sec and take 15% increased damage from your pet for 18 sec.
Fires several missiles, hitting all nearby enemies within 8 yds of your current target for 400 Physical damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

When your pet attacks critically strike, they cause their target to bleed for 8% of the damage dealt over 6 sec.
Casting Explosive Shot causes all active pets to Stomp at 200% effectiveness.

While Bestial Wrath is active, Cobra Shot resets the cooldown on Kill Command.

Summons a powerful wild beast that attacks the target and roars, increasing your Haste by 5% for 8 sec.

Generates 20 Focus.

Fire a shot that tears through your enemy, causing them to bleed for 1,891 damage over 12 sec.

Sends your pet into a frenzy, increasing attack speed by 30% for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Generates 20 Focus over 8 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 1,690 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 2,114 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Removes 1 Enrage and 1 Magic effect from an enemy target.
Maximum health increased by 8%, and Exhilaration now also heals you for an additional 12.0% of your maximum health over 8 sec.
Scares a beast, causing it to run in fear for up to 20 sec.  Damage caused may interrupt the effect.  Only one beast can be feared at a time.

You gain 5% more critical strike from critical strike sources.

You take 20% reduced damage while Camouflage is active.

This effect persists for 3 sec after you leave Camouflage.
Fires a magical projectile, tethering the enemy and any other enemies within 5 yds for 10 sec, stunning them for 3 sec if they move more than 5 yds from the arrow.

Your damage over time effects deal 10% increased damage.

This effect is increased by 50% on targets below 20% health.

Targets stunned by Binding Shot, knocked back by High Explosive Trap, knocked up by Implosive Trap, incapacitated by Scatter Shot, or stunned by Intimidation deal 10% less damage to you for 8 sec after the effect ends.
Feign Death and Aspect of the Turtle removes poison and disease effects from you.

Reduce the cooldown of Survival of the Fittest by 30 sec, and increase its duration by 2.0 sec.

Reduce the cooldown of Counter Shot and Muzzle by 2 sec.
The damage of Explosive Shot is increased by 8%.

Hurls a tar trap to the target location that creates a 8 yd radius pool of tar around itself for 30 sec when the first enemy approaches. All enemies have 50% reduced movement speed while in the area of effect. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

When Tranquilizing Shot successfully dispels an effect or Counter Shot interrupts a cast, gain 10 Focus.

You and your pet have 2.5% increased attack speed.

This effect is increased by 100% if you do not have an active pet.
Commands your pet to intimidate the target, stunning it for 5 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 1,690 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Your movement speed is increased by 30% anytime you have not attacked for 3 sec.

Interrupts spellcasting, preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
When Tar Trap is activated, all enemies in its area are rooted for 4 sec. Damage taken may break this root.

Instructs your pet to protect a friendly target from critical strikes, making attacks against that target unable to be critical strikes, but 10% of all damage taken by that target is also taken by the pet. Lasts 12 sec.
Survival of the Fittest gains an additional charge.

Dazes the target, slowing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

Steady Shot will increase the duration of Concussive Shot on the target by 3.0 sec.

Kill Command has a 10% chance to grant Deathblow.

 Deathblow

Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.

When Misdirection targets your pet, it reduces the damage they take by 50% for 5 sec.

The cooldown of Misdirection is reduced by 5 sec.
When you fall below 40% health, Bursting Shot and Scatter Shot have their cooldown immediately reset. This can only occur once every 25 sec.
You and your pet blend into the surroundings and gain stealth for 1 min. While camouflaged, you will heal for 2% of maximum health every 1 sec.
Tranquilizing Shot removes up to 1 additional Magic effect from up to 2 nearby targets.

Reduces the cooldowns of Aspect of the Cheetah, and Aspect of the Turtle by 30 sec.

The cooldown of Tar Trap, High Explosive Trap, Implosive Trap, and Freezing Trap is reduced by 5.0 sec.

Hurls a fire trap to the target location that explodes when an enemy approaches, causing 299 Fire damage and knocking all enemies up. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Increases your critical strike chance by 10% and critical strike damage by 20% for 15 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of your Aimed Shot and Rapid Fire by 60%.

When Aimed Shot damages a target affected by your Explosive Shot, Explosive Shot instantly explodes, dealing 25% increased damage.

 Streamline

When your abilities damage a target below 20% health, you gain 1% increased critical strike chance for 6 sec, stacking up to 15 times.

Additionally, Calling the Shots reduces Trueshot's cooldown by an additional 1.0 sec.
Rain a volley of arrows down over 6 sec, dealing up to 4,790 Physical damage to any enemy in the area, and gain the effects of Trick Shots for as long as Volley is active.

Multiple instances of this effect can overlap.

Shoot a stream of 7 shots at your target over 1.8 sec, dealing a total of 2,219 Physical damage. Usable while moving.

Each shot generates 2 Focus.

New stacks do not refresh duration and are removed upon casting Rapid Fire.
Lock and Load now increases the damage of Aimed Shot by 15%.
Rapid Fire deals 35% additional damage, and Aimed Shot has a 15% chance to reset the cooldown of Rapid Fire.
After gaining Deathblow, your next Kill Shot will deal 75% increased damage, and shred up to 5 targets near your Kill Shot target for 35% of the damage dealt by Kill Shot over 6 sec.

While Trueshot is active, consuming Precise Shots extends Trueshot's duration by 1.0 sec, up to 5.0 sec.


Additionally, Trueshot now increases the effectiveness of Streamline by 50%.
Consuming Spotter's Mark reduces the cooldown of Aimed Shot by 2.0 sec.

Aimed Shot now has a 15% chance and Rapid Fire now has a 25% chance to grant Deathblow.

Kill Shot critical strike damage is increased by 25%.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Your next Kill Shot can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.

Kill Shot consumes Precise Shots.
Kill Shot now has 2 charges and has its cooldown reduced by 2.0 sec.

Your ranged ability critical strikes cause the target to bleed for an additional 15% of the damage dealt over 6 sec.

Rapid Fire shoots 3 additional shots.
Aimed Shot cooldown reduced by 1.0 sec.

Aimed Shot causes your next Arcane Shot or Multi-Shot to deal 100% more damage and cost 40% less Focus.

Your Auto Shot damage is increased by 100% but the time between your Auto Shots is increased by 2.0 sec.
Multi-Shot deals 75% increased damage and Explosive Shot deals 15% increased damage.
When your Eagle applies Spotter's Mark, it has a 25% chance to apply a Spotter's Mark to up to 3 additional nearby enemies.

Consuming Precise Shots increases the damage of your next Aimed Shot by 20% and grants Streamline.

  Streamline
Your next Aimed Shot has its Focus cost and cast time reduced by 20%. Stacks up to 2 times.

Consuming Precise Shots reduces the cooldown of Explosive Shot by 2.0 sec.

Consuming Lock and Load reduces the cooldown of Explosive Shot by 8.0 sec.
A powerful aimed shot that deals 2,463 Physical damage.

Rapid Fire's damage is increased by 15%. Casting Rapid Fire grants Streamline.

 Streamline
Your next Aimed Shot has its Focus cost and cast time reduced by 20%. Stacks up to 2 times.

Trueshot sends your Spotting Eagle into a frenzy, instantly applying Spotter's Mark to your target. 

During Trueshot, your chance to apply Spotter's Mark is increased by 100%.
Bulletstorm now increases your critical strike damage by 2%. Additionally, Bulletstorm now stacks 5 more times.

Your Spotting Eagle gains the Tenacity specialization, granting you Endurance Training and Air Superiority.

 Endurance Training
You gain 5% increased maximum health.

 Air Superiority
Your Spotting Eagle alerts you to oncoming danger, reducing all damage you take by 3%

Your Spotting Eagle gains the Cunning specialization, granting you Master's Call and Pathfinding.

 Master's Call
Your pet removes all root and movement impairing effects from itself and a friendly target, and grants immunity to all such effects for 4 sec.

 Pathfinding
Your movement speed is increased by 8%.
Streamline's cast time reduction effect is increased to 30%.
Consuming Precise Shots reduces the cooldown of Aimed Shot by 0.75 sec.
Your ranged auto attacks have a 8% chance to trigger Lock and Load, causing your next Aimed Shot to cost no Focus and be instant.
Commands your pet to intimidate the target, stunning it for 5 sec.

Your Spotting Eagle descends from the skies, stunning your target for 5 sec.

This ability does not require line of sight when used against players.

Damage from Multi-Shot and Volley reduces the cooldown of Rapid Fire by 0.30 sec.

Damage from Aimed Shot reduces the cooldown of Volley by 0.50 sec.
Spotter's Mark now additionally increases the critical strike chance of Aimed Shot by 15%.
Damaging an enemy with Explosive Shot increases the damage they receive from your next Arcane Shot or Multi-Shot by 30%.

The damage bonus of Spotter's Mark is increased by 20%.

 Spotter's Mark
Damaging an enemy with abilities empowered by Precise Shots has a 30% chance to apply Spotter's Mark to the primary target, causing your next Aimed Shot to deal 20% increased damage to the target.

Regain access to Call Pet.

While outdoors, your pet deals 15% increased damage and takes 15% reduced damage.
Gain critical strike damage equal to 40% of your critical strike chance.

spec_nodes:
Bestows a vile malediction upon the target, burning the sinew and muscle of its host, dealing 1,089 Shadowflame damage immediately and an additional 17,999 Shadowflame damage over 18 sec.

Replaces Corruption.

Generates 5 Soul Shard Fragments.

This spell is cast at your target.

 Curse of the Satyr
Increases the time between an enemy's attacks by 20% and the casting time of all spells by 30% for 2 min.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.
While Unending Resolve is active, enemies within 30 yds are affected by Curse of Tongues and Curse of Weakness at 100% effectiveness.

Wither damage increased 20%. When Wither gains a stack from Blackened Soul, it has a chance to gain an additional stack.

Sacrifice 10% of your maximum health. Soul Leech now absorbs an additional 15% of your maximum health.

Increases your critical strike chance by 3%.

Physical attacks against you have a 25% chance to make your next Incinerate instant cast. This effect can only occur once every 6 sec.

Your single target spells have a 35% chance to apply Havoc to a nearby enemy for 5.0 sec.

 Havoc

Marks a target with Havoc for 15 sec, causing your single target spells to also strike the Havoc victim for 60% of the damage dealt.
Enemies affected by your Rain of Fire take 3% increased damage from your Fire spells.
Rain of Fire damage is increased by 20% and its Soul Shard cost is reduced by 1.
Calls forth a cataclysm at the target location, dealing 20,314 Shadowflame damage to all enemies within 8 yards and afflicting them with Immolate.

Wither damage increased by 25%.

Blackened Soul deals 2% increased damage per stack of Wither.

After Wither reaches 8 stacks or when its host reaches 20% health, Wither deals 3,262 Shadowflame damage to its host every 1 sec until 1 stack remains.

When Blackened Soul deals damage, you have a chance to gain Tormented Crescendo.

Critical strike damage dealt by Wither is increased by 10%. 

Wither has a chance to gain a stack when it critically strikes. Stacks gained this way do not activate Blackened Soul.

Each time your spells duplicate from Havoc, gain 1% increased damage for 6 sec. Stacks up to 5 times.
Increases the damage of Immolate by 25% and its duration by 3 sec.

Dark magic erupts from you and corrupts your soul for 20 sec, causing enemies suffering from your Wither to take 18,429 Shadowflame damage and increase its stack count by 6.

While corrupted your Haste is increased by 8% and spending Soul Shards on damaging spells grants 1 additional stack of Wither.

Blasts a target for 13,629 Shadowflame damage, gaining 50% critical strike chance on targets that have 20% or less health.

Restores 1 Soul Shard and refunds a charge if the target dies within 5 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Conflagrate by 2 sec.
Increases the damage dealt by your spells and your demon by 3%.

Sacrifices your demon pet for power, gaining its command demon ability, and causing your spells to sometimes also deal 2,069 additional Shadow damage.

Lasts until canceled or until you summon a demon pet.
Chaos Bolt, Shadowburn, and Incinerate deal 5% increased damage to targets afflicted by Immolate.

Periodic damage from Immolate has a 4% chance to fire a Demonfire bolt at 100% increased effectiveness.

Incinerate has a 25% chance to fire a Demonfire bolt at 100% increased effectiveness.
Launches 15 bolts of felfire over 2.7 sec at random targets afflicted by your Immolate within 40 yds. Each bolt deals 2,165 Fire damage to the target and 1,086 Fire damage to nearby enemies.

Casting Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn grants Diabolic Ritual for 20 sec. If Diabolic Ritual is already active, its duration is reduced by 1 sec instead.

When Diabolic Ritual expires you gain Demonic Art, causing your next Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn to summon an Overlord, Mother of Chaos, or Pit Lord that unleashes a devastating attack against your enemies.
Increases the damage of Shadowburn by 20%. The critical strike chance of Shadowburn is increased by an additional 50% when damaging a target that is at or below 30% health.
Conflagrate and Shadowburn have a 50% chance to guarantee your next cast of the ability to critically strike, and increase its damage by your critical strike chance.
Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 2% and reduces the cast time of your Incinerate spell by 20%.

Summons an Infernal from the Twisting Nether, impacting for 3,327 Fire damage and stunning all enemies in the area for 2 sec.

The Infernal will serve you for 30 sec, dealing 3,391 damage to all nearby enemies every 1.8 sec and generating 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec.
Incinerate now also hits all enemies near your target for 25% damage.

When your Immolate deals periodic damage to a target above 80% health, gain 2% Haste for 10 sec.

Stacks up to 3 times.
Channel Demonfire fires an additional 2 bolts. Each bolt increases the remaining duration of Immolate on all targets hit by 0.5 sec.
Enemies damaged by your Overlord have their souls cloven, increasing damage taken by you and your pets by 5% for 15 sec.

Demonic Art increases the damage of your next Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn by 100% and reduces its cast time by 50%.

Casting Chaos Bolt reduces the duration of Diabolic Ritual by 1 additional sec.

Mother of Chaos empowers your next Incinerate to become Infernal Bolt.

 Infernal Bolt
Hurl a bolt enveloped in the infernal flames of the abyss, dealing 19,241 Fire damage to your enemy target and generating 3 Soul Shards.
When Shadowburn fails to kill a target that is at or below 30% health, its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Chaos Bolt and Shadowburn increases the damage you deal to the target by 5% for 7 sec.
Summon Infernal increases the damage of your next 8 casts of Chaos Bolt by 25% or your next 8 casts of Rain of Fire by 35%.
While your initial Infernal is active, every Soul Shard you spend has a 15% chance to summon an additional Infernal that lasts 8 sec.
Your spells have a chance to grant you 15% Haste for 8 sec.
Chaos Bolt consumes up to 5 sec of Immolate's damage over time effect on your target, instantly dealing that much damage.
Increases the damage of Channel Demonfire by 30% and it deals damage 35% faster.
You always gain the benefit of Soulburn when casting Demonic Circle: Teleport, increasing your movement speed by 50% and making you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.
Howl of Terror cooldown is reduced by 15 sec and range is increased by 5 yds.
Summon Infernal grants Diabolic Ritual and reduces its duration by 3 sec.
Spending Soul Shards on damaging spells while your Infernal is active decreases the duration of Diabolic Ritual by 1 additional sec.
Unending Resolve heals you for 30% of your maximum health over 10 sec.
Unending Resolve grants Soul Leech equal to 10% of your maximum health and increases the maximum amount Soul Leech can absorb by 10% for 8 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Destruction spells by 5%.
Every 20 Soul Shards spent grants Ritual of Ruin, making your next Chaos Bolt or Rain of Fire consume no Soul Shards and have its cast time reduced by 50%.
Increases the critical strike damage of your Destruction spells by 5%.
Fire damage increased by 2% and damage dealt by your demons is increased by 2%.
Summon Infernal becomes empowered, dealing 40% increased damage. When your Summon Infernal ends, it fragments into two smaller Infernals at 50% effectiveness that lasts 10 sec.
Enemies marked by your Havoc take 5% increased damage from your single target spells.

Burns the enemy's soul, dealing 26,190 Fire damage and applying Immolate.

Generates 1 Soul Shard.
Increases the damage of Chaos Bolt by 10% and reduces its cast time by 0.5 sec.

Chaos Bolt and Rain of Fire increase the damage of your next 2 Incinerates by 15%. Shadowburn increases the damage of your next Incinerate by 15%.

Stacks up to 6 times.
Ritual of Ruin requires 5 less Soul Shards spent.
Consuming Soul Shards increases your Mastery by 0.5% for 10 sec for each shard spent. Gaining a stack does not refresh the duration.
Periodic damage dealt by Immolate has a 5% chance to tear open a Dimensional Rift.

Rips a hole in time and space, opening a random portal that damages your target:

Shadowy Tear
Deals 45,153 Shadow damage over 14 sec.

Unstable Tear
Deals 38,745 Chaos damage over 6 sec.

Chaos Tear
Fires a Chaos Bolt, dealing 18,068 Chaos damage. This Chaos Bolt always critically strikes and your critical strike chance increases its damage.

Generates 3 Soul Shard Fragments.

Summoning a Pit Lord causes your next Chaos Bolt to become Ruination.

 Ruination
Call down a demon-infested meteor from the depths of the Twisting Nether, dealing 62,421 Chaos damage on impact to all enemies within 8 yds of the target and summoning 3 Wild Imps.

Damage is reduced beyond 8 targets.
When your direct damaging abilities deal a critical strike, they have a chance to reset the cooldown of Soul Fire and reduce the cast time of your next Soul Fire by 80%.
Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, and Shadowburn always gain at least 70% of the maximum benefit from your Mastery: Chaotic Energies.

Consuming Ritual of Ruin summons an Overfiend for 8 sec.

 Summon Overfiend
Generates 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec and casts Chaos Bolt at 80% effectiveness at its summoner's target.
Incinerate now generates 100% additional Soul Shard Fragments.
Bolts from Dimensional Rift now deal 25% of damage dealt to nearby enemies as Fire damage.
hero_talent_nodes:
Damage dealt by your demonic soul is increased by 10%.

Consuming Demonic Core feeds the demonic entity within you, causing it to appear and deal 5,321 Shadow damage to your target.

When you kill a target, its tortured soul is flung into a nearby enemy for 3 sec. This effect inflicts 2,778 Shadow damage to enemies within 10 yds every 0.9 sec.

Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
When you kill a target, you have a chance to generate a Soul Shard that is guaranteed to be a Succulent Soul.

Curse of Weakness is empowered and transforms into Curse of the Satyr.

Increases the time between an enemy's attacks by 20% and the casting time of all spells by 30% for 2 min.

After Wither reaches 8 stacks or when its host reaches 20% health, Wither deals 3,262 Shadowflame damage to its host every 1 sec until 1 stack remains.

When Blackened Soul deals damage, you have a chance to gain Tormented Crescendo.

Wither damage increased by 25%.

Blackened Soul deals 2% increased damage per stack of Wither.
Dark Pact heals you for 9,108 every 1 sec while active.
Sacrifice 10% of your maximum health. Soul Leech now absorbs an additional 15% of your maximum health.

Bestows a vile malediction upon the target, burning the sinew and muscle of its host, dealing 1,110 Shadowflame damage immediately and an additional 17,952 Shadowflame damage over 18 sec.

Replaces Corruption.

Dark magic erupts from you and corrupts your soul for 20 sec, causing enemies suffering from your Wither to take 18,429 Shadowflame damage and increase its stack count by 6.

While corrupted your Haste is increased by 8% and spending Soul Shards on damaging spells grants 1 additional stack of Wither.

Critical strike damage dealt by Wither is increased by 10%. 

Wither has a chance to gain a stack when it critically strikes. Stacks gained this way do not activate Blackened Soul.
Shadow damage dealt by your spells and abilities is increased by 2% and your Shadow spells gain 10% more critical strike chance from all sources.
Fire damage dealt by your spells and abilities is increased by 2% and your Fire spells gain 10% more critical strike chance from all sources.
Wither deals 30% increased periodic damage but its duration is 15% shorter.
Wither damage increased 20%. When Wither gains a stack from Blackened Soul, it has a chance to gain an additional stack.

 Infernal Bolt
Hurl a bolt enveloped in the infernal flames of the abyss, dealing 19,241 Fire damage to your enemy target and generating 3 Soul Shards.

Summoning a Pit Lord causes your next Chaos Bolt to become Ruination.

 Ruination
Call down a demon-infested meteor from the depths of the Twisting Nether, dealing 62,421 Chaos damage on impact to all enemies within 8 yds of the target and summoning 3 Wild Imps.

Damage is reduced beyond 8 targets.
Summon Infernal becomes empowered, dealing 40% increased damage. When your Summon Infernal ends, it fragments into two smaller Infernals at 50% effectiveness that lasts 10 sec.
Fire damage increased by 2% and damage dealt by your demons is increased by 2%.
You always gain the benefit of Soulburn when casting Demonic Circle: Teleport, increasing your movement speed by 50% and making you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.
Howl of Terror cooldown is reduced by 15 sec and range is increased by 5 yds.
Enemies marked by your Havoc take 5% increased damage from your single target spells.

Spending Soul Shards on damaging spells while your Infernal is active decreases the duration of Diabolic Ritual by 1 additional sec.
Enemies damaged by your Overlord have their souls cloven, increasing damage taken by you and your pets by 5% for 15 sec.
Unending Resolve heals you for 30% of your maximum health over 10 sec.
Unending Resolve grants Soul Leech equal to 10% of your maximum health and increases the maximum amount Soul Leech can absorb by 10% for 8 sec.

Demonic Art increases the damage of your next Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn by 100% and reduces its cast time by 50%.

Casting Chaos Bolt reduces the duration of Diabolic Ritual by 1 additional sec.

Cloaked in the ever-burning flames of the abyss, dealing 884 Fire damage to enemies within 10 yards every 0.9 sec.
Increases the attack speed of your Dreadstalkers by 10% and their critical strike chance by 15%.
When you consume a Demonic Core, your primary Felguard carves your target, dealing 2,057 Physical damage.

Your Felguard hurls his axe towards the target location, erupting when it lands and dealing 2,075 Shadowflame damage every 1 sec for 6 sec to nearby enemies.

While unarmed, your Felguard's basic attacks deal damage to all nearby enemies and attacks 50% faster.
hero_talent_nodes:
Damage dealt by your demonic soul is increased by 10%.

Consuming Demonic Core feeds the demonic entity within you, causing it to appear and deal 5,321 Shadow damage to your target.

When you kill a target, its tortured soul is flung into a nearby enemy for 3 sec. This effect inflicts 2,786 Shadow damage to enemies within 10 yds every 0.9 sec.

Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
When you kill a target, you have a chance to generate a Soul Shard that is guaranteed to be a Succulent Soul.
Fel Domination cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.
Targets resurrected with Soulstone resurrect with 40% additional health and 80% additional mana.
Shadow Bolt damage increased by 20%. Power Siphon increases the damage of Demonbolt by an additional 20%.
Your demonic soul deals 100% increased damage to the main target of Hand of Gul'dan.
Wild Imp damage increased by 5% and Wild Imps that are imploded have an additional 5% chance to grant a Demonic Core.

Soul Anathema damage increased by 25% and is dealt 20% faster.

Consuming Demonic Core activates Shared Fate or Feast of Souls.

Unleashing your demonic soul bestows a fiendish entity unto the soul of its targets, dealing 7,793 Shadow damage over 10 sec.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Soul Anathema.
You always gain the benefit of Soulburn when consuming a Healthstone, increasing its healing by 30% and increasing your maximum health by 20% for 12 sec.
Dark Pact now shields you for an additional 50% of the sacrificed health.

A demonic entity now inhabits your soul, allowing you to detect if a Soul Shard has a Succulent Soul when it's generated. 

A Succulent Soul empowers your next Hand of Gul'dan, increasing its damage by 60%, and unleashing your demonic soul to deal an additional 9,774 Shadow damage.
Your Summon Demonic Tyrant spell is empowered by the demonic entity within you, causing it to grant 3 Soul Shards that each contain a Succulent Soul.

Curse of Weakness is empowered and transforms into Curse of the Satyr.

 Curse of the Satyr
Increases the time between an enemy's attacks by 20% and the casting time of all spells by 30% for 2 min.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.
While Unending Resolve is active, enemies within 30 yds are affected by Curse of Tongues and Curse of Weakness at 100% effectiveness.

After Wither reaches 8 stacks or when its host reaches 20% health, Wither deals 3,262 Shadowflame damage to its host every 1 sec until 1 stack remains.

When Blackened Soul deals damage, you have a chance to gain Tormented Crescendo.

Wither damage increased by 25%.

Blackened Soul deals 2% increased damage per stack of Wither.
Dark Pact heals you for 9,108 every 1 sec while active.
Sacrifice 10% of your maximum health. Soul Leech now absorbs an additional 15% of your maximum health.

Spending Soul Shards on damaging spells will further corrupt enemies affected by your Wither, increasing its stack count by 1.

Each time Wither gains a stack it has a chance to collapse, consuming a stack every 1 sec to deal 3,262 Shadowflame damage to its host until 1 stack remains.

Bestows a vile malediction upon the target, burning the sinew and muscle of its host, dealing 1,079 Shadowflame damage immediately and an additional 18,066 Shadowflame damage over 18 sec.

Replaces Corruption.

Dark magic erupts from you and corrupts your soul for 20 sec, causing enemies suffering from your Wither to take 18,429 Shadowflame damage and increase its stack count by 6.

While corrupted your Haste is increased by 8% and spending Soul Shards on damaging spells grants 1 additional stack of Wither.

Critical strike damage dealt by Wither is increased by 10%. 

Wither has a chance to gain a stack when it critically strikes. Stacks gained this way do not activate Blackened Soul.
Shadow damage dealt by your spells and abilities is increased by 2% and your Shadow spells gain 10% more critical strike chance from all sources.
Fire damage dealt by your spells and abilities is increased by 2% and your Fire spells gain 10% more critical strike chance from all sources.
Wither deals 30% increased periodic damage but its duration is 15% shorter.
Wither damage increased 20%. When Wither gains a stack from Blackened Soul, it has a chance to gain an additional stack.

Mother of Chaos empowers your next Incinerate to become Infernal Bolt.

 Infernal Bolt
Hurl a bolt enveloped in the infernal flames of the abyss, dealing 19,241 Fire damage to your enemy target and generating 3 Soul Shards.

Summoning a Pit Lord causes your next Chaos Bolt to become Ruination.

 Ruination
Call down a demon-infested meteor from the depths of the Twisting Nether, dealing 62,421 Chaos damage on impact to all enemies within 8 yds of the target and summoning 3 Wild Imps.

Damage is reduced beyond 8 targets.
Summon Infernal becomes empowered, dealing 40% increased damage. When your Summon Infernal ends, it fragments into two smaller Infernals at 50% effectiveness that lasts 10 sec.
Fire damage increased by 2% and damage dealt by your demons is increased by 2%.
You always gain the benefit of Soulburn when casting Demonic Circle: Teleport, increasing your movement speed by 50% and making you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.
Howl of Terror cooldown is reduced by 15 sec and range is increased by 5 yds.
Enemies marked by your Havoc take 5% increased damage from your single target spells.
Summon Infernal grants Diabolic Ritual and reduces its duration by 3 sec.
Spending Soul Shards on damaging spells while your Infernal is active decreases the duration of Diabolic Ritual by 1 additional sec.
Enemies damaged by your Overlord have their souls cloven, increasing damage taken by you and your pets by 5% for 15 sec.
Unending Resolve heals you for 30% of your maximum health over 10 sec.
Unending Resolve grants Soul Leech equal to 10% of your maximum health and increases the maximum amount Soul Leech can absorb by 10% for 8 sec.

Casting Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn grants Diabolic Ritual for 20 sec. If Diabolic Ritual is already active, its duration is reduced by 1 sec instead.

When Diabolic Ritual expires you gain Demonic Art, causing your next Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn to summon an Overlord, Mother of Chaos, or Pit Lord that unleashes a devastating attack against your enemies.

Demonic Art increases the damage of your next Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn by 100% and reduces its cast time by 50%.

Casting Chaos Bolt reduces the duration of Diabolic Ritual by 1 additional sec.

class_nodes: Attacks received that deal at least 5% of your health decrease Unending Resolve's cooldown by 10 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 25 sec.
Increases the amount of damage required to break your fear effects by 60%.
Your Fear causes the target to tremble in place instead of fleeing in fear.
Reduces the chance you will be critically struck by 2%. All damage your primary demon takes is reduced by 8%.
Reduces the cast time of Soulstone and Create Healthstone by 50%.
Increases you and your pets' maximum health by 5%.

5% of all damage you take is taken by your demon pet instead. 

While Grimoire of Sacrifice is active, your Stamina is increased by 3%.
Soul Leech also heals you for 8% and your pet for 25% of the absorption it grants.

Your spells have a 5% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain 10% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.

Healthstones you conjure for yourself are now Demonic Healthstones and can be used multiple times in combat. Demonic Healthstones cannot be traded.

 Demonic Healthstone
Instantly restores 25% health. 60 sec cooldown.
Your Healthstone heals you for an additional 10% of your maximum health. Any party or raid member using a Healthstone also heals you for that amount.

Increases the attack speed of your primary pet by 5%. 

Increases Grimoire of Sacrifice damage by 10%.
Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Incubus, Succubus, Felhunter, or Felguard Summon spell is free and has its casting time reduced by 90%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fel Domination by 60 sec.
All single-target damage done by you and your minions grants you and your pet shadowy shields that absorb 3% of the damage dealt for 15 sec, up to 5% of maximum health.

Your next Curse of Exhaustion, Curse of Tongues or Curse of Weakness cast within 15 sec is amplified.

Curse of Exhaustion
Reduces the target's movement speed by an additional 20%.

Curse of Tongues
Increases casting time by an additional 40%.

Curse of Weakness
Enemy is unable to critically strike.
Reduces the cooldown of Amplify Curse by 15 sec.
Sacrifices 20% of your current health to shield you for 200% of the sacrificed health plus an additional 13,835 for 20 sec. Usable while suffering from control impairing effects.
Dark Pact sacrifices only 5% of your current health for the same shield value.
Reduces the cooldown of Dark Pact by 15 sec.

Your primary pets gain a bonus effect.

Imp: Successful Singe Magic casts grant the target 4% damage reduction for 5 sec.

Voidwalker: Reduces the cooldown of Shadow Bulwark by 30 sec.

Felhunter: Reduces the cooldown of Devour Magic by 5 sec.

Sayaad: Reduces the cooldown of Seduction by 10 sec and causes the target to walk faster towards the demon.
Every Soul Shard you spend has a 5% chance to be refunded.
When you use a Healthstone, gain 4% Leech for 20 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Shadowfury by 15 sec and increases its radius by 2 yards.
Slows enemies in a 12 yard cone in front of you by 70% for 6 sec.
Stuns all enemies within 8 yds for 3 sec.
Banishes an enemy Demon, Aberration, or Elemental, preventing any action for 30 sec. Limit 1. Casting Banish again on the target will cancel the effect.

Increases the damage done by your primary pet by 5%. 

Increases Grimoire of Sacrifice damage by 10%.
Let loose a terrifying howl, causing 5 enemies within 10 yds to flee in fear, disorienting them for 20 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Horrifies an enemy target into fleeing, incapacitating for 3 sec and healing you for 20% of maximum health.
Reduces the damage dealt by Burning Rush by 10%. Burning Rush increases your movement speed by an additional 20%.

Increases your movement speed by 50%, but also damages you for 4% of your maximum health every 1 sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.

When Soul Leech absorbs damage, 5% of damage taken is absorbed and spread out over 5 sec.

Reduces damage taken by 1.5%.

Grants access to the following abilities:

Curse of Tongues:
Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by 30% for 1 min.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Curse of Exhaustion:
Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 12 sec.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Your Soul Leech absorption now passively recharges at a rate of 0.1% of maximum health every 1 sec, and may now absorb up to 5% of maximum health.

Increases your armor by 45%.
Drain Life heals for 15% of the amount drained over 9.1 sec.
Using Demonic Circle: Teleport or your Demonic Gateway reduces all damage you take by 4% for 10 sec.
Creates a demonic gateway between two locations. Activating the gateway transports the user to the other gateway. Each player can use a Demonic Gateway only once per 90 sec.
Unending Resolve reduces damage taken by an additional 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Unending Resolve by 45 sec.

Consumes a Soul Shard, unlocking the hidden power of your spells.

Demonic Circle: Teleport: Increases your movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.

Demonic Gateway: Can be cast instantly.

Drain Life: Gain an absorb shield equal to the amount of healing done for 30 sec. This shield cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Health Funnel: Restores 140% more health and reduces the damage taken by your pet by 30% for 10 sec.

Healthstone: Increases the healing of your Healthstone by 30% and increases your maximum health by 20% for 12 sec.
Summon Infernal increases the damage of your next 8 casts of Chaos Bolt by 25% or your next 8 casts of Rain of Fire by 35%.
While your initial Infernal is active, every Soul Shard you spend has a 15% chance to summon an additional Infernal that lasts 8 sec.
Each time your spells duplicate from Havoc, gain 1% increased damage for 6 sec. Stacks up to 5 times.
Ritual of Ruin requires 5 less Soul Shards spent.

Chaos Bolt and Rain of Fire increase the damage of your next 2 Incinerates by 15%. Shadowburn increases the damage of your next Incinerate by 15%.

Stacks up to 6 times.
Consuming Soul Shards increases your Mastery by 0.5% for 10 sec for each shard spent. Gaining a stack does not refresh the duration.
Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, and Shadowburn always gain at least 70% of the maximum benefit from your Mastery: Chaotic Energies.
Increases the critical strike damage of your Destruction spells by 5%.
Incinerate now generates 100% additional Soul Shard Fragments.
Chaos Bolt, Shadowburn, and Incinerate deal 5% increased damage to targets afflicted by Immolate.
Every 20 Soul Shards spent grants Ritual of Ruin, making your next Chaos Bolt or Rain of Fire consume no Soul Shards and have its cast time reduced by 50%.
Increases the damage dealt by your spells and your demon by 3%.

Sacrifices your demon pet for power, gaining its command demon ability, and causing your spells to sometimes also deal 2,056 additional Shadow damage.

Lasts until canceled or until you summon a demon pet.

When your Immolate deals periodic damage to a target above 80% health, gain 2% Haste for 10 sec.

Stacks up to 3 times.
Increases the damage of Immolate by 25% and its duration by 3 sec.
Rain of Fire damage is increased by 20% and its Soul Shard cost is reduced by 1.
Calls forth a cataclysm at the target location, dealing 20,560 Shadowflame damage to all enemies within 8 yards and afflicting them with Immolate.
Enemies affected by your Rain of Fire take 3% increased damage from your Fire spells.

Burns the enemy's soul, dealing 26,412 Fire damage and applying Immolate.

Generates 1 Soul Shard.

Your single target spells have a 35% chance to apply Havoc to a nearby enemy for 5.0 sec.

 Havoc
Marks a target with Havoc for 5.0 sec, causing your single target spells to also strike the Havoc victim for 60% of the damage dealt.
Marks a target with Havoc for 15 sec, causing your single target spells to also strike the Havoc victim for 60% of the damage dealt.
Your spells have a chance to grant you 15% Haste for 8 sec.
Chaos Bolt consumes up to 5 sec of Immolate's damage over time effect on your target, instantly dealing that much damage.
Incinerate now also hits all enemies near your target for 25% damage.

Increases your critical strike chance by 3%.

Physical attacks against you have a 25% chance to make your next Incinerate instant cast. This effect can only occur once every 6 sec.
Chaos Bolt and Shadowburn increases the damage you deal to the target by 5% for 7 sec.

Summons an Infernal from the Twisting Nether, impacting for 3,307 Fire damage and stunning all enemies in the area for 2 sec.

The Infernal will serve you for 30 sec, dealing 3,436 damage to all nearby enemies every 1.8 sec and generating 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec.

Unleash wicked magic upon your target's soul, dealing 91,530 Shadow damage over 3 sec.

Deals 10% increased damage, up to 30%, per damage over time effect you have active on the target.
Increases the damage of your Darkglare by 70%. When Darkglare extends damage over time effects it also sears affected targets for 43,739 Shadow damage.

While Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction are active, your Shadow Bolt has a 30% chance and your Drain Soul has a 20% chance to make your next Malefic Rapture cost no Soul Shards and cast instantly.

A ghostly soul haunts the target, dealing 26,588 Shadow damage and increasing your damage dealt to the target by 10% for 18 sec.

If the target dies, Haunt's cooldown is reset.

Increases Drain Life healing by 30% while your health is at or below 35% health. 

Damage done by your Agony, Corruption, Unstable Affliction, and Malefic Rapture is increased by 10% when your target is at or below 35% health.

Summons a Darkglare from the Twisting Nether that extends the duration of your damage over time effects on all enemies by 8 sec.

The Darkglare will serve you for 20 sec, blasting its target for 5,488 Shadow damage, increased by 45% for every damage over time effect you have active on their current target.
Increases Malefic Rapture damage by 5% and reduces its cast time by 10%.
Increases the damage dealt by your spells and your demon by 3%.

Sacrifices your demon pet for power, gaining its command demon ability, and causing your spells to sometimes also deal 2,070 additional Shadow damage.

Lasts until canceled or until you summon a demon pet.
Malefic Rapture damage is increased by 4% for each enemy it hits, up to 5 enemies.

Refreshing Agony with 10 or less seconds remaining deals 8,807 Shadow damage to its target and enemies within 10 yards.

Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Malefic Rapture damage increased by 4%. Corruption damage increased by 10%.
Increases critical strike damage dealt by Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction by 15%.
Malefic Rapture deals 40% increased damage to targets suffering from Unstable Affliction.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul deal an additional 5% damage.
Reduces the cast time of Shadow Bolt by 15% and increases its damage by 40%.

Replaces Shadow Bolt.

Drains the target's soul, causing 15,412 Shadow damage over 4.5 sec.

Damage is increased by 100% against enemies below 20% health.

Generates 1 Soul Shard if the target dies during this effect.
Increases the critical strike chance of Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction by 5%.

Corruption damage has a chance to cause your next Shadow Bolt or Drain Soul to deal 25% increased damage. 

Shadow Bolt is instant cast and Drain Soul channels 50% faster when affected.
Agony's damage starts at 4 stacks and may now ramp up to 18 stacks.

Afflicts one target with 33,874 Shadow damage over 16 sec. 

If dispelled, deals 132,092 damage to the dispeller and silences them for 4 sec.

Embeds a demon seed in the enemy target that will explode after 10.9 sec, dealing 3,194 Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yards and applying Corruption to them.

The seed will detonate early if the target is hit by other detonations, or takes 2,767 damage from your spells.

Corruption is now permanent and deals 15% increased damage.

Duration reduced to 24 sec against players.
Corruption deals 30% increased damage and its periodic damage heals you for 5% of the damage dealt.
Agony has 1.10 times the normal chance to generate a Soul Shard.
Corruption damage is increased by 15%, and each time it deals damage any of your Curses active on the target are extended by 0.5 sec.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul have a chance to trigger a Shadow Bolt Volley, dealing 6,941 Shadow damage to 5 enemies within 10 yards of your current target.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul deal 8% increased damage, up to 24%, per damage over time effect you have active on the target.

Wither away all life force of your current target and up to 4 additional targets nearby, causing your primary target to suffer 37,744 Shadow damage and secondary targets to suffer 18,872 Shadow damage over 8 sec.

Damage dealt by Soul Rot heals you for 50% of damage done.

Casting Soul Rot grants 3 applications of Malign Omen.

 Malign Omen
Your next Malefic Rapture deals 20% increased damage and extends the duration of your damage over time effects and Haunt by 2 sec.
Your Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction deal damage 15% faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Conflagrate by 2 sec.

Blasts a target for 13,768 Shadowflame damage, gaining 50% critical strike chance on targets that have 20% or less health.

Restores 1 Soul Shard and refunds a charge if the target dies within 5 sec.
Conflagrate and Shadowburn have a 50% chance to guarantee your next cast of the ability to critically strike, and increase its damage by your critical strike chance.

Your Dreadstalkers deal 50% increased damage while your Vilefiend is active.

Teaches your primary Felguard the following ability:

 Soul Strike
Strike into the soul of the enemy, dealing 3,182 Shadow damage.
Summon a Vilefiend to fight for you for the next 15 sec.
Implosion deals 10% increased damage. Consuming a Demonic Core has a chance to summon a Wild Imp.
When your Wild Imps expire or die, your other demons are inspired and gain 1% additional damage, stacking up to 10 times.
Shadow Bolt has a 20% chance to make your next Call Dreadstalkers cost 2 fewer Soul Shards and have no cast time.
Power Siphon increases the damage of Demonbolt by an additional 25%.

Summon a Demonic Tyrant to increase the duration of your Dreadstalkers, Vilefiend, Felguard, and up to 10 of your Wild Imps by 15 sec. Your Demonic Tyrant increases the damage of affected demons by 15%, while damaging your target.
When Doom expires, you have a 30% chance to generate a Demonic Core.

Summons a Felguard who attacks the target for 17 sec that deals 125% increased damage.

This Felguard will stun and interrupt their target when summoned.
Summon Demonic Tyrant empowers 5 additional Wild Imps and deals 10% increased damage for each demon he empowers.
Increases the attack speed of your Dreadstalkers by 10% and their critical strike chance by 15%.
Wicked Maw causes the target to take 20% additional Shadow damage from your demons.
Each time Felstorm deals damage, it increases the damage the target takes from you and your pets by 1% for 8 sec, up to 5%.
Damage dealt by Grimoire: Felguard is increased by an additional 10% and you gain a Demonic Core when Grimoire: Felguard ends.
Your Felguard deals 20% additional damage. Soul Strike now deals 25% of its damage to nearby enemies.

Increases all damage done by your pet by 4%.

Reduces the cast time of Shadow Bolt by 25% and increases its damage by 40%.

Hand of Gul'dan has a 15% chance to burn its target for 5,314 additional Shadowflame damage every 2 sec for 6 sec.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Umbral Blaze.
Instantly sacrifice up to 2 Wild Imps, generating 2 charges of Demonic Core that cause Demonbolt to deal 30% additional damage.
When Doom expires, you have a chance to summon a Doomguard that casts 5 Doom Bolts before departing. Each Doom Bolt deals 16,560 Shadow damage.
Increases Vilefiend damage by 20% and your Vilefiend's Bile Spit now applies Wicked Maw.

When Demonbolt consumes a Demonic Core it inflicts impending doom upon the target, dealing 14,872 Shadow damage to enemies within 10 yds of its target after 20 sec or when removed. Damage is reduced beyond 8 targets.

Each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan reduces the duration of Doom by 1 sec.
Critical strikes from your spells and your demons deal 4% increased damage.
Bilescourge Bombers deal 20% increased damage, and your spells now have a chance to summon a Bilescourge Bomber.

Summoning a Wild Imp has a 15% chance to summon a Imp Gang Boss instead. An Imp Gang Boss deals 50% additional damage. 

Implosions from Imp Gang Boss deal 50% increased damage.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Wild Imp's Fel Firebolt by 15%.
Hand of Gul'dan has a 15% chance to cast a second time on your target for free.
You passively summon a Wild Imp to fight for you every 12 sec.
Dreadbite causes the target to take 20% additional Shadowflame damage from your spell and abilities for the next 12 sec.
Increases the damage of Chaos Bolt by 10% and reduces its cast time by 0.5 sec.
Increases the damage of Channel Demonfire by 30% and it deals damage 35% faster.
When Shadowburn fails to kill a target that is at or below 30% health, its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Backdraft increases the damage of your next Chaos Bolt by 5% and increases the critical strike chance of your next Incinerate or Soul Fire by 35%.
Increases the damage of Shadowburn by 20%. The critical strike chance of Shadowburn is increased by an additional 50% when damaging a target that is at or below 30% health.
When your direct damaging abilities deal a critical strike, they have a chance to reset the cooldown of Soul Fire and reduce the cast time of your next Soul Fire by 80%.

Consuming Ritual of Ruin summons an Overfiend for 8 sec.

 Summon Overfiend
Generates 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec and casts Chaos Bolt at 80% effectiveness at its summoner's target.
Periodic damage dealt by Immolate has a 5% chance to tear open a Dimensional Rift.

Rips a hole in time and space, opening a random portal that damages your target:

Shadowy Tear
Deals 45,153 Shadow damage over 14 sec.

Unstable Tear
Deals 38,745 Chaos damage over 6 sec.

Chaos Tear
Fires a Chaos Bolt, dealing 18,068 Chaos damage. This Chaos Bolt always critically strikes and your critical strike chance increases its damage.

Generates 3 Soul Shard Fragments.
Each target affected by Soul Rot increases your haste and critical strike chance by 4.0% for 8 sec.
Malefic Rapture deals an additional 3,095 Shadowflame damage to each target it affects.
Increases the damage of Haunt by 35% and reduces its cast time by 25%. Haunt now applies Shadow Embrace.

The stack count of Agony is increased by 4 when applied by Vile Taint.

Enemies damaged by Phantom Singularity take 10% increased damage from you for its duration.
Unleashes a vile explosion at the target location, dealing 14,336 Shadow damage over 10 sec to 8 enemies within 10 yds and applies Agony and Curse of Exhaustion to them.
Places a phantom singularity above the target, which consumes the life of all enemies within 15 yards, dealing 12,053 damage over 14.5 sec, healing you for 25% of the damage done.

The cast time of Unstable Affliction is reduced by 20%.

Refreshing Unstable Affliction with 8 or less seconds remaining deals 18,602 Shadow damage to its target.
Critical strikes from your Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction have a chance to grant Nightfall.
Bolts from Dimensional Rift now deal 25% of damage dealt to nearby enemies as Fire damage.

Heals the target for 14,529 over 15 sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed for 9,706.

May be active on one target at a time.

Wild Growth, Regrowth, and Efflorescence healing has a chance to cause Symbiotic Blooms to grow on the target, healing for 6,640 over 6 sec.

Multiple instances of these can overlap.
Heals you for 3% of your maximum health every 5 sec. If you are at full health, an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
Your next Regrowth, Rebirth, or Entangling Roots is instant, free, castable in all forms, and heals for an additional 200%.
Clearcast Regrowths heal for an additional 30%.

Damage and healing while in Cat Form increased by 3%.

Moonfire and Sunfire damage increased by 10%.

Attacking from Prowl increases the chance for Shred, Rake, and Swipe to critically strike by 8% for 6 sec.

Casting Regrowth increases the chance for your periodic heals to critically heal by 8% for 10 sec.

Rip and Ferocious Bite damage increased by 5%.

Rejuvenation healing increased by 10%.
Swiftmend heals the target for 8,346 over 9 sec.
The healing bonus to Regrowth from Nature's Swiftness is increased by 35%.
Nature's Swiftness's cooldown is reduced by 12 sec.
For each Rejuvenation you have active, Regrowth's cost is reduced by 8% and critical effect chance is increased by 8%, up to a maximum of 96%.
Protects a friendly target for 30 sec. Any damage taken will consume the ward and heal the target for 39,807 over 8 sec.

When you remove an effect with Soothe or Remove Corruption, gain a combo point and heal for 4% of your maximum health. If you are at full health an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
Enemies pulled into Ursol's Vortex are rooted in place for 3 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

Healing you receive is increased by 4%.

Ysera's Gift now heals every 4 sec and its healing is increased by 8% for each of your active Rejuvenations.
Regrowth's initial heal has a 40% increased chance for a critical effect if the target is already affected by Regrowth.
Increases Omen of Clarity's chance to activate Clearcasting to 5% and Clearcasting can stack 1 additional time.

Cenarion Ward's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec and its duration is increased by 2 sec.

Bloodseeker Vines and Symbiotic Blooms last 2 additional sec.

When a target afflicted by Bloodseeker Vines dies, the vines jump to a valid nearby target for their remaining duration.

Each active Bloodseeker Vine increases the damage your abilities deal by 2%.

Each active Symbiotic Bloom increases the healing of your spells by 2%.

When Bloodseeker Vines expire or you use Ferocious Bite on their target they explode in thorns, dealing 637 physical damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced above 5 targets.

When Symbiotic Blooms expire or you cast Rejuvenation on their target flowers grow around their target, healing them and up to 3 nearby allies for 1,092.

Your Swiftmend causes a Symbiotic Bloom to grow on the target for 6 sec.
Grows a healing blossom at the target location, restoring 1,266 health to three injured allies within 10 yards every 1.8 sec for 30 sec. Limit 1.

Heals all allies within 40 yards for 73,815 over 4.5 sec. Each heal heals the target for another 437 over 8 sec, stacking.

Healing decreased beyond 5 targets.

Symbiotic Blooms increase the healing your spells do to affected targets by 20%.
