The cooldown of Swiftmend is reduced by up to 40%, based on the current health of the target. Cooldown is reduced more when cast on a lower health target.
Heals a friendly target for 24,843.  Receives 300% bonus from Mastery: Harmony.

Summons a Treant which will immediately cast Swiftmend on your current target, healing for 7,543.  The Treant will cast Nourish on that target or a nearby ally periodically, healing for 2,163. Lasts 15 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by 30 sec.

Ironbark's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.
Your Grove Guardians cast Moonfire on nearby targets about once every 6 sec.
Your maximum mana is increased by 5%.
Your Regrowth protects you, reducing damage you take by 8% while your Regrowth is on you.
When Lifebloom blooms, up to 3 targets within your Efflorescence are healed for 4,303.
Regrowth's healing over time is increased by 50%, and it also applies to the target of your Lifebloom.
Rejuvenation healing is increased by up to 15%, and Tranquility healing is increased by up to 15%, healing for more on low-health targets.

Nourish

Grove Guardians
Treants from Grove Guardians also cast Wild Growth immediately when summoned, healing 5 allies within 40 yds for 2,095 over 7 sec.
Lifebloom counts for 3 stacks of Mastery: Harmony.
Wild Growth's healing falls off 15% less over time.

Your Grove Guardians increase the healing of your Rejuvenation, Efflorescence, and Lifebloom by 10% while active.
Your Grove Guardians' Nourish and Swiftmend spells also apply a Minor Cenarion Ward that heals the target for 11,997 over 8 sec the next time they take damage.
Casting Swiftmend increases your Haste by 10% for 6 sec.

Wrath and Starfire damage increased by 10%. 

Regrowth, Wild Growth, and Swiftmend healing increased by 9%.

Orbital Strike applies Stellar Flare for 8 additional sec and deals 30% increased damage.

Whirling Stars reduces the cooldown of Celestial Alignment by an additional 10 sec.
Each target healed by Efflorescence is healed for an additional 896 over 6 sec.
Apply Lifebloom, Rejuvenation, Wild Growth, and Regrowth's heal over time effect to an ally.

Shapeshift into the Tree of Life, increasing healing done by 10%, increasing armor by 120%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects. Functionality of Rejuvenation, Wild Growth, Regrowth, Entangling Roots, and Wrath is enhanced.

Lasts 30 sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this form for its duration.

Call upon the spirits for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 16 Druid spells and abilities over 4 sec.

You will cast Wild Growth, Swiftmend, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.

 Heart of the Wild
Abilities not associated with your specialization are substantially empowered for 45 sec.

Balance: Cast time of Balance spells reduced by 30% and damage increased by 20%.

Feral: Gain 1 Combo Point every 2 sec while in Cat Form and Physical damage increased by 20%.

Guardian: Bear Form gives an additional 20% Stamina, multiple uses of Ironfur may overlap, and Frenzied Regeneration has 2 charges.

Restoration: Healing increased by 30%, and mana costs reduced by 50%.
Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 8 sec.
Your Grove Guardians' healing is increased by 30%.
Grove Guardians cooldown reduced by 3 sec.
Healing spells cast with Dream Surge generate an additional Dream Petal.

Time elapsed while your major abilities are available to be used or at maximum charges is subtracted from that ability's cooldown after the next time you use it, up to 15 seconds.

Affects Force of Nature, Celestial Alignment, and Convoke the Spirits.

Every 5 Regrowths you cast makes your next Wrath, Starfire, or Entangling Roots instant and increases damage it deals by 100%.

Every 5 Starsurges you cast makes your next Regrowth or Entangling roots instant.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage 25% faster, and your healing over time effects heal 5% faster.

Wrath, Starfire, and Starsurge deal 30% additional damage and generate 1,750 Mana.

Bear Form
Ironfur grants 30% additional armor and generates 2,500 Mana.

 Cat Form
Rip, Ferocious Bite, and Maim deal 60% additional damage and generate 10,000 Mana when cast with 5 combo points.
Wild Growth momentarily shifts your mind into the Emerald Dream, instantly healing all allies affected by your Rejuvenation or Regrowth for 3,922.
Refreshes the duration of your active Lifebloom and Rejuvenation effects on the target and causes them to complete 200% faster.

Incarnation: Tree of Life
During Incarnation: Tree of Life, you summon a Grove Guardian every 10 sec. The cooldown of Incarnation: Tree of Life is reduced by 5.0 sec when Grove Guardians fade.

 Convoke the Spirits
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
Lifebloom's healing is increased by 3.0% each time it heals, up to 45%. Also increases Lifebloom's final bloom amount by 7%.

Wrath and Shred transfer 100% of their damage and Starfire and Swipe transfer 50% of their damage into healing onto a nearby ally. 

This effect is increased by 200% while Heart of the Wild is active.

Each of your Grove Guardians increases your healing done by 5% while active.

While your Lifebloom is on yourself, your periodic heals heal 10% faster.

While your Lifebloom is on an ally, your periodic heals on them have a 4% chance to cause it to bloom.

Extends the duration of all of your heal over time effects on friendly targets within 60 yards by 6 sec, and increases the rate of your heal over time effects by 25% for 8 sec.

Affected allies are healed for 77,476, split evenly among them.

Every 4 casts of Swiftmend grants you Incarnation: Tree of Life for 10 sec.
You can apply Rejuvenation twice to the same target. Rejuvenation's duration is increased by 2 sec.

Finishing move that slashes through your target in a wide arc, dealing Physical damage per combo point to your target and consuming up to 25 additional Energy to increase that damage by up to 100%. Hits all other enemies in front of you for reduced damage per combo point spent. 

1 point: 255 damage, 101 in an arc
2 points: 519 damage, 197 in an arc
3 points: 784 damage, 296 in an arc
4 points: 1,031 damage, 390 in an arc
5 points: 1,304 damage, 500 in an arc

Tiger's Fury causes your next 3 finishing moves to restore 1 combo point.

Tiger's Fury also increases the periodic damage of your bleeds by an additional 10% for their full duration.
Reduces the cooldown of Berserk by 60 sec.
Omen of Clarity now triggers 30% more often, can accumulate up to 2 charges, and increases the damage of your next Shred, Thrash, or Swipe by an additional 15%.
During Berserk your combo point-generating abilities bleed the target for an additional 150% of their direct damage over 8 sec.
Swipe and Thrash damage is increased by 40%.

Strikes all nearby enemies with a massive slash, inflicting 1,134 Physical damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Awards 1 combo point.

Your maximum Energy and Rage are increased by 20.

Frenzied Regeneration also increases your maximum health by 10%.

Ravage also inflicts a Bleed that causes 242 damage over 6 sec and saps its victims' strength, reducing damage they deal to you by 10%.

Dreadful Wound is not affected by Circle of Life and Death.
Maul and Raze damage increased by 20%.
Tiger's Fury's damage bonus is increased by 6%.
Finishing moves have a 3% chance per combo point spent to grant 10% Haste for 6 sec.
When you spend extra Energy on Ferocious Bite, the extra damage is increased by 40%.

Ironfur and Frenzied Regeneration persist in Cat Form.

When transforming from Bear to Cat Form, you retain 80% of your Bear Form armor and health for 6 sec.

For 6 sec after entering Bear Form, you heal for 10% of damage taken over 8 sec.
Ravage increases your auto-attack speed by 35% for 6 sec.

Ravage increases your Agility by 8% and the armor granted by Ironfur by 20% for 8 sec.

Your first Mangle after entering combat makes your next Maul become Ravage.
Stampeding Roar's duration is increased by 25%.
Ferocious Bite and Rip deal 15% increased damage.
When you use 3 different combo point-generating abilities within 4 sec, the damage of your next 3 Rips or Ferocious Bites is increased by 25% for their full duration.

Command a swarm that heals 9,630 or deals 16,143 Nature damage over 12 sec to a target, and increases the effectiveness of your periodic effects on them by 25%.

Upon expiration, finds a new target, preferring to alternate between friend and foe up to 3 times.

An improved Cat Form that grants all of your known Berserk effects and lasts 20 sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this improved Cat Form for its duration. During Incarnation:

Energy cost of all Cat Form abilities is reduced by 25%, and Prowl can be used once while in combat.

Call upon the spirits for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 16 Druid spells and abilities over 4 sec.

You will cast Wild Growth, Swiftmend, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.
Your finishing moves grant 2 Energy per combo point spent and deal 5% increased damage.
Rip, Rake, and Thrash last 25% longer.
Applying Rip to a target also applies a Tear that deals 15% of the new Rip's damage over 8 sec.

Frenzied Regeneration can be cast in Cat Form for 40 Energy.

Bear Form reduces magic damage you take by 4%.

Shred and Swipe damage increased by 6%. Mangle damage increased by 25%.

Mangle grants Feline Potential. When you have 6 stacks, the next time you transform into Cat Form, gain 5 combo points and your next Ferocious Bite or Rip deals 200% increased damage for its full duration.
Every attack with an Energy cost that you cast extends the duration of your Dreadful Wounds by 0.6 sec, up to 8 additional sec.
Shred, Swipe, and Mangle's critical strike chance and critical strike damage are increased by 15%.
The cooldown of Pulverize is reduced by 10 sec.

Unleash a furious frenzy, clawing your target 5 times for 368 Physical damage and an additional 2,420 Bleed damage over 6 sec.

Awards 5 combo points.
Adaptive Swarm has a 60% chance to split into two Swarms each time it jumps.

Incarnation: Avatar of Ashamane
During Incarnation: Avatar of Ashamane and for 40 sec after it ends, your Rip and Rake each cause affected enemies to take 3% increased damage from your abilities.

 Convoke the Spirits
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage in 20% less time, and your healing over time effects in 15% less time.
Rip damage has a 6.0% chance to make your next Ferocious Bite free and deal the maximum damage.
During Berserk, Shred, Swipe, and Thrash have a 25% chance to make your next Ferocious Bite become Ravage.

Arcane Blast has a 10% chance to generate an additional Arcane Charge. If you were to gain an Arcane Charge while at maximum charges instead gain 10% Arcane damage for 10 sec.

Applies Touch of the Magi to your current target, accumulating 20% of the damage you deal to the target for 12 sec, and then exploding for that amount of Arcane damage to the target and reduced damage to all nearby enemies.

Generates 4 Arcane Charges.
Spells empowered by Nether Precision cause their target to suffer an additional 8% of the damage dealt over 6 sec.

Every 6 times you cast Arcane Blast or Arcane Barrage, conjure a Spellfire Sphere.

While you're out of combat, you will slowly conjure Spellfire Spheres over time.

 Spellfire Sphere
Increases your spell damage by 1%. Stacks up to 3 times.
Reduces Arcane Blast's mana cost by 5% and increases its damage by 8%.
Clearcasting has a 5% increased chance to proc.

Increases your mana regeneration by 1,500% for 2.7 sec and grants Clearcasting.

While channeling Evocation, your Intellect is increased by 2% every 0.5 sec. Lasts 20 sec.
Your Touch of the Magi now accumulates 25% of the damage you deal.
When a spell consumes Clearcasting, its damage is increased by 10%.

Damage from Dematerialize has a small chance to summon an Arcane Explosion at its target's location at 50% effectiveness.

Arcane Explosions summoned from Energy Reconstitution do not generate Arcane Charges.

Each time you cast Arcane Explosion, its damage increases by 25%.

Bonus resets after reaching 100% damage.
Casting Arcane Blast or Arcane Barrage grants you 0.5% Haste for 10 sec. Stacks up to 10 times. Multiple instances may overlap.

When you cast Arcane Surge, summon an Arcane Phoenix to aid you in battle.

  Arcane Phoenix
Your Arcane Phoenix aids you for the duration of your Arcane Surge, casting random Arcane and Fire spells.
Conjuring a Spellfire Sphere increases the damage of your next Arcane Blast by 20% or Arcane Barrage by 20%.
Damaging a target with Arcane Missiles increases the damage they take from Arcane Missiles, Arcane Barrage, and Arcane Blast by 0.5% for 6 sec. Multiple instances may overlap.
Direct damage you deal to enemies affected by Touch of the Magi, causes an explosion that deals 741 Arcane damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Arcane Charges further increase Mastery effectiveness of Arcane Blast and Arcane Barrage by 20%.
Your Prismatic Barrier now grants 5% avoidance while active and 3% leech for 5 sec when it breaks or expires.
Your Arcane Phoenix will Spellsteal when it is summoned and when it expires.

Your Supernova becomes Gravity Lapse.

Gravity Lapse
The snap of your fingers warps the gravity around your target and 4 other nearby enemies, suspending them in the air for 3 sec.
Upon landing, nearby enemies take 3,281 Arcane damage.
Consuming Burden of Power causes your next Arcane Barrage to deal 20% increased damage, grant 4 Arcane Charges, and call down a storm of 4 Meteorites at your target.

Arcane Debilitation's duration is increased by 2 sec.

When you apply a stack of Arcane Debilitation, you have a 25% chance to apply another stack of Arcane Debilitation.

This effect can trigger off of itself.

Every 3 times you consume Clearcasting, gain Aether Attunement.

Aether Attunement:
Your next Arcane Missiles deals 100% increased damage to your primary target and fires at up to 4 nearby enemies dealing 50% increased damage.

Arcane damage dealt is increased based on your current mana, up to 6% at full mana.

Mana Regen is increased based on your current mana, up to 20% when out of mana.
Arcane Barrage deals an additional 100% damage against targets below 35% health.
Nether Precision damage bonus increased by 10%.
When Arcane Barrage hits more than 2 targets, it explodes for 2,767 additional Arcane damage to all enemies within 10 yds of the primary target.
When you cast Arcane Surge, its duration is extended by 0.5 sec for each Spellfire Sphere you have, up to 2.5 sec.

Arcane Bombardment damage bonus increased to 130%.

 Arcane Bombardment
Arcane Barrage deals an additional 100% damage against targets below 35% health.

Upon consuming a Spellfire Sphere, your Arcane Phoenix will grant you Lingering Embers.

 Lingering Embers
Increases your spell damage by 1%.
Spellfire Spheres can now stack up to 5 times.

Generating a Spellfire Sphere while your Phoenix is active causes it to cast an exceptional spell.

Mana Cascade can now stack up to 15 times.

Damage from Arcane Missiles has a 10% chance to grant you 1 Arcane Charge.

Chance is increased by 15% every time your Arcane Missiles fails to grant you an Arcane Charge.
Each time Arcane Missiles hits an enemy, the damage of your next Arcane Barrage is increased by 5%. This effect stacks up to 20 times.

Your Touch of the Magi now also conjures a spark, causing the damage from your next Arcane Barrage, Arcane Blast, and Arcane Missiles to echo for 100% of their damage.

Upon receiving damage from all three spells, the spark explodes, dealing 24,672 Arcane damage to all nearby enemies.
When your Touch of the Magi detonates, it increases the damage all affected targets take from you by 8% for 12 sec.
Arcane Barrage has a 10% chance per Arcane Charge consumed to launch an Arcane Orb in front of you at 100% effectiveness.

Consuming Clearcasting has a 40% chance to make your next Arcane Blast echo, repeating its damage at 70% effectiveness to the primary target and up to 4 nearby enemies.

Casting Touch of the Magi grants Leydrinker.

While under the effects of a casted Arcane Surge, you gain twice as many stacks of Mana Cascade.

When your Arcane Phoenix expires, it empowers you, granting Arcane Soul for 2 sec, plus an additional 1.0 sec for each exceptional spell it had cast.

Arcane Soul:

Each cast of Arcane Barrage increases the damage of Arcane Barrage by 15%.

Causes a whirl of icy wind around the enemy, dealing 8,592 Frost damage to the target and all other enemies within 8 yds, freezing them in place for 2 sec. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.
Greatly increases the effect of Blast Wave's knockback. Blast Wave's cooldown is reduced by 5 sec
Whenever one of your Barriers is removed, reduce its cooldown by 4 sec.

You and your allies within 40 yards instantly become invisible for 12 sec. Taking any action will cancel the effect.

Does not affect allies in combat.
Cast Prismatic Barrier on yourself and 4 allies within 40 yds.
Your barrier's cooldown recharges 30% faster while the shield persists.
At any moment, you have a chance to gain Arcane Surge for 4 sec, Clearcasting, or Time Warp for 6 sec.
Arcane Intellect grants you an additional 3% Intellect.
Teleports you back to where you last Blinked and heals you for 39,468 health. Only usable within 8 sec of Blinking.
The cooldowns of Blink and Shimmer are reduced by 2 sec.
Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.
Increases your movement speed by 10% for 3 sec after casting Blink and 20% for 6 sec after returning from Alter Time.

When your barrier receives melee attacks, you have a 10% chance to be granted Clearcasting. 

Casting your barrier removes all snare effects.
Your Barriers heal you for 20% of the damage absorbed.

Reduces the cooldown of Alter Time by 10 sec. 

Alter Time resets the cooldown of Blink and Shimmer when you return to your original location.
Causes an explosion around yourself, dealing 3,356 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yds, knocking them back, and reducing movement speed by 70% for 6 sec.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Counterspell reduces its cooldown by 4 sec.
Teleports you 20 yds forward, unless something is in the way. Unaffected by the global cooldown and castable while casting.
Makes your next Mage spell with a cast time shorter than 10 sec castable while moving. Unaffected by the global cooldown and castable while casting.

Transforms all enemies within 10 yards into sheep, wandering around incapacitated for 15 sec. While affected, the victims cannot take actions but will regenerate health very quickly. Damage will cancel the effect.

Only works on Beasts, Humanoids and Critters.
While inside Ice Block, you heal for 25% of your maximum health over the duration.
Frost Nova duration is increased by 2 sec.
Frost Nova can withstand 80% more damage before breaking.
Gain a shield that absorbs 3% of your maximum health for 15 sec after you Blink.
Invisibility increases your movement speed by 40% for 6 sec.

Draw power from within, dealing 15,467 Arcane damage over 3.6 sec to enemies within 18 yds. 

While channeling, your Mage ability cooldowns are reduced by 12 sec over 3.6 sec.
Alters the fabric of time, returning you to your current location and health when cast a second time, or after 10 sec. Effect negated by long distance or death.
Removes all Curses from a friendly target.

Shields you with ice, absorbing 47,361 damage for 1 min.

Melee attacks against you reduce the attacker's movement speed by 50%.
Magical energy flows through you while in combat, building up to 10% increased damage and then diminishing down to 2% increased damage, cycling every 10 sec.

Shields you in flame, absorbing 39,468 damage for 1 min.

Melee attacks against you cause the attacker to take 882 Fire damage.

Your spell critical strike damage is increased by 10%. When your direct damage spells fail to critically strike a target, your spell critical strike chance is increased by 2%, up to 10% for 8 sec. 

When your spells critically strike Overflowing Energy is reset.

Shields you with an arcane force, absorbing 39,468 damage and reducing magic damage taken by 25% for 1 min.

The duration of harmful Magic effects against you is reduced by 40%.

Encases you in a block of ice, protecting you from all attacks and damage for 10 sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move, or cast spells.

Causes Hypothermia, preventing you from recasting Ice Block for 30 sec.
The cooldown of Ice Block is reduced by 30 sec.

Creates 3 copies of you nearby for 40 sec, which cast spells and attack your enemies.

While your images are active damage taken is reduced by 20%. Taking direct damage will cause one of your images to dissipate.
Mirror Image's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec whenever a Mirror Image dissipates due to direct damage.
You are healed for 3% of your maximum health whenever a Mirror Image dissipates due to direct damage.
All of your snare effects reduce the target's movement speed by an additional 5%.
Casting Clearcasting Arcane Missiles reduces the cooldown of your loss of control abilities by 2 sec.
Frozen Orb makes Blizzard instant cast and increases its damage done by 60% for 12 sec.
While Icy Veins is active, your Frostbolts hit up to 2 additional targets and their damage is increased by 15%.
Each time you consume Fingers of Frost the damage of your next Ray of Frost is increased by 5%, stacking up to 50%. Icy Veins grants 10 stacks instantly.

Channel an icy beam at the enemy for 4.5 sec, dealing 16,679 Frost damage every 0.9 sec and slowing movement by 60%. Each time Ray of Frost deals damage, its damage and snare increases by 10%.

Generates 2 charges of Fingers of Frost over its duration.

Icy Veins' duration is increased by 5 sec.

Your Ice Lances against frozen targets extend your Icy Veins by an additional 0.5 sec.
Casting 30 Frostbolts or Flurries calls down a Frozen Orb toward your target. Hitting an enemy player counts as double.
While Icy Veins is active, each Frostbolt you cast reduces the cast time of Frostbolt by 4% and increases its damage by 4%, stacking up to 5 times.

Conjures a massive spike of ice, and merges your current Icicles into it. It impales your target, dealing 40,205 damage plus all of the damage stored in your Icicles, and freezes the target in place for 4 sec. Damage may interrupt the freeze effect.

Requires 5 Icicles to cast.

Passive: Ice Lance no longer launches Icicles.
Casting Ice Lance on Frozen targets has a 100% chance to generate an Icicle.
Your Frostbolt deals 10% additional damage to Frozen targets.
Your Frost spells deal 5% more damage to targets that are rooted and frozen.
Your Ice Lances against frozen targets increase the damage of your Ice Lances by 2% for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Frostbolt and Flurry have a 15% chance to generate 2 Icicles.

Your Ice Lance and Icicles now deal 5% increased damage, and hit a second nearby target for 90% of their damage.

Your Glacial Spike also hits a second nearby target for 100% of its damage.

Frostbolt has a 15% chance and Frozen Orb damage has a 5% to grant a charge of Fingers of Frost.

Fingers of Frost causes your next Ice Lance to deal damage as if the target were frozen.

Maximum 2 charges.
Multiplies the critical strike chance of your spells against frozen targets by 1.5, and adds an additional 50% critical strike chance.
Frostbolt and Icicle critical strike damage increased by 20%.
Whenever you attempt to chill a target, you gain Bone Chilling, increasing spell damage you deal by 0.5% for 8 sec, stacking up to 10 times.
Each of your Icicles deals 10% additional damage, and when an Icicle deals damage you have a 5% chance to gain the Fingers of Frost effect.
Frozen Orb increases Ice Lance's damage by 15% for 15 sec.
Each time Blizzard deals damage, the cooldown of Frozen Orb is reduced by 0.5 sec.

Accelerates your spellcasting for 25 sec, granting 20% haste and preventing damage from delaying your spellcasts.

Activating Icy Veins summons a water elemental to your side for its duration. The water elemental's abilities grant you Frigid Empowerment, increasing the Frost damage you deal by 3%, up to 15%.
Damage from Frostbolt and Flurry increases the damage of your Icicles and Glacial Spike by 2%. Stacks up to 2 times.
Frostbolt, Ice Lance, and Flurry deal 15% increased damage.

Your Haste is increased by 8%.

You gain 10% more of the Haste stat from all sources.

Quickly fling a shard of ice at the target, dealing 4,534 Frost damage.

Ice Lance damage is tripled against frozen targets.

Launches an orb of swirling ice up to 40 yds forward which deals up to 16,441 Frost damage to all enemies it passes through over 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets. Grants 1 charge of Fingers of Frost when it first damages an enemy.

Enemies damaged by the Frozen Orb are slowed by 30% for 3 sec.

Unleash a flurry of ice, striking the target 3 times for a total of 11,030 Frost damage. Each hit reduces the target's movement speed by 70% for 1 sec and applies Winter's Chill to the target.

Winter's Chill causes the target to take damage from your spells as if it were frozen.
Frostbolt has a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Flurry and cause your next Flurry to deal 50% increased damage.
Frostbolt grants you Fingers of Frost 25% more often and Brain Freeze 20% more often.
Calls down a series of 7 icy comets on and around the target, that deals up to 23,867 Frost damage to all enemies within 6 yds of its impacts.

Your Comet Storm now applies Numbing Blast, increasing the damage enemies take from you by 6% for 6 sec.

Additionally, Flurry has a 25% chance each hit to call down an icy comet, crashing into your target and nearby enemies for 2,065 Frost damage.
Frozen Orb deals 15% increased damage to units affected by your Blizzard.

Cone of Cold's cooldown is increased to 45 sec and if Cone of Cold hits 3 or more enemies it resets the cooldown of Frozen Orb and Comet Storm. In addition, Cone of Cold applies Winter's Chill to all enemies hit.

Cone of Cold's cooldown can no longer be reduced by your cooldown reduction effects.
Gives your Chill effects a 10% chance to freeze the target for 4 sec.
Frozen Orb deals an additional 30% damage and its duration is increased by 2 sec.

Makes you invisible and untargetable for 20 sec, removing all threat. Any action taken cancels this effect.

You take 60% reduced damage while invisible and for 3 sec after reappearing.

Your Frost and Fire spells have a chance to activate Frostfire Empowerment, causing your next Frostfire Bolt to be instant cast, deal 60% increased damage, explode for 80% of its damage to nearby enemies.

Your Frost and Fire spells have a chance to trigger an additional bolt of Frostfire, dealing 3,765 damage.

This effect generates Frostfire Mastery when activated.

Frostfire Empowerment grants you maximum benefit of Frostfire Mastery, refreshes its duration, and grants you Excess Frost and Excess Fire.

Casting Combustion or Icy Veins grants you Frostfire Empowerment.

Your damaging Fire spells generate 1 stack of Fire Mastery and Frost spells generate 1 stack of Frost Mastery.

Fire Mastery increases your haste by 2%, and Frost Mastery increases your Mastery by 2% for 14 sec, stacking up to 6 times each.

Adding stacks does not refresh duration.

Casting Comet Storm causes your next  to explode in a Frostfire Burst, dealing 16,423 Frostfire damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

Frostfire Burst .

Comet Storm now also calls down a Meteor at 150% effectiveness onto your target's location.

Meteor now also calls down a Comet Storm at 300% effectiveness onto your target location.

Consuming Excess Fire causes your next  to also cast Ice Nova at 150% effectiveness. Ice Novas cast this way do not freeze enemies in place.

When you consume Excess Frost, the cooldown of  is reduced by 3 sec.
Casting damaging Frost or Fire spells has a high chance to increase the damage of your next Frostfire Bolt by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.
Frostfire Bolt's cast time is reduced by 10%.

Launches a bolt of frostfire at the enemy, causing 7,952 Frostfire damage, slowing movement speed by 50%, and causing an additional 3,150 Frostfire damage over 8 sec.

Frostfire Bolt generates stacks for both Fire Mastery and Frost Mastery.

You melt slightly out of your Ice Block and Ice Cold, allowing you to move slowly during Ice Block and increasing your movement speed over time.

Ice Block and Ice Cold trigger a Blazing Barrier when they end.

Over its duration, your Arcane Phoenix will consume each of your Spellfire Spheres to cast an exceptional spell.

Upon consuming a Spellfire Sphere, your Arcane Phoenix will grant you Lingering Embers.

 Lingering Embers
Increases your spell damage by 1%.
Conjuring a Spellfire Sphere increases the damage of your next Arcane Blast by 20% or Arcane Barrage by 20%.
Consuming Burden of Power causes your next Arcane Barrage to deal 20% increased damage, grant 4 Arcane Charges, and call down a storm of 4 Meteorites at your target.

While under the effects of a casted Arcane Surge, you gain twice as many stacks of Mana Cascade.

When your Arcane Phoenix expires, it empowers you, granting Arcane Soul for 2 sec, plus an additional 1.0 sec for each exceptional spell it had cast.

Arcane Soul:
Arcane Barrage grants Clearcasting and generates 4 Arcane Charges.

Each cast of Arcane Barrage increases the damage of Arcane Barrage by 15%.

Every 6 times you cast Arcane Blast or Arcane Barrage, conjure a Spellfire Sphere.

While you're out of combat, you will slowly conjure Spellfire Spheres over time.

 Spellfire Sphere
Increases your spell damage by 1%. Stacks up to 3 times.
Spellfire Spheres can now stack up to 5 times.

Generating a Spellfire Sphere while your Phoenix is active causes it to cast an exceptional spell.

Mana Cascade can now stack up to 15 times.
Your Prismatic Barrier now grants 5% avoidance while active and 3% leech for 5 sec when it breaks or expires.
When you cast Arcane Surge, its duration is extended by 0.5 sec for each Spellfire Sphere you have, up to 2.5 sec.

Arcane Bombardment damage bonus increased to 130%.

 Arcane Bombardment
Arcane Barrage deals an additional 100% damage against targets below 35% health.
Your Arcane Phoenix will Spellsteal when it is summoned and when it expires.

Your Supernova becomes Gravity Lapse.

Gravity Lapse
The snap of your fingers warps the gravity around your target and 4 other nearby enemies, suspending them in the air for 3 sec.
Upon landing, nearby enemies take 3,281 Arcane damage.

When you cast Arcane Surge, summon an Arcane Phoenix to aid you in battle.

  Arcane Phoenix
Your Arcane Phoenix aids you for the duration of your Arcane Surge, casting random Arcane and Fire spells.
Casting Arcane Blast or Arcane Barrage grants you 0.5% Haste for 10 sec. Stacks up to 10 times. Multiple instances may overlap.

Whenever you have 8 or more active Embedded Arcane Splinters, you automatically cast a Splinterstorm at your target.

Splinterstorm:
Shatter all Embedded Arcane Splinters, dealing their remaining periodic damage instantly.

Conjure an Arcane Splinter for each Splinter shattered, then unleash them all in a devastating barrage, dealing 2,117 Arcane damage to your target for each Splinter in the Splinterstorm.

Splinterstorm has a 5% chance to grant Clearcasting.
Direct damage from Arcane Splinters has a 2.0% chance to launch an Arcane Orb at 50% effectiveness and increase all damage dealt by Arcane Orb by 10% for 10 sec.

Gain 2% increased critical strike chance.
Gain 5% increased critical strike damage.
Shifting Power fires a barrage of 8 Arcane Splinters at random enemies within 40 yds over its duration.
When your Magi's Spark explodes, you conjure 6 Arcane Splinters.
Whenever an Embedded Arcane Splinter is removed, it explodes, dealing 612 Arcane damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Each time you conjure an Arcane Splinter, increase the damage of your next Supernova by 20%.

Stacks up to 30 times.
You have 40% increased movement speed during Alter Time.
Displacement has a 50% longer duration and 25% longer range.

Your Prismatic Barrier can absorb up to 50% more damage based on your missing Health.

Max effectiveness when under 50% health.

Your Mirror Image summons one extra clone.
Mirror Image now reduces all damage taken by an additional 5%.

Enemies damaged by your Arcane Orb conjure 2 Arcane Splinters, up to 4.

Arcane Orb damage is increased by 10%.

Casting Arcane Surge conjures 8 Arcane Splinters.

During Arcane Surge, whenever you conjure an Arcane Splinter, you have a 100% chance to conjure an additional Arcane Splinter.
For 8 seconds after being struck by an Arcane Orb, 20% of the direct damage dealt by an Arcane Splinter is also dealt to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

When you consume Nether Precision, conjure 2 Arcane Splinters.

Arcane Splinter:
Conjure raw Arcane magic into a sharp projectile that deals 2,117 Arcane damage.

Arcane Splinters embed themselves into their target, dealing 2,117 Arcane damage over 18 sec. This effect stacks.

Scorches an enemy for 1,857 Fire damage.

When cast on a target below 30% health, Scorch is a guaranteed critical strike and increases your movement speed by 30% for 3 sec.

Castable while moving.
Flamestrike and Living Bomb apply Mastery: Ignite at 100% increased effectiveness.

Blasts the enemy for 8,157 Fire damage. 

Fire: Castable while casting other spells. Always deals a critical strike.
Phoenix Flames deals 15% increased damage and always critically strikes.

When a Living Bomb expires, if it did not spread to another target, it reapplies itself at 100% effectiveness.

A Living Bomb can only benefit from this effect once.
Casting Combustion grants Lit Fuse and Living Bomb's damage is increased by 30% while under the effects of Combustion.

Consuming Hot Streak has a 6% chance to grant you Lit Fuse.

 Lit Fuse:
Your next Fire Blast turns up to 1 nearby target into a Living Bomb that explodes after 1.8 sec, dealing 1,683 Fire damage to the target and reduced damage to all other enemies within 10 yds.

Up to 3 enemies hit by this explosion also become a Living Bomb, but this effect cannot spread further.
Engulfs you in flames for 10 sec, increasing your spells' critical strike chance by 100%. Castable while casting other spells.
Damaging an enemy with 15 Fireballs or Pyroblasts causes your next Fireball or Pyroblast to call down a Meteor on your target.
Each time your Fireball fails to critically strike a target, it gains a stacking 20% increased critical strike chance. Effect ends when Fireball critically strikes.
Hurls an immense fiery boulder that causes 14,662 Fire damage.
Phoenix Flames damage increased by 15% and your direct-damage spells reduce the cooldown of Phoenix Flames by 1 sec.
Meteor now turns 1 target hit into a Living Bomb. Additionally, its cooldown is reduced by 10 sec.
Your critical strike damage is increased by 3%. When you activate Combustion, you gain 2% additional critical strike damage, and up to 4 nearby allies gain 1% critical strike for 10 sec.
Damaging a target with Pyroblast or Fireball increases the damage it receives from Ignite by 0.5%. Stacks up to 50 times.
While Combustion is active, your Fire Blast and Phoenix Flames recharge 50% faster.

When you're not under the effect of Combustion, your critical strike chance is increased by 2.5%.

While you're under the effect of Combustion, your critical strike damage is increased by 2.5%.
Ignite deals 15% more damage and Fireball deals 15% more damage while Combustion is not active. Fire Blast spreads Ignite to 2 additional nearby targets during Combustion.
Combustion grants mastery equal to 75% of your Critical Strike stat and lasts 2 sec longer.
Casting Combustion refreshes up to 3 charges of Fire Blast and up to 3 charges of Phoenix Flames.

Casting Phoenix Flames causes your next Flamestrike to have its critical strike chance increased by 20% and critical strike damage increased by 20%.

Stacks up to 3 times.
Increases the maximum number of Fire Blast charges by 2.
Casting Scorch on targets below 30% health increase the target's damage taken from you by 7% for 12 sec. This effect stacks up to 2 times.
Scorch deals 300% increased damage to targets below 30% health.
Hurls a Phoenix that deals 4,839 Fire damage to the target and reduced damage to other nearby enemies.

Your chance of gaining Lit Fuse when consuming Hot Streak is increased by 4%.

Living Bomb damage increased by 50%.
Fire Blast and Phoenix Flames increase your mastery by 4% for 5 sec. This effect stacks up to 3 times.
Damage dealt to targets below 35% health is increased by 7%.

Calls down a meteor which lands at the target location after 3 sec, dealing 22,758 Fire damage to all enemies hit reduced beyond 8 targets, and burns the ground, dealing 4,233 Fire damage over 8.5 sec to all enemies in the area.
While Ignite is on 3 or fewer enemies it flares up dealing an additional 20% of its damage to affected targets.
Each consecutive critical strike you deal increases critical strike damage you deal by 1%, up to 4% for 6 sec.

Casting Pyroblast or Flamestrike while Hot Streak is active has an 6% chance to repeat the spell cast at 50% effectiveness.

This effect counts as consuming Hot Streak.
Flamestrike leaves behind a patch of flames that burns enemies within it for 2,320 Fire damage over 8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Lit Fuse now turns up to 3 targets into Living Bombs.

Living Bombs can now spread to 5 enemies.
Pyroblast and Flamestrike's cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec and their damage dealt is increased by 5%.

Your Fireball, Pyroblast, Fire Blast, Scorch and Phoenix Flames critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown on Combustion by 1.0 sec.

Flamestrike critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown of Combustion by 0.2 sec for each critical strike, up to 1 sec.
After consuming 10 Hot Streaks, your next non-instant Pyroblast or Flamestrike cast within 30 sec grants you Combustion for 6 sec and deals 260% additional damage.

While Combustion is active your Fireball, Pyroblast, Fire Blast, Scorch, and Phoenix Flames deal 70% increased damage and reduce the cooldown of Combustion by 1.25 sec.

While Combustion is active, Flamestrike deals 35% increased damage and reduces the cooldown of Combustion by 0.25 sec for each critical strike, up to 1.25 sec.
Fire Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 sec.

Your spells have a 5% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain 10% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.
While Icy Veins is active, damaging an enemy with Frostbolt increases spell damage by 1%. Stacks up to 15 times.
Enemies in a cone in front of you take 4,060 Fire damage and are disoriented for 4 sec. Damage will cancel the effect.
Pulses arcane energy around the target enemy or ally, dealing 2,529 Arcane damage to all enemies within 8 yds, and knocking them upward. A primary enemy target will take 100% increased damage.
While Combustion is not active, consuming Hot Streak has a low chance to cause all Pyroblasts and Flamestrikes to have no cast time and be guaranteed critical strikes for 5 sec.

When your direct damage spells hit an enemy 25 times, gain 1 stack of Born of Flame. 

 Born of Flame
Phoenix Flames refunds a charge on use and its damage is increased by 200%.
If Phoenix Flames only hits 1 target, it deals 50% increased damage and applies Ignite at 150% effectiveness.
Dragon's Breath always critically strikes, deals 50% increased critical strike damage, and contributes to Hot Streak.

Scorch damage increased by 10%.

Damage from Ignite has a 5% chance to make your next Scorch deal damage as though your target was below 30% health.
Living Bomb explosions have a small chance to increase the damage of your next Pyroblast by 15% or Flamestrike by 15%.
Every 12 seconds, your next non-instant Fireball, Flamestrike, or Pyroblast has a 40% reduced cast time.
Hot Streak increases the amount of Ignite damage from Pyroblast or Flamestrike by an additional 10%.
Your Fireball and Pyroblast spells always deal a critical strike when the target is above 90% health.

Your Touch of the Magi now also conjures a spark, causing the damage from your next Arcane Barrage, Arcane Blast, and Arcane Missiles to echo for 100% of their damage.

Upon receiving damage from all three spells, the spark explodes, dealing 24,978 Arcane damage to all nearby enemies.
When your Touch of the Magi detonates, it increases the damage all affected targets take from you by 8% for 12 sec.
Arcane Barrage deals 15% increased damage per target it hits beyond the first.
When Arcane Barrage hits more than 2 targets, it explodes for 2,767 additional Arcane damage to all enemies within 10 yds of the primary target.
Casting Arcane Intellect summons a Familiar that attacks your enemies and increases your maximum mana by 10% for 1 hour.
Arcane Surge damage increased by 5% per Arcane Charge.

Each time you cast Arcane Explosion, its damage increases by 25%.

Bonus resets after reaching 100% damage.
Arcane Barrage has a 10% chance per Arcane Charge consumed to launch an Arcane Orb in front of you at 100% effectiveness.
Clearcasting has a 5% increased chance to proc.
Clearcasting can stack up to 2 additional times.
Consuming Arcane Charges increases your Haste by 2% for 12 sec, stacks up to 5 times.
Gaining Clearcasting increases your Intellect by 1% for 8 sec. Multiple instances may overlap.
Each time Arcane Missiles hits an enemy, the damage of your next Arcane Barrage is increased by 5%. This effect stacks up to 20 times.
If Arcane Explosion hits at least 3 targets, it has a 50% chance to generate an extra Arcane Charge.

Expend all of your current mana to annihilate your enemy target and nearby enemies for up to 31,717 Arcane damage based on Mana spent. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Generates Clearcasting.

For the next 15 sec, your Mana regeneration is increased by 425% and spell damage is increased by 35%.
Arcane Charges further increase Mastery effectiveness of Arcane Blast and Arcane Barrage by 20%.

Arcane Debilitation's duration is increased by 2 sec.

When you apply a stack of Arcane Debilitation, you have a 25% chance to apply another stack of Arcane Debilitation.

This effect can trigger off of itself.
Your Touch of the Magi now accumulates 25% of the damage you deal.
Reduces Arcane Blast's mana cost by 5% and increases its damage by 8%.

Damage from Dematerialize has a small chance to summon an Arcane Explosion at its target's location at 50% effectiveness.

Arcane Explosions summoned from Energy Reconstitution do not generate Arcane Charges.
When a spell consumes Clearcasting, its damage is increased by 10%.
Spells empowered by Nether Precision cause their target to suffer an additional 8% of the damage dealt over 6 sec.
Direct damage you deal to enemies affected by Touch of the Magi, causes an explosion that deals 730 Arcane damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
For each Arcane Charge, Arcane Barrage hits 1 additional nearby target for 40% damage.

Increases your mana regeneration by 1,500% for 2.7 sec and grants Clearcasting.

While channeling Evocation, your Intellect is increased by 2% every 0.5 sec. Lasts 20 sec.
Causes your next 2 Arcane Blasts to be instant cast.

During Arcane Surge, your Familiar fires 4 bolts instead of 1.

Damage from your Arcane Familiar has a small chance to grant you up to 2% of your maximum mana.
Damaging a target with Arcane Missiles increases the damage they take from Arcane Missiles, Arcane Barrage, and Arcane Blast by 0.5% for 6 sec. Multiple instances may overlap.
Arcane Barrage deals an additional 100% damage against targets below 35% health.

Only castable when you have Clearcasting.

Launches five waves of Arcane Missiles at the enemy over 2.3 sec, causing a total of 19,522 Arcane damage.

Applies Touch of the Magi to your current target, accumulating 20% of the damage you deal to the target for 12 sec, and then exploding for that amount of Arcane damage to the target and reduced damage to all nearby enemies.

Generates 4 Arcane Charges.

Arcane Missiles can now be channeled while moving.

Evocation can be channeled while moving.

Arcane damage dealt is increased based on your current mana, up to 6% at full mana.

Mana Regen is increased based on your current mana, up to 20% when out of mana.
Casting a damaging spell has a 5% chance to make your next Arcane Barrage deal 50% increased damage and generate 4 Arcane Charges.

Damage from Arcane Missiles has a 10% chance to grant you 1 Arcane Charge.

Chance is increased by 15% every time your Arcane Missiles fails to grant you an Arcane Charge.
Consuming Clearcasting increases the damage of your next 2 Arcane Blasts or Arcane Barrages by 20%.

Consuming Clearcasting has a 40% chance to make your next Arcane Blast echo, repeating its damage at 70% effectiveness to the primary target and up to 4 nearby enemies.

Casting Touch of the Magi grants Leydrinker.
Arcane Orb gains 1 additional charge. Arcane Orb damage increased by 15%.

Every 3 times you consume Clearcasting, gain Aether Attunement.

Aether Attunement:
Your next Arcane Missiles deals 100% increased damage to your primary target and fires at up to 4 nearby enemies dealing 50% increased damage.
Nether Precision damage bonus increased by 10%.
Arcane Blast has a 10% chance to generate an additional Arcane Charge. If you were to gain an Arcane Charge while at maximum charges instead gain 10% Arcane damage for 10 sec.
Ray of Frost deals 30% of its damage to 5 nearby enemies.

Arcane Missiles channels 20% faster.

Clearcasting makes Arcane Explosion echo for 40% damage.

spec_nodes:
Strikes for 738 Physical damage and infects the target with 2-3 Festering Wounds.

 Festering Wound
A pustulent lesion that will burst on death or when damaged by Scourge Strike, dealing 127 Shadow damage and generating 3 Runic Power.

Your Death Coil and Death Strike have a 25% chance to make your next Scourge Strike become Vampiric Strike.

Vampiric Strike heals you for 2% of your maximum health and grants you Essence of the Blood Queen, increasing your Haste by 1.0%, up to 5.0% for 20 sec.
An unholy strike that deals 395 Physical damage and 218 Shadow damage, and causes 1 Festering Wound to burst.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side. You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time.
Raise Ally revives players at full health and grants you and your ally an absorb shield equal to 20% of your maximum health.

Death's Advance and Wraith Walk movement speed bonuses are increased by 10%.

Activating Death's Advance or Wraith Walk increases 4 nearby allies movement speed by 20% for 5 sec.
While you are within your Death and Decay, your physical damage taken is reduced by 5% and your chance to gain Vampiric Strike is increased by 5%.

Your Leech is increased by 2%.

While Lichborne is active, the Leech bonus of this effect is increased by 100%, and it affects 4 allies within 12 yds.

Icebound Fortitude reduces all damage you take by up to an additional 20% based on your missing health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor reduces the cooldown of Icebound Fortitude by 3 sec.

Your auto attacks have a 25% chance to make your next Death Coil cost 10 less Runic Power and critically strike. 

Additionally, your next Death Coil will burst 1 Festering Wound.

Your ghoul deals 236 Shadow damage to 5 nearby enemies and transforms into a powerful undead monstrosity for 15 sec. The ghoul's abilities are empowered and take on new functions while the transformation is active.

When Vampiric Strike damages an enemy affected by your Virulent Plague, it extends the duration of the disease by 3 sec, and deals 10% of the remaining damage to the enemy. 

After Gift of the San'layn ends, your next Scourge Strike consumes the disease to deal 100% of their remaining damage to the target.
Essence of the Blood Queen stacks 2 additional times and increases the damage of your Death Coil and Death Strike by 5% per stack.

Vampiric Strike has a chance to summon a Blood Beast to attack your enemy for 10 sec.

Each time the Blood Beast attacks, it stores a portion of the damage dealt. When the Blood Beast dies, it explodes, dealing 35% of the damage accumulated to nearby enemies and healing the Death Knight for the same amount. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Your diseases deal 10% more damage and have a 5% increased chance to critically strike.
Festering Strike and Festering Wound damage increased by 10%.
Increases your maximum Runic Power by 10 and increases the Rune regeneration rate of Runic Corruption by 10%.
Death Coil and Epidemic increase the duration of Dark Transformation by 1 sec.
When Sudden Doom is consumed, you gain 8% Strength for 5 sec.

Vampiric Strike and Scourge Strike cause your targets to take 1% increased Shadow damage, up to 5% for 15 sec.

Vampiric Strike benefits from Incite Terror at 400% effectiveness.
You store 50% of all Shadow damage dealt into your Blood Beast to explode for additional damage when it expires.
Your Death Coil and Death Strike have a 15% increased chance to trigger Vampiric Strike when damaging enemies below 35% health.

Defile the targeted ground, dealing 886 Shadow damage to all enemies over 10 sec.

While you remain within your Defile, your Scourge Strike will hit 7 enemies near the target.

Every sec, if any enemies are standing in the Defile, it grows in size and deals increased damage.

Dark Transformation surrounds your ghoul with a vile swarm of insects for 6 sec, stinging all nearby enemies and infecting them with Virulent Plague and an unholy disease that deals 168 damage over 14 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Every 20 Festering Wound you burst empowers your next Festering Strike to become Festering Scythe for 12 sec.

Festering Scythe
Sweep through all enemies within 14 yds in front of you, dealing 1,066 Shadow damage and infecting them with 2-3 Festering Wounds.

Bring doom upon the enemy, dealing 265 Shadow damage and bursting up to 4 Festering Wounds on the target.

Summons 4 Army of the Dead ghouls for 20 sec.

Generates 2 Runes.
Scourge Strike causes your disease damage to occur 100% more quickly for 10 sec.
Deals 724 Shadow damage and causes 1 Festering Wound to burst.
Your Soul Reaper, Scourge Strike, Festering Strike, and Death Coil deal 30% additional damage to enemies below 35% health.
Your Raise Dead spell summons an additional skeletal minion.

While Dark Transformation is active you gain Gift of the San'layn.

Gift of the San'layn increases the effectiveness of your Essence of the Blood Queen by 200%, and Vampiric Strike replaces your Scourge Strike for the duration.

Spending Runes has a chance to call forth the aid of a Horsemen for 10 sec.

Mograine
Casts Death and Decay at his location that follows his position.

Whitemane
Casts Undeath on your target dealing 60 Shadowfrost damage per stack every 3 sec, for 24 sec. Each time Undeath deals damage it gains a stack. Cannot be Refreshed.

Trollbane
Casts Chains of Ice on your target slowing their movement speed by 40% and increasing the damage they take from you by 5% for 8 sec.

Nazgrim
While Nazgrim is active you gain Apocalyptic Conquest, increasing your Strength by 5%.
Diseases deal 12% more damage over time in half the duration.
Bursting a Festering Wound deals 16% more damage, and deals 88 Shadow damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Dark Transformation also increases the attack speed and damage of you and your Monstrosity by 5%.
Apocalypse and Army of the Dead also summon a Magus of the Dead who hurls Frostbolts and Shadow Bolts at your foes.
Death Coil deals 15% additional damage and seeks out 1 additional nearby enemy.
Sudden Doom triggers 30% more often, can accumulate up to 2 charges, and increases the damage of your next Death Coil by 20%.
Dark Transformation creates an unholy pact between you and your pet, igniting flaming chains that deal 1,191 Shadow damage over 15 sec to enemies between you and your pet.
While outdoors you are able to mount your Acherus Deathcharger in combat.

Call upon your Death Charger to break free of movement impairment effects.

For 10 sec, while upon your Death Charger your movement speed is increased by 100%, you cannot be slowed below 100% of normal speed, and you are immune to forced movement effects and knockbacks.
Your damage is increased by 5% and you gain the benefits of your Death and Decay while inside Mograine's Death and Decay.

While at your aid, the Horsemen will occasionally cast Anti-Magic Shell on you and themselves at 80% effectiveness.

You may only benefit from this effect every 45 sec.
When you take damage, 5% of the damage is redirected to each active horsemen.
Inflict disease upon your enemies spreading Festering Wounds equal to the amount currently active on your target to 7 nearby enemies.
Death and Decay damage has a 10% chance to apply a Festering Wound to the enemy.
Your ghoul's Claw attack has a 30% chance to cause a Festering Wound on the target.
Your Magus of the Dead Shadow Bolt now fires a volley of Shadow Bolts at up to 4 nearby enemies.
Death Coil causes the target to take an additional 30% of the direct damage dealt over 4 sec.
Sudden Doom causes your next Death Coil to also increase your Scourge Strike damage against the target by 60% for 10 sec.
When your ghouls expire, they explode in viscera dealing 62 Shadow damage to nearby enemies. Each explosion has a 25% chance to apply Festering Wounds to enemies hit.
When Scourge Strike damages an enemy affected by Undeath it gains 1 stack and infects another nearby enemy.

If an enemy dies while Nazgrim is active, the strength of Apocalyptic Conquest is increased by 3%.

Additionally, each Rune you spend increase its value by 1%.
Scourge Strike shatters Trollbane's Chains of Ice when hit, dealing 745 Shadowfrost damage to nearby enemies, and slowing them by 40% for 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Death Coil and Epidemic debilitate your enemy applying Death Rot causing them to take 1% increased Shadow damage, up to 10% from you for 10 sec. If Death Coil or Epidemic consume Sudden Doom it applies two stacks of Death Rot.
Summons a legion of ghouls who swarms your enemies, fighting anything they can for 30 sec.

Summon a Gargoyle into the area to bombard the target for 25 sec.

The Gargoyle gains 1% increased damage for every 1 Runic Power you spend.

Generates 50 Runic Power.
Consuming Sudden Doom calls upon a Magus of the Dead to assist you for 6 sec.
The damage of your diseases and Death Coil are increased by 10%.
Every 50 Runic Power you spend extends the duration of the Horsemen's aid in combat by 1 sec, up to 5 sec.
While you have 2 or more Horsemen aiding you, your Runic Power spending abilities deal 20% increased damage.
Scourge Strike deals 15% increased damage and the cooldown of your Death and Decay is reduced by 10 sec.
Diseased enemies take 1% increased damage from you per disease they are affected by.
Popping a Festering Wound increases your Strength by 1% for 20 sec stacking. Multiple instances may overlap.
Raises an Abomination for 30 sec which wanders and attacks enemies, applying Festering Wound when it melees targets, and affecting all those nearby with Virulent Plague.

Virulent Plague has a chance to abruptly flare up, dealing 50% of the damage it dealt to target in the last 4 sec.

When this effect triggers, the duration of your active minions are increased by 1.0 sec, up to 3.0 sec.
All enemies within 8 yards take 10% increased damage from your minions.
Army of the Dead and Frostwyrm's Fury call upon all 4 Horsemen to aid you for 20 sec.
Your Virulent Plague also applies Frost Fever and Blood Plague at 75% effectiveness.
Strike your target dealing 677 Shadow damage, infecting the target with 4 Festering Wounds and sending you into an Unholy Frenzy increasing all damage done by 20% for 20 sec.
Dark Transformation also empowers your Gargoyle and Army of the Dead for 30 sec, increasing their damage by 45%.

Your Leech is increased by 2%.

While Lichborne is active, the Leech bonus of this effect is increased by 100%, and it affects 4 allies within 12 yds.

Icebound Fortitude reduces all damage you take by up to an additional 20% based on your missing health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor reduces the cooldown of Icebound Fortitude by 3 sec.
Raise Ally revives players at full health and grants you and your ally an absorb shield equal to 20% of your maximum health.

Death's Advance and Wraith Walk movement speed bonuses are increased by 10%.

Activating Death's Advance or Wraith Walk increases 4 nearby allies movement speed by 20% for 5 sec.

Nazgrim

If no enemies are struck by Soul Rupture, you gain 10% Strength for 8 sec.

Wave of Souls is 100% more effective on the main target of your Reaper's Mark.

Reaper's Mark initial strike grants Killing Machine.

Reaper's Mark explosion deals up to 30% increased damage based on your target's missing health.

When you apply Reaper's Mark, the cooldown of Soul Reaper is reset, your next Soul Reaper costs no runes, and it explodes on the target regardless of their health.

Soul Reaper damage is increased by 20%.

When you suffer a damaging effect equal to 25% of your maximum health, you instantly cast Death Pact at 50% effectiveness. May only occur every 2 min.

When a Reaper's Mark explodes, the cooldowns of this effect and Death Pact are reduced by 5 sec.
Each Rune spent reduces the magic damage you take by 1.5% and each Rune generated reduces the physical damage you take by 1.5% for 5 sec, up to 5 times.

Reaper's Mark sends forth bursts of Shadowfrost energy and back, dealing 510 Shadowfrost damage both ways to all enemies caught in its path.

Wave of Souls critical strikes cause enemies to take 5% increased Shadowfrost damage for 15 sec, stacking up to 2 times, and it is always a critical strike on its way back.

Rime empowered Howling Blast deals 30% increased damage to its main target, and is now Shadowfrost.

Shadowfrost damage applies 2 stacks to Reaper's Mark and 4 stacks when it is a critical strike.
Reduces the cooldowns of Lichborne and Raise Dead by 30 sec.
When an enemy deals direct damage to your Anti-Magic Shell, their cast speed is reduced by 10% for 6 sec.

Consuming Killing Machine or Rime has a 25% chance to grant 3 stacks of Icy Talons and increase its maximum stacks by the same amount for 6 sec.

Runic Power spending abilities count as Shadowfrost while Icy Talons is active.
Reduces the cooldown of Reaper's Mark by 15 sec, but the amount of Obliterates empowered by Exterminate is reduced by 1.
Frost Fever deals its damage 100% faster, and the second scythe of Exterminate applies Frost Fever.
When Reaper's Mark explodes, it deals 20% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies and causes them to deal 5% reduced Physical damage to you for 10 sec.

Viciously slice into the soul of your enemy, dealing 1,325 Shadowfrost damage and applying Reaper's Mark.

Each time you deal Shadow or Frost damage, add a stack of Reaper's Mark. After 12 sec or reaching 40 stacks, the mark explodes, dealing 132 damage per stack.

Reaper's Mark travels to an unmarked enemy nearby if the target dies, or explodes below 35% health when there are no enemies to travel to. This explosion cannot occur again on a target for 3 min.

After Reaper's Mark explodes, your next 2 Obliterates cost 1 Rune and summon 2 scythes to strike your enemies.

The first scythe strikes your target for 2,322 Shadowfrost damage and has a 30% chance to apply Reaper's Mark, the second scythe strikes all enemies around your target for 794 Shadowfrost damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

spec_nodes:
Quickly fling a shard of ice at the target, dealing 4,503 Frost damage.

Ice Lance damage is tripled against frozen targets.

When you consume Nether Precision, conjure 2 Arcane Splinters.

Arcane Splinter:
Conjure raw Arcane magic into a sharp projectile that deals 2,117 Arcane damage.

Arcane Splinters embed themselves into their target, dealing 2,117 Arcane damage over 18 sec. This effect stacks.

Launches an orb of swirling ice up to 40 yds forward which deals up to 16,328 Frost damage to all enemies it passes through over 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets. Grants 1 charge of Fingers of Frost when it first damages an enemy.

Enemies damaged by the Frozen Orb are slowed by 30% for 3 sec.

Frostbolt has a 15% chance and Frozen Orb damage has a 5% to grant a charge of Fingers of Frost.

Fingers of Frost causes your next Ice Lance to deal damage as if the target were frozen.

Maximum 2 charges.

Your damaging Fire spells generate 1 stack of Fire Mastery and Frost spells generate 1 stack of Frost Mastery.

Fire Mastery increases your haste by 2%, and Frost Mastery increases your Mastery by 2% for 14 sec, stacking up to 6 times each.

Adding stacks does not refresh duration.

Casting Arcane Surge conjures 8 Arcane Splinters.

During Arcane Surge, whenever you conjure an Arcane Splinter, you have a 100% chance to conjure an additional Arcane Splinter.
For 8 seconds after being struck by an Arcane Orb, 20% of the direct damage dealt by an Arcane Splinter is also dealt to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Enemies damaged by your Arcane Orb conjure 2 Arcane Splinters, up to 4.

Arcane Orb damage is increased by 10%.

Unleash a flurry of ice, striking the target 3 times for a total of 10,976 Frost damage. Each hit reduces the target's movement speed by 70% for 1 sec and applies Winter's Chill to the target.

Winter's Chill causes the target to take damage from your spells as if it were frozen.
Multiplies the critical strike chance of your spells against frozen targets by 1.5, and adds an additional 50% critical strike chance.

You melt slightly out of your Ice Block and Ice Cold, allowing you to move slowly during Ice Block and increasing your movement speed over time.

Ice Block and Ice Cold trigger a Blazing Barrier when they end.

Launches a bolt of frostfire at the enemy, causing 7,941 Frostfire damage, slowing movement speed by 50%, and causing an additional 3,150 Frostfire damage over 8 sec.

Frostfire Bolt generates stacks for both Fire Mastery and Frost Mastery.
You have 40% increased movement speed during Alter Time.
Displacement has a 50% longer duration and 25% longer range.

Your Prismatic Barrier can absorb up to 50% more damage based on your missing Health.

Max effectiveness when under 50% health.

Your Mirror Image summons one extra clone.
Mirror Image now reduces all damage taken by an additional 5%.
Whenever an Embedded Arcane Splinter is removed, it explodes, dealing 613 Arcane damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Each time you conjure an Arcane Splinter, increase the damage of your next Supernova by 20%.

Stacks up to 30 times.
Frostbolt has a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Flurry and cause your next Flurry to deal 50% increased damage.
Frozen Orb deals an additional 30% damage and its duration is increased by 2 sec.

Your Haste is increased by 8%.

You gain 10% more of the Haste stat from all sources.
Gives your Chill effects a 10% chance to freeze the target for 4 sec.
Frostbolt and Icicle critical strike damage increased by 20%.

Comet Storm now also calls down a Meteor at 150% effectiveness onto your target's location.

Meteor now also calls down a Comet Storm at 300% effectiveness onto your target location.
Casting damaging Frost or Fire spells has a high chance to increase the damage of your next Frostfire Bolt by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.
Frostfire Bolt's cast time is reduced by 10%.

Your Frost and Fire spells have a chance to trigger an additional bolt of Frostfire, dealing 3,765 damage.

This effect generates Frostfire Mastery when activated.
Shifting Power fires a barrage of 8 Arcane Splinters at random enemies within 40 yds over its duration.
When your Magi's Spark explodes, you conjure 6 Arcane Splinters.

Gain 2% increased critical strike chance.
Gain 5% increased critical strike damage.
Direct damage from Arcane Splinters has a 2.0% chance to launch an Arcane Orb at 50% effectiveness and increase all damage dealt by Arcane Orb by 10% for 10 sec.
Frostbolt, Ice Lance, and Flurry deal 15% increased damage.
Frozen Orb increases Ice Lance's damage by 15% for 15 sec.
Whenever you attempt to chill a target, you gain Bone Chilling, increasing spell damage you deal by 0.5% for 8 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

Consuming Excess Fire causes your next  to also cast Ice Nova at 150% effectiveness. Ice Novas cast this way do not freeze enemies in place.

When you consume Excess Frost, the cooldown of  is reduced by 3 sec.

Your Frost and Fire spells have a chance to activate Frostfire Empowerment, causing your next Frostfire Bolt to be instant cast, deal 60% increased damage, explode for 80% of its damage to nearby enemies.

Casting Comet Storm causes your next  to explode in a Frostfire Burst, dealing 16,548 Frostfire damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

Frostfire Burst .

Whenever you have 8 or more active Embedded Arcane Splinters, you automatically cast a Splinterstorm at your target.

Splinterstorm:
Shatter all Embedded Arcane Splinters, dealing their remaining periodic damage instantly.

Conjure an Arcane Splinter for each Splinter shattered, then unleash them all in a devastating barrage, dealing 2,117 Arcane damage to your target for each Splinter in the Splinterstorm.

Splinterstorm has a 5% chance to grant Clearcasting.
Calls down a series of 7 icy comets on and around the target, that deals up to 24,242 Frost damage to all enemies within 6 yds of its impacts.
Frostbolt grants you Fingers of Frost 25% more often and Brain Freeze 20% more often.
Damage from Frostbolt and Flurry increases the damage of your Icicles and Glacial Spike by 2%. Stacks up to 2 times.
Each time Blizzard deals damage, the cooldown of Frozen Orb is reduced by 0.5 sec.
Each of your Icicles deals 10% additional damage, and when an Icicle deals damage you have a 5% chance to gain the Fingers of Frost effect.
Your Frost spells deal 5% more damage to targets that are rooted and frozen.

Frostfire Empowerment grants you maximum benefit of Frostfire Mastery, refreshes its duration, and grants you Excess Frost and Excess Fire.

Casting Combustion or Icy Veins grants you Frostfire Empowerment.
Your Frostbolt deals 10% additional damage to Frozen targets.

Accelerates your spellcasting for 25 sec, granting 20% haste and preventing damage from delaying your spellcasts.

Activating Icy Veins summons a water elemental to your side for its duration. The water elemental's abilities grant you Frigid Empowerment, increasing the Frost damage you deal by 3%, up to 15%.
Frostbolt and Flurry have a 15% chance to generate 2 Icicles.

Your Comet Storm now applies Numbing Blast, increasing the damage enemies take from you by 6% for 6 sec.

Additionally, Flurry has a 25% chance each hit to call down an icy comet, crashing into your target and nearby enemies for 2,065 Frost damage.
Frozen Orb makes Blizzard instant cast and increases its damage done by 60% for 12 sec.

Icy Veins' duration is increased by 5 sec.

Your Ice Lances against frozen targets extend your Icy Veins by an additional 0.5 sec.

Your Ice Lance and Icicles now deal 5% increased damage, and hit a second nearby target for 90% of their damage.

Your Glacial Spike also hits a second nearby target for 100% of its damage.
Your Ice Lances against frozen targets increase the damage of your Ice Lances by 2% for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
While Icy Veins is active, your Frostbolts hit up to 2 additional targets and their damage is increased by 15%.
Frozen Orb deals 15% increased damage to units affected by your Blizzard.
While Icy Veins is active, each Frostbolt you cast reduces the cast time of Frostbolt by 4% and increases its damage by 4%, stacking up to 5 times.
Casting Ice Lance on Frozen targets has a 100% chance to generate an Icicle.

Channel an icy beam at the enemy for 4.5 sec, dealing 16,679 Frost damage every 0.9 sec and slowing movement by 60%. Each time Ray of Frost deals damage, its damage and snare increases by 10%.

Generates 2 charges of Fingers of Frost over its duration.
While Icy Veins is active, damaging an enemy with Frostbolt increases spell damage by 1%. Stacks up to 15 times.
Casting 30 Frostbolts or Flurries calls down a Frozen Orb toward your target. Hitting an enemy player counts as double.

Cone of Cold's cooldown is increased to 45 sec and if Cone of Cold hits 3 or more enemies it resets the cooldown of Frozen Orb and Comet Storm. In addition, Cone of Cold applies Winter's Chill to all enemies hit.

Cone of Cold's cooldown can no longer be reduced by your cooldown reduction effects.

Conjures a massive spike of ice, and merges your current Icicles into it. It impales your target, dealing 39,829 damage plus all of the damage stored in your Icicles, and freezes the target in place for 4 sec. Damage may interrupt the freeze effect.

Requires 5 Icicles to cast.

Passive: Ice Lance no longer launches Icicles.
Each time you consume Fingers of Frost the damage of your next Ray of Frost is increased by 5%, stacking up to 50%. Icy Veins grants 10 stacks instantly.
Ray of Frost deals 30% of its damage to 5 nearby enemies.

Increases your spell damage by 1%.

Arcane Barrage grants Clearcasting and generates 4 Arcane Charges.

Each cast of Arcane Barrage increases the damage of Arcane Barrage by 15%.

Every 6 times you cast Arcane Blast or Arcane Barrage, conjure a Spellfire Sphere.

 Spellfire Sphere
Increases your spell damage by 1%. Stacks up to 3 times.
Spellfire Spheres can now stack up to 5 times.

Generating a Spellfire Sphere while your Phoenix is active causes it to cast an exceptional spell.

Mana Cascade can now stack up to 15 times.
Your Prismatic Barrier now grants 5% avoidance while active and 3% leech for 5 sec when it breaks or expires.
When you cast Arcane Surge, its duration is extended by 0.5 sec for each Spellfire Sphere you have, up to 2.5 sec.

Arcane Bombardment damage bonus increased to 130%.

Arcane Barrage deals an additional 100% damage against targets below 35% health.
Your Arcane Phoenix will Spellsteal when it is summoned and when it expires.

Upon landing, nearby enemies take 3,281 Arcane damage.

  Arcane Phoenix
Your Arcane Phoenix aids you for the duration of your Arcane Surge, casting random Arcane and Fire spells.
