Meteor now also calls down a Comet Storm at 300% effectiveness onto your target location.

Consuming Excess Fire causes your next  to also cast Ice Nova at 150% effectiveness. Ice Novas cast this way do not freeze enemies in place.

When you consume Excess Frost, the cooldown of  is reduced by 3 sec.
Casting damaging Frost or Fire spells has a high chance to increase the damage of your next Frostfire Bolt by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.
Frostfire Bolt's cast time is reduced by 10%.

Launches a bolt of frostfire at the enemy, causing 7,796 Frostfire damage, slowing movement speed by 50%, and causing an additional 3,150 Frostfire damage over 8 sec.

Frostfire Bolt generates stacks for both Fire Mastery and Frost Mastery.

You melt slightly out of your Ice Block and Ice Cold, allowing you to move slowly during Ice Block and increasing your movement speed over time.

Ice Block and Ice Cold trigger a Blazing Barrier when they end.

spec_nodes:
Viciously slice into the soul of your enemy, dealing 1,325 Shadowfrost damage and applying Reaper's Mark.

Each time you deal Shadow or Frost damage, add a stack of Reaper's Mark. After 12 sec or reaching 40 stacks, the mark explodes, dealing 131 damage per stack.

Reaper's Mark travels to an unmarked enemy nearby if the target dies, or explodes below 35% health when there are no enemies to travel to. This explosion cannot occur again on a target for 3 min.
Instantly strike the target and 1 other nearby enemy, causing 301 Physical damage, and reducing enemies' movement speed by 20% for 8 sec.

Your Death Coil and Death Strike have a 25% chance to make your next Scourge Strike become Vampiric Strike.

Vampiric Strike heals you for 2% of your maximum health and grants you Essence of the Blood Queen, increasing your Haste by 1.0%, up to 5.0% for 20 sec.

Reaper's Mark sends forth bursts of Shadowfrost energy and back, dealing 519 Shadowfrost damage both ways to all enemies caught in its path.

Wave of Souls critical strikes cause enemies to take 5% increased Shadowfrost damage for 15 sec, stacking up to 2 times, and it is always a critical strike on its way back.
Frost Fever deals its damage 100% faster, and the second scythe of Exterminate applies Frost Fever.

Rime empowered Howling Blast deals 30% increased damage to its main target, and is now Shadowfrost.

Shadowfrost damage applies 2 stacks to Reaper's Mark and 4 stacks when it is a critical strike.

Smash the target, dealing 336 Physical damage and generating 3 charges of Bone Shield.

 Bone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 916. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.

Deals 347 Shadow damage and infects all enemies within 10 yds with Blood Plague.

 Blood Plague
A shadowy disease that drains 412 health from the target over 24 sec.
Raise Ally revives players at full health and grants you and your ally an absorb shield equal to 20% of your maximum health.

Death's Advance and Wraith Walk movement speed bonuses are increased by 10%.

Activating Death's Advance or Wraith Walk increases 4 nearby allies movement speed by 20% for 5 sec.
While you are within your Death and Decay, your physical damage taken is reduced by 5% and your chance to gain Vampiric Strike is increased by 5%.

Your Leech is increased by 2%.

While Lichborne is active, the Leech bonus of this effect is increased by 100%, and it affects 4 allies within 12 yds.

Icebound Fortitude reduces all damage you take by up to an additional 20% based on your missing health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor reduces the cooldown of Icebound Fortitude by 3 sec.
When Reaper's Mark explodes, it deals 20% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies and causes them to deal 5% reduced Physical damage to you for 10 sec.

Reaper's Mark initial strike grants Killing Machine.

Reaper's Mark explosion deals up to 30% increased damage based on your target's missing health.

When you apply Reaper's Mark, the cooldown of Soul Reaper is reset, your next Soul Reaper costs no runes, and it explodes on the target regardless of their health.

Soul Reaper damage is increased by 20%.

When you suffer a damaging effect equal to 25% of your maximum health, you instantly cast Death Pact at 50% effectiveness. May only occur every 2 min.

When a Reaper's Mark explodes, the cooldowns of this effect and Death Pact are reduced by 5 sec.
Each Rune spent reduces the magic damage you take by 1.5% and each Rune generated reduces the physical damage you take by 1.5% for 5 sec, up to 5 times.
Embrace your undeath, increasing your maximum health by 30% and increasing all healing and absorbs received by 30% for 10 sec.

When you would pull an enemy generate 1 charge of Bone Shield.

 Bone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 916. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.

When Vampiric Strike damages an enemy affected by your Virulent Plague, it extends the duration of the disease by 3 sec, and deals 10% of the remaining damage to the enemy. 

After Gift of the San'layn ends, your next Scourge Strike consumes the disease to deal 100% of their remaining damage to the target.
Essence of the Blood Queen stacks 2 additional times and increases the damage of your Death Coil and Death Strike by 5% per stack.

Vampiric Strike has a chance to summon a Blood Beast to attack your enemy for 10 sec.

Each time the Blood Beast attacks, it stores a portion of the damage dealt. When the Blood Beast dies, it explodes, dealing 35% of the damage accumulated to nearby enemies and healing the Death Knight for the same amount. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

If no enemies are struck by Soul Rupture, you gain 10% Strength for 8 sec.

Wave of Souls is 100% more effective on the main target of your Reaper's Mark.

Consuming Killing Machine or Rime has a 25% chance to grant 3 stacks of Icy Talons and increase its maximum stacks by the same amount for 6 sec.

Runic Power spending abilities count as Shadowfrost while Icy Talons is active.
Reduces the cooldown of Reaper's Mark by 15 sec, but the amount of Obliterates empowered by Exterminate is reduced by 1.
Reduces the cooldowns of Lichborne and Raise Dead by 30 sec.
When an enemy deals direct damage to your Anti-Magic Shell, their cast speed is reduced by 10% for 6 sec.

While you have at least 5 Bone Shield charges, the cost of Death Strike is reduced by 5 Runic Power.

Additionally, your maximum Runic Power is increased by 10.
Vampiric Blood's healing and absorb amount is increased by 5% and duration by 2 sec.
When you lose a Bone Shield charge the damage of your next Marrowrend is increased by 15%, stacking up to 75%.
When Sudden Doom is consumed, you gain 8% Strength for 5 sec.

Vampiric Strike and Scourge Strike cause your targets to take 1% increased Shadow damage, up to 5% for 15 sec.

Vampiric Strike benefits from Incite Terror at 400% effectiveness.
You store 50% of all Shadow damage dealt into your Blood Beast to explode for additional damage when it expires.
Your Death Coil and Death Strike have a 15% increased chance to trigger Vampiric Strike when damaging enemies below 35% health.

After Reaper's Mark explodes, your next 2 Obliterates cost 1 Rune and summon 2 scythes to strike your enemies.

The first scythe strikes your target for 2,302 Shadowfrost damage and has a 30% chance to apply Reaper's Mark, the second scythe strikes all enemies around your target for 799 Shadowfrost damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Heart Strike heals you for 0.25% health for each enemy hit while affected by Blood Plague.
Heart Strike generates 2 additional Runic Power per target hit.
Each charge of Bone Shield increases your maximum health by 1%.

Summons a rune weapon for 8 sec that mirrors your melee attacks and bolsters your defenses.

While active, you gain 35% parry chance.
Each enemy hit by Blood Boil increases the damage and healing done by your next Death Strike by 8%, stacking up to 5 times.
When Crimson Scourge is consumed, you gain 6% Versatility for 6 sec.
While Crimson Scourge is active, your next Death and Decay heals you for 158 health per Bone Shield charge and you immediately gain 10 Runic Power.

While Dark Transformation is active you gain Gift of the San'layn.

Gift of the San'layn increases the effectiveness of your Essence of the Blood Queen by 200%, and Vampiric Strike replaces your Scourge Strike for the duration.
Shadowy tendrils coil around all enemies within 15 yards of a hostile or friendly target, pulling them to the target's location.
Bone Shield increases your Haste by 10%.
Dancing Rune Weapon generates 5 Bone Shield charges. When a charge of Bone Shield is consumed, the cooldown of Dancing Rune Weapon is reduced by 5 sec.
Reduces all damage taken by 20% for 4 sec.

Your Blood Plague and Death and Decay deal damage 15% more often.

Additionally, your Blood Plague leeches 50% more Health.

Consume the essence around you to generate 1 Rune.

Recharge time reduced by 2 sec whenever a Bone Shield charge is consumed.
Gorefiend's Grasp cooldown is reduced by 30 sec and it now also Silences enemies for 3 sec.
Increases Armor gained from Bone Shield by 10% and it can stack 2 additional times.
Summons 1 additional copy of Dancing Rune Weapon and increases its duration by 6 sec.
Death Strike's healing is increased by 15% and grants you 12% Leech for 8 sec.
Enemies affected by Blood Plague take 5% increased damage from you and Death Strike increases the damage of your Blood Plague by 25% for 12 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

Your auto attacks have a chance to summon a Bloodworm.

Bloodworms deal minor damage to your target for 15 sec and then burst, healing you for 15% of your missing health.

If you drop below 50% health, your Bloodworms will immediately burst and heal you.
Anti-Magic Shell heals you for 100% of the damage it absorbs.
Places a Mark of Blood on an enemy for 15 sec. The enemy's damaging auto attacks will also heal their victim for 3% of the victim's maximum health.
Consume up to 5 Bone Shield charges. For each charge consumed, you gain 6 Runic Power and absorb damage equal to 6% of your maximum health for 8 sec.

Drains 1,357 health from the target over 2.7 sec. The damage they deal to you is reduced by 15% for the duration and 5 sec after channeling it fully.

You can move, parry, dodge, and use defensive abilities while channeling this ability.

Generates 20 additional Runic Power over the duration.

Strikes all enemies in front of you with a hungering attack that deals 417 Physical damage and heals you for 150% of that damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Causes your Blood Plague damage to occur 30% more quickly for 6 sec. 

Generates 2 Runes.

Parrying an attack grants you a charge of Bloodied Blade, increasing your Strength by 0.5%, up to 4.0% for 15 sec.

At 8 stacks, your next parry consumes all charges to unleash a Heart Strike at 300% effectiveness, and increases your Strength by 10% for 6 sec.
You deal 6% more damage and receive 5% more healing while standing in your Death and Decay.
When Bone Shield is consumed it shatters dealing 36 Shadow damage to nearby enemies. This damage is tripled while you are within your Death and Decay.
Heart Strike has a chance to increase the damage of your next Death Strike by 20%.

Blooddrinker and Consumption now contribute to your Mastery: Blood Shield.

Each time an enemy strikes your Blood Shield, the cooldowns of Blooddrinker and Consumption have a chance to be reset.
Blood Shield's duration is increased by 2 sec and it absorbs 20% more damage.
Reduces the cooldown on Vampiric Blood by 2.0 sec per 10 Runic Power spent.

Consume up to 5 Bone Shield charges to create a whirl of bone and gore that batters all nearby enemies, dealing 150 Shadow damage every 1 sec, and healing you for 2% of your maximum health every time it deals damage (up to 10%). Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Lasts 2 sec per Bone Shield charge spent and rapidly regenerates a Bone Shield every 1 sec.

An unholy pact that prevents fatal damage, instead absorbing incoming healing equal to the damage prevented, lasting 3 sec.

If any healing absorption remains when this effect expires, you will die. This effect may only occur every 4 min.
While Blood Shield is active, you deal 25% increased Physical damage.
After Vampiric Blood expires, you absorb damage equal to 5 times the damage your Blood Plague dealt during Vampiric Blood.

Bone Shield increases your Haste by 10%.
Increases Armor gained from Bone Shield by 10% and it can stack 2 additional times.

While you have at least 5 Bone Shield charges, the cost of Death Strike is reduced by 5 Runic Power.

Additionally, your maximum Runic Power is increased by 10.
Heart Strike heals you for 0.25% health for each enemy hit while affected by Blood Plague.
When you lose a Bone Shield charge the damage of your next Marrowrend is increased by 15%, stacking up to 75%.
While Crimson Scourge is active, your next Death and Decay heals you for 156 health per Bone Shield charge and you immediately gain 10 Runic Power.
Apocalypse and Army of the Dead also summon a Magus of the Dead who hurls Frostbolts and Shadow Bolts at your foes.
Dark Transformation also empowers your Gargoyle and Army of the Dead for 30 sec, increasing their damage by 45%.
All enemies within 8 yards take 10% increased damage from your minions.
Strike your target dealing 677 Shadow damage, infecting the target with 4 Festering Wounds and sending you into an Unholy Frenzy increasing all damage done by 20% for 20 sec.
Popping a Festering Wound increases your Strength by 1% for 20 sec stacking. Multiple instances may overlap.
Raises an Abomination for 30 sec which wanders and attacks enemies, applying Festering Wound when it melees targets, and affecting all those nearby with Virulent Plague.

Virulent Plague has a chance to abruptly flare up, dealing 50% of the damage it dealt to target in the last 4 sec.

When this effect triggers, the duration of your active minions are increased by 1.0 sec, up to 3.0 sec.
Your Virulent Plague also applies Frost Fever and Blood Plague at 75% effectiveness.
Death Coil causes the target to take an additional 30% of the direct damage dealt over 4 sec.
Death and Decay damage has a 10% chance to apply a Festering Wound to the enemy.

Death Coil and Epidemic debilitate your enemy applying Death Rot causing them to take 1% increased Shadow damage, up to 10% from you for 10 sec. If Death Coil or Epidemic consume Sudden Doom it applies two stacks of Death Rot.
Inflict disease upon your enemies spreading Festering Wounds equal to the amount currently active on your target to 7 nearby enemies.
Diseases deal 12% more damage over time in half the duration.

Defile the targeted ground, dealing 868 Shadow damage to all enemies over 10 sec.

While you remain within your Defile, your Scourge Strike will hit 7 enemies near the target.

Every sec, if any enemies are standing in the Defile, it grows in size and deals increased damage.
Your diseases deal 10% more damage and have a 5% increased chance to critically strike.

Dark Transformation surrounds your ghoul with a vile swarm of insects for 6 sec, stinging all nearby enemies and infecting them with Virulent Plague and an unholy disease that deals 168 damage over 14 sec, stacking up to 4 times.
Bursting a Festering Wound deals 16% more damage, and deals 88 Shadow damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Gorefiend's Grasp cooldown is reduced by 30 sec and it now also Silences enemies for 3 sec.
Reduces all damage taken by 20% for 4 sec.
Each charge of Bone Shield increases your maximum health by 1%.

Smash the target, dealing 333 Physical damage and generating 3 charges of Bone Shield.

 Bone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 916. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.
Instantly strike the target and 1 other nearby enemy, causing 304 Physical damage, and reducing enemies' movement speed by 20% for 8 sec.

Deals 341 Shadow damage and infects all enemies within 10 yds with Blood Plague.

 Blood Plague
A shadowy disease that drains 412 health from the target over 24 sec.

When you would pull an enemy generate 1 charge of Bone Shield.

 Bone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 916. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.
Blood Shield's duration is increased by 2 sec and it absorbs 20% more damage.
Embrace your undeath, increasing your maximum health by 30% and increasing all healing and absorbs received by 30% for 10 sec.

Your auto attacks have a chance to summon a Bloodworm.

Bloodworms deal minor damage to your target for 15 sec and then burst, healing you for 15% of your missing health.

If you drop below 50% health, your Bloodworms will immediately burst and heal you.
Sudden Doom causes your next Death Coil to also increase your Scourge Strike damage against the target by 60% for 10 sec.

Summon a Gargoyle into the area to bombard the target for 25 sec.

The Gargoyle gains 1% increased damage for every 1 Runic Power you spend.

Generates 50 Runic Power.
Consuming Sudden Doom calls upon a Magus of the Dead to assist you for 6 sec.
When your ghouls expire, they explode in viscera dealing 62 Shadow damage to nearby enemies. Each explosion has a 25% chance to apply Festering Wounds to enemies hit.
Sudden Doom triggers 30% more often, can accumulate up to 2 charges, and increases the damage of your next Death Coil by 20%.
Your Soul Reaper, Scourge Strike, Festering Strike, and Death Coil deal 30% additional damage to enemies below 35% health.
Dark Transformation creates an unholy pact between you and your pet, igniting flaming chains that deal 1,191 Shadow damage over 15 sec to enemies between you and your pet.
Your Raise Dead spell summons an additional skeletal minion.
Death Coil and Epidemic increase the duration of Dark Transformation by 1 sec.
Scourge Strike causes your disease damage to occur 100% more quickly for 10 sec.
Deals 722 Shadow damage and causes 1 Festering Wound to burst.
Death Coil deals 15% additional damage and seeks out 1 additional nearby enemy.

Bring doom upon the enemy, dealing 263 Shadow damage and bursting up to 4 Festering Wounds on the target.

Summons 4 Army of the Dead ghouls for 20 sec.

Generates 2 Runes.
Increases your maximum Runic Power by 10 and increases the Rune regeneration rate of Runic Corruption by 10%.

Your ghoul deals 236 Shadow damage to 5 nearby enemies and transforms into a powerful undead monstrosity for 15 sec. The ghoul's abilities are empowered and take on new functions while the transformation is active.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side. You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time.

Strikes for 743 Physical damage and infects the target with 2-3 Festering Wounds.

 Festering Wound
A pustulent lesion that will burst on death or when damaged by Scourge Strike, dealing 127 Shadow damage and generating 3 Runic Power.
An unholy strike that deals 393 Physical damage and 217 Shadow damage, and causes 1 Festering Wound to burst.

Your auto attacks have a 25% chance to make your next Death Coil cost 10 less Runic Power and critically strike. 

Additionally, your next Death Coil will burst 1 Festering Wound.
Festering Strike and Festering Wound damage increased by 10%.

Every 20 Festering Wound you burst empowers your next Festering Strike to become Festering Scythe for 12 sec.

Festering Scythe
Sweep through all enemies within 14 yds in front of you, dealing 1,065 Shadow damage and infecting them with 2-3 Festering Wounds.
Dark Transformation also increases the attack speed and damage of you and your Monstrosity by 5%.
Your ghoul's Claw attack has a 30% chance to cause a Festering Wound on the target.
Summons a legion of ghouls who swarms your enemies, fighting anything they can for 30 sec.
Diseased enemies take 1% increased damage from you per disease they are affected by.

If no enemies are struck by Soul Rupture, you gain 10% Strength for 8 sec.

Wave of Souls is 100% more effective on the main target of your Reaper's Mark.

When Vampiric Strike damages an enemy affected by your Virulent Plague, it extends the duration of the disease by 3 sec, and deals 10% of the remaining damage to the enemy. 

After Gift of the San'layn ends, your next Scourge Strike consumes the disease to deal 100% of their remaining damage to the target.

Reaper's Mark initial strike grants Killing Machine.

Reaper's Mark explosion deals up to 30% increased damage based on your target's missing health.

When you apply Reaper's Mark, the cooldown of Soul Reaper is reset, your next Soul Reaper costs no runes, and it explodes on the target regardless of their health.

Soul Reaper damage is increased by 20%.

When you suffer a damaging effect equal to 25% of your maximum health, you instantly cast Death Pact at 50% effectiveness. May only occur every 2 min.

When a Reaper's Mark explodes, the cooldowns of this effect and Death Pact are reduced by 5 sec.
Each Rune spent reduces the magic damage you take by 1.5% and each Rune generated reduces the physical damage you take by 1.5% for 5 sec, up to 5 times.

Reaper's Mark sends forth bursts of Shadowfrost energy and back, dealing 516 Shadowfrost damage both ways to all enemies caught in its path.

Wave of Souls critical strikes cause enemies to take 5% increased Shadowfrost damage for 15 sec, stacking up to 2 times, and it is always a critical strike on its way back.

While at your aid, the Horsemen will occasionally cast Anti-Magic Shell on you and themselves at 80% effectiveness.

You may only benefit from this effect every 45 sec.
When you take damage, 5% of the damage is redirected to each active horsemen.

Vampiric Strike and Scourge Strike cause your targets to take 1% increased Shadow damage, up to 5% for 15 sec.

Vampiric Strike benefits from Incite Terror at 400% effectiveness.
Army of the Dead and Frostwyrm's Fury call upon all 4 Horsemen to aid you for 20 sec.
Every 50 Runic Power you spend extends the duration of the Horsemen's aid in combat by 1 sec, up to 5 sec.
While you have 2 or more Horsemen aiding you, your Runic Power spending abilities deal 20% increased damage.

Rime empowered Howling Blast deals 30% increased damage to its main target, and is now Shadowfrost.

Shadowfrost damage applies 2 stacks to Reaper's Mark and 4 stacks when it is a critical strike.
The damage of your diseases and Death Coil are increased by 10%.
When Sudden Doom is consumed, you gain 8% Strength for 5 sec.

Vampiric Strike has a chance to summon a Blood Beast to attack your enemy for 10 sec.

Each time the Blood Beast attacks, it stores a portion of the damage dealt. When the Blood Beast dies, it explodes, dealing 35% of the damage accumulated to nearby enemies and healing the Death Knight for the same amount. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
When Scourge Strike damages an enemy affected by Undeath it gains 1 stack and infects another nearby enemy.
While you are within your Death and Decay, your physical damage taken is reduced by 5% and your chance to gain Vampiric Strike is increased by 5%.
Reduces the cooldowns of Lichborne and Raise Dead by 30 sec.
When an enemy deals direct damage to your Anti-Magic Shell, their cast speed is reduced by 10% for 6 sec.

Your Death Coil and Death Strike have a 25% chance to make your next Scourge Strike become Vampiric Strike.

Vampiric Strike heals you for 2% of your maximum health and grants you Essence of the Blood Queen, increasing your Haste by 1.0%, up to 5.0% for 20 sec.

While Dark Transformation is active you gain Gift of the San'layn.

Gift of the San'layn increases the effectiveness of your Essence of the Blood Queen by 200%, and Vampiric Strike replaces your Scourge Strike for the duration.
Scourge Strike deals 15% increased damage and the cooldown of your Death and Decay is reduced by 10 sec.
You store 50% of all Shadow damage dealt into your Blood Beast to explode for additional damage when it expires.
Your Death Coil and Death Strike have a 15% increased chance to trigger Vampiric Strike when damaging enemies below 35% health.

Your Leech is increased by 2%.

While Lichborne is active, the Leech bonus of this effect is increased by 100%, and it affects 4 allies within 12 yds.

Icebound Fortitude reduces all damage you take by up to an additional 20% based on your missing health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor reduces the cooldown of Icebound Fortitude by 3 sec.

Consuming Killing Machine or Rime has a 25% chance to grant 3 stacks of Icy Talons and increase its maximum stacks by the same amount for 6 sec.

Runic Power spending abilities count as Shadowfrost while Icy Talons is active.
Reduces the cooldown of Reaper's Mark by 15 sec, but the amount of Obliterates empowered by Exterminate is reduced by 1.
Frost Fever deals its damage 100% faster, and the second scythe of Exterminate applies Frost Fever.

If an enemy dies while Nazgrim is active, the strength of Apocalyptic Conquest is increased by 3%.

Additionally, each Rune you spend increase its value by 1%.
While outdoors you are able to mount your Acherus Deathcharger in combat.

Call upon your Death Charger to break free of movement impairment effects.

For 10 sec, while upon your Death Charger your movement speed is increased by 100%, you cannot be slowed below 100% of normal speed, and you are immune to forced movement effects and knockbacks.
When Reaper's Mark explodes, it deals 20% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies and causes them to deal 5% reduced Physical damage to you for 10 sec.

Viciously slice into the soul of your enemy, dealing 1,325 Shadowfrost damage and applying Reaper's Mark.

Each time you deal Shadow or Frost damage, add a stack of Reaper's Mark. After 12 sec or reaching 40 stacks, the mark explodes, dealing 133 damage per stack.

Reaper's Mark travels to an unmarked enemy nearby if the target dies, or explodes below 35% health when there are no enemies to travel to. This explosion cannot occur again on a target for 3 min.
Scourge Strike shatters Trollbane's Chains of Ice when hit, dealing 745 Shadowfrost damage to nearby enemies, and slowing them by 40% for 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Raise Ally revives players at full health and grants you and your ally an absorb shield equal to 20% of your maximum health.

Death's Advance and Wraith Walk movement speed bonuses are increased by 10%.

Activating Death's Advance or Wraith Walk increases 4 nearby allies movement speed by 20% for 5 sec.
Essence of the Blood Queen stacks 2 additional times and increases the damage of your Death Coil and Death Strike by 5% per stack.

Spending Runes has a chance to call forth the aid of a Horsemen for 10 sec.

Mograine
Casts Death and Decay at his location that follows his position.

Whitemane
Casts Undeath on your target dealing 60 Shadowfrost damage per stack every 3 sec, for 24 sec. Each time Undeath deals damage it gains a stack. Cannot be Refreshed.

Trollbane
Casts Chains of Ice on your target slowing their movement speed by 40% and increasing the damage they take from you by 5% for 8 sec.

Nazgrim
While Nazgrim is active you gain Apocalyptic Conquest, increasing your Strength by 5%.
Your damage is increased by 5% and you gain the benefits of your Death and Decay while inside Mograine's Death and Decay.

After Reaper's Mark explodes, your next 2 Obliterates cost 1 Rune and summon 2 scythes to strike your enemies.

The first scythe strikes your target for 2,338 Shadowfrost damage and has a 30% chance to apply Reaper's Mark, the second scythe strikes all enemies around your target for 785 Shadowfrost damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Chains of Ice affects 1 additional nearby enemy.
Your Magus of the Dead Shadow Bolt now fires a volley of Shadow Bolts at up to 4 nearby enemies.
The power of frost increases your Strength by 30% for 12 sec.
Reduces Pillar of Frost cooldown by 15 sec.
Summons a frostwyrm who breathes on all enemies within 40 yd in front of you, dealing 2,002 Frost damage and slowing movement speed by 50% for 10 sec.
While Pillar of Frost is active your auto-attack critical strikes increase its duration by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 6 sec.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to send out a torrent of ice dealing 571 Frost damage to enemies in front of you.

Increases the range of Death Grip by 10 yds.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Death Grip.
Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have 1 additional charge.
Magic damage taken is reduced by 8% and the duration of harmful Magic effects against you are reduced by 35%.
Frostwyrm's Fury has 50% reduced cooldown and Freezes all enemies hit for 3 sec.

Parrying an attack grants you a charge of Bloodied Blade, increasing your Strength by 0.5%, up to 4.0% for 15 sec.

At 8 stacks, your next parry consumes all charges to unleash a Heart Strike at 300% effectiveness, and increases your Strength by 10% for 6 sec.
Anti-Magic Shell heals you for 100% of the damage it absorbs.

Drains 1,357 health from the target over 2.7 sec. The damage they deal to you is reduced by 15% for the duration and 5 sec after channeling it fully.

You can move, parry, dodge, and use defensive abilities while channeling this ability.

Generates 20 additional Runic Power over the duration.

Strikes all enemies in front of you with a hungering attack that deals 417 Physical damage and heals you for 150% of that damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Causes your Blood Plague damage to occur 30% more quickly for 6 sec. 

Generates 2 Runes.

Blooddrinker and Consumption now contribute to your Mastery: Blood Shield.

Each time an enemy strikes your Blood Shield, the cooldowns of Blooddrinker and Consumption have a chance to be reset.

spec_nodes:
Consuming 20 Soul Fragments or casting The Hunt converts your next Throw Glaive into Reaver's Glaive.

 Reaver's Glaive: 
Throw a glaive enhanced with the essence of consumed souls at your target, dealing 1,831 Physical damage and ricocheting to 2 additional enemies.
 
Begins a well-practiced pattern of glaivework, enhancing your next Shear and Soul Cleave.

The enhanced ability you cast first deals 10% increased damage, and the second deals 20% increased damage.
Blasts all enemies in front of you, for up to 3,839 Chaos damage over 1.8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Soul Cleave casts 3 additional glaive slashes to nearby targets. 

If cast after Shear, cast 6 slashes instead.
Vengeful Retreat can be cast a second time within 3 sec.
Vengeful Retreat resets the cooldown of Felblade.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Shear applies Reaver's Mark, which causes the target to take 7% increased damage for 20 sec. 

If cast after Soul Cleave, Reaver's Mark is increased to 14%.
The chance that Chaos Strike will refund 20 Fury is increased by 30% of your critical strike chance.
Demon's Bite deals 50% more damage and generates 5 to 10 additional Fury.
Your auto attacks deal an additional 98 Shadow damage and generate 7-12 Fury.
Immolation Aura generates an additional 24 Fury over 6 sec.
The second enhanced ability in a pattern shatters an additional Soul Fragment.
Felblade surrounds you with a Blade Ward, reducing damage taken by 10% for 5 sec.
Each Soul Fragment you consume shields you for an additional 15% of the amount healed.

Expose weaknesses in the target of your Reaver's Mark, causing your Physical damage to any enemy to also deal 20% of the damage dealt to your marked target as Chaos, and sometimes shatter a Lesser Soul Fragment.
For 2 sec after using Fel Rush, activating it again will dash back towards your initial location.
Blade Dance deals 1,324 Chaos damage to the first target struck.
Throw Glaive deals 60% increased damage, reduced by 30% for each previous enemy hit.
Magical damage increased by 3%, and Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.
Throw Glaive deals 106 Physical damage to enemies near its initial target.
Consuming a Soul Fragment causes your next Shear to deal 212 additional Physical damage.

Blur now reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.

Additionally, you automatically trigger Blur with 50% reduced cooldown and duration when you fall below 35% health. This effect can only occur when Blur is not on cooldown.
Slip into the nether, increasing movement speed by 100% and becoming immune to damage, but unable to attack. Lasts 6 sec.
You deflect incoming attacks while Blade Dancing, absorbing damage up to 15% of your maximum health.
Blade Dance now reduces targets' healing received by 50% for 6 sec.
After consuming both enhancements, gain Thrill of the Fight, increasing your attack speed by 15% for 20 sec and your damage and healing by 15% for 10 sec.

Damaging an enemy before they damage you increases your critical strike chance by 10% for 5 sec.

Vengeful Retreat refreshes your potential to trigger this effect on any enemies you are in combat with.
Increases Versatility by 4% and reduces threat generated by 8%.
When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of Blade Dance and Eye Beam are immediately reset.
Throw Glaive now costs 25 Fury and throws a second glaive at the target.
The final slash of Blade Dance inflicts an additional 382 Chaos damage over 4 sec.

Metamorphosis now also greatly empowers Soul Cleave and Spirit Bomb.

While demon form is active, the first cast of each empowered ability induces a Demonsurge, causing you to explode with Fel energy, dealing 1,760 Fire damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Vengeful Retreat has a 5 sec reduced cooldown and generates 80 Fury over 10 sec.
Eye Beam generates 20 Fury every second, and its damage and duration are increased by 10%.
Eye Beam deals guaranteed critical strikes.
The final slash of Blade Dance deals an additional 25% damage.
Immolation Aura's damage increases by 10% each time it deals damage.
Chaos Nova slows enemies by 60% and reduces attack and cast speed 15% for 5 sec after its stun fades.
Movement speed increased by 1% per 10 Fury.

Demonsurge deals 50% increased damage when it strikes a single target.

Each additional target reduces this bonus by 10%.

5% of all non-Fire damage taken is instead taken as Fire damage over 6 sec.

Fire damage taken reduced by 10%.
Leech granted by Soul Rending increased by 2% and an additional 2% while Metamorphosis is active.
The Hunt and Vengeful Retreat increase your damage by 5% for 20 sec.
The Hunt and Vengeful Retreat cause your next Fel Rush or Felblade to empower you, increasing damage by 18% for 5 sec.

Chaos Nova, Eye Beam, and Immolation Aura gain bonuses when striking 1 target.

 Chaos Nova:
Stun duration increased by 2 sec.

 Eye Beam:
Deals 30% increased damage.

 Immolation Aura:
Always critically strikes.
When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional 10% for 10 sec.
Enemies hit by Chaos Strike or Throw Glaive take 15% increased damage from Chaos Strike and Throw Glaive for 15 sec.

Demon's Bite and Throw Glaive leave open wounds on your enemies, dealing 390 Chaos damage over 15 sec and increasing damage taken from your Immolation Aura by 40%.

May be applied to up to 3 targets.
Your blades burn with Fel energy, causing your Soul Cleave, Throw Glaive, and auto-attacks to deal an additional 50% damage as Fire over 6 sec.
When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of your Sigil of Flame and Fel Devastation are immediately reset.
The effects of your demon form persist outside of it in a weakened state, increasing maximum health by 5% and Armor by 20%.
The Hunt and Vengeful Retreat increase the damage of your next Fel Rush or Felblade by 300%. Lasts 12 sec.
Blade Dance causes your next Chaos Strike within 8 sec to have a 14-30% increased critical strike chance and will always refund Fury.
Launch two demonic glaives in a whirlwind of energy, causing 1,574 Chaos damage over 3 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Entering demon form causes your next Chaos Strike to unleash your inner demon, causing it to crash into your target and deal 1,131 Chaos damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Leaving demon form grants a charge of Fel Rush and increases the damage of your next Blade Dance by 50%.
Chaos Strike has a 10% chance to trigger a second Chaos Strike.
Throw Glaive causes targets to take an additional 80% of damage dealt as Chaos over 6 sec.

Each time Immolation Aura deals damage, 30% of the damage dealt by up to 3 critical strikes is gathered as Ragefire.

When Immolation Aura expires you explode, dealing all stored Ragefire damage to nearby enemies.
Sigil of Flame applies Student of Suffering to you, increasing Mastery by 9.6% and granting 5 Fury every 2 sec, for 6 sec.
Immolation Aura has 2 yd increased radius and 50% increased critical strike damage bonus.
Agility increased by 8% while not in demon form.
Gain critical strike damage equal to 40% of your critical strike chance.
Activating Eye Beam reduces the cooldown of your next Eye Beam by 5.0 sec, stacking up to 20 sec.
Your Chaos damage has a 7.77% chance to be increased by 17%, occurring up to 3 total times.

Activating Metamorphosis greatly empowers Fel Devastation, Immolation Aura, and Sigil of Flame.

Demonsurge damage is increased by 10% for each time it previously triggered while your demon form is active.

Immolation Aura has 1 additional charge, 30% chance to refund a charge when used, and deals Chaos damage instead of Fire.

You can have multiple Immolation Auras active at a time.
Slash all enemies in front of you for 1,498 Chaos damage, and increase the damage your Chaos Strike and Blade Dance deal to them by 80% for 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
The duration of your active demon form is extended by 0.1 sec per 12 Fury spent.
Blade Dance automatically triggers Throw Glaive on your primary target for 100% damage and each slash has a 50% chance to Throw Glaive an enemy for 35% damage.
Unleash a torrent of Fel energy, rapidly consuming Fury to inflict 187 Chaos damage to all enemies within 12 yds, lasting 8 sec or until Fury is depleted. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Unleash the fel within you, damaging enemies directly in front of you for 1,392 Fire damage over 2 sec.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Soul Cleave casts 3 additional glaive slashes to nearby targets. 

If cast after Shear, cast 6 slashes instead.
Vengeful Retreat can be cast a second time within 3 sec.
Vengeful Retreat resets the cooldown of Felblade.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Shear applies Reaver's Mark, which causes the target to take 7% increased damage for 20 sec. 

If cast after Soul Cleave, Reaver's Mark is increased to 14%.

Enemies struck by Sigil of Flame are afflicted with Frailty for 6 sec.

You heal for 8% of all damage you deal to targets with Frailty.
Brand an enemy with a demonic symbol, instantly dealing 1,114 Fire damage. The enemy's damage done to you is reduced by 40% for 12 sec.
The second enhanced ability in a pattern shatters an additional Soul Fragment.
Felblade surrounds you with a Blade Ward, reducing damage taken by 10% for 5 sec.
Each Soul Fragment you consume shields you for an additional 15% of the amount healed.

Rapidly slash your target for 331 Physical damage, and shatter 2 Lesser Soul Fragments from them.

Generates 25 Fury.
Demon Spikes also increases your Parry chance by 10% for 8 sec.

Sigil of Flame's initial damage is increased by 50%.

Multiple applications of Sigil of Flame may overlap.
Throw Glaive deals 106 Physical damage to enemies near its initial target.
Consuming a Soul Fragment causes your next Shear to deal 212 additional Physical damage.
Reduces the cooldown of Throw Glaive by 6 sec.
You take 12% reduced damage after Demon Spikes ends, fading by 1% per second.
Fel Devastation heals you for up to 50% more, based on your missing health.

Roll and Chi Torpedo travel a small distance further.

Reduces the cooldown of Ring of Peace by 5 sec and Song of Chi-Ji's cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.
Summons a Jade Serpent Statue at the target location. When you channel Soothing Mist, the statue will also begin to channel Soothing Mist on your target, healing for 30,994 over 7.2 sec.
Find resilience in the flow of chi in battle, gaining a magic absorb shield for 1.0% of your max health every 3 sec in combat, stacking up to 10%.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.
Magical damage done increased by 2% and healing done increased by 2%.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
Transcendence: Transfer immediately heals you for 10% of your maximum health.

Summons a Black Ox Statue at the target location for 15 min, pulsing threat to all enemies within 20 yards.

You may cast Provoke on the statue to taunt all enemies near the statue.
Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec.
Increases your maximum health by an additional 10% and your damage taken is reduced by an additional 10% while Fortifying Brew is active.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 4% increased movement speed. Stacks with other similar effects.
After you use Transcendence: Transfer, you can use Transcendence: Transfer again within 10 sec, ignoring its cooldown.
Transcendence now tethers your spirit onto an ally for 1 hour. Use Transcendence: Transfer to teleport to your ally's location.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 20% for 4 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.
Increases your Physical damage done by 2% and Avoidance increased by 2%.
While your Celestial is active, you cannot be slowed below 90% normal movement speed.
Your dodge chance is increased by 5%.
Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Torpedoes you forward a long distance and increases your movement speed by 30% for 10 sec, stacking up to 2 times.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 8 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 5 sec.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.

After using Breath of Fire, you breathe fire 2 additional times, each dealing 106 Fire damage.

Breath of Fire damage increased by up to 100% based on your level of Stagger.

Your Breath of Fire ignites your right leg in flame for 8 sec, causing your Blackout Kick and Spinning Crane Kick to deal 50% additional damage as Fire damage and refresh the duration of your Breath of Fire on the target.
Keg Smash deals an additional 20% damage to targets affected by Breath of Fire.
When you use Keg Smash, the remaining cooldown on Breath of Fire is reset.

Stagger is 2% more effective at delaying damage.

You gain up to 5% Haste based on your current level of Stagger.
Increases the duration of Stagger by 3.0 sec.
Chug some Black Ox Brew, which instantly refills your Energy, Purifying Brew charges, and resets the cooldown of Celestial Brew.

Weapons of Order calls forth Niuzao, the Black Ox to assist you for 12 sec.

Your main hand auto attacks reduce the cooldown on your brews by 0.5 sec and block your target's chi, dealing 117 additional Nature damage and increasing your damage dealt by 1% for 20 sec. 

Upon reaching 10 stacks, your next cast of Rising Sun Kick or Keg Smash consumes all stacks to strike again at 100% effectiveness. This bonus attack can trigger effects on behalf of Tiger Palm at reduced effectiveness.
For the next 30 sec, your Mastery is increased by 9%. Additionally,
Blackout Kick deals an additional 5% damage. Blackout Kick critical hits grant an additional 1 stack of Elusive Brawler.

Blackout Kick also empowers your next ability:

Tiger Palm: Damage increased by 100%.
Breath of Fire: Damage increased by 50%, and damage reduction increased by 5%.

Keg Smash deals 20% additional damage, and has 1 additional charge.

Hurls a flaming keg at the target location, dealing 1,520 Fire damage to nearby enemies, causing your attacks against them to deal 117 additional Fire damage, and causing their melee attacks to deal 100% reduced damage for the next 3 sec.
Rising Sun Kick grants a charge of Ox Stance.

Casting Purifying Brew grants a charge of Ox Stance, increased based on Stagger level. When you take damage that is greater than 60% of your current health, a charge is consumed to increase the amount you Stagger.
Reduces all damage taken by 60% for 8 sec. Being hit by a melee attack, or taking another action will cancel this effect.

Drinking from your Brews has a 100% chance to toss a keg high into the air that lands nearby after 3 sec, dealing 388 damage to all enemies within 8 yards and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.
Summons a whirling tornado around you, causing 639 Physical damage over 5.4 sec to all enemies within 8 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Whirling Dragon Punch has a 100% chance to activate Dance of Chi-Ji and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.

Whirling Dragon Punch grants 4 stacks of Teachings of the Monastery and its damage is increased by 20%.

Teachings of the Monastery can now stack up to 8 times.

Performs a devastating whirling upward strike, dealing 2,543 damage to all nearby enemies and an additional 1,591 damage to the first target struck. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Only usable while both Fists of Fury and Rising Sun Kick are on cooldown.
Rising Sun Kick damage increased by 15% and critical strike damage increased by 12%.

Tiger Palm's chance to activate Blackout Kick! is increased by 25% and consuming Teachings of the Monastery grants you 1.0% haste for 5 sec equal to the amount of stacks consumed.

Rising Sun Kick critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Fists of Fury by 4 sec.

When Fists of Fury ends, the critical strike chance of Rising Sun Kick is increased by 40% for 5 sec.
Your Combo Strikes grant a stacking 1% chance for your next Fists of Fury to grant 3% critical strike, haste, and mastery and invoke Xuen, The White Tiger for 10 sec.
Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick increase damage dealt by your next Fists of Fury by 3%, stacking up to 10 times.
Your auto attacks have a 20% chance to instead kick your target dealing 659 Physical damage and increasing your damage dealt by 5% for 5 sec.
Increases maximum Energy by 30. Tiger Palm's Energy cost reduced by 5.
Strike with both fists at all enemies in front of you, dealing 2,601 Physical damage and reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate Flurry of Xuen, unleashing a barrage of deadly swipes to deal 2,081 Physical damage in a 10 yd cone, damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Invoking Xuen, the White Tiger activates Flurry of Xuen.
Each successive attack that triggers Combo Strikes in a row grants 1% increased damage, stacking up to 5 times.

While out of combat, your Chi balances to 2 instead of depleting to empty.

Every 15 sec, your next Tiger Palm also casts Expel Harm and deals 30% additional damage.

 Expel Harm
Expel negative chi from your body, healing for 6,665 and dealing 10% of the amount healed as Nature damage to an enemy within 20 yards.

Pummels all targets in front of you, dealing 3,663 Physical damage to your primary target and 1,978 damage to all other enemies over 3.6 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Can be channeled while moving.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm deal 15% additional damage to enemies in a line in front of you. Damage reduced above 5 targets.
Casting Tiger's Lust reduces the remaining cooldown on Roll by 5 sec.
Tiger's Lust grants 20% movement speed to up to 2 allies near its target.
Chi Burst and Chi Wave deal 50% increased damage and healing.

Store vitality from 10% of your damage dealt and 30% of your healing.

Chi Burst increases vitality stored by 25% for 10 sec.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm contribute 30% additional vitality.

Targets damaged or healed by your Aspect of Harmony take 20% increased damage or healing from you.
Casting Vivify stores 5,534 vitality, increased based on your recent Gusts of Mist.
When cast on yourself, your single-target healing spells heal for 10% more and restore an additional 8,301 health over 6 sec.
Casting a Physical spell or ability increases the damage and healing of your next Fire or Nature spell or ability by 3%, and vice versa. Stacks up to 5.

Haste

Tiger Stance:
Critical Strike

Ox Stance:
Versatility

Mastery

upon Yu'lon to decrease the cooldown time of  by 75% for .

Xuen claws your target for 1,792 Physical damage, healing a nearby ally for 100% of the damage done.

Invoking a celestial guarantees your next cast activates this effect.

Deals 3,225 Nature damage and reduces the cooldown of Weapons of Order by 4 for each affected enemy, to a maximum of 20 sec.

Envelop yourself in razor-sharp winds, then lunge forward dealing 4,757 Nature damage to enemies in your path. Damage reduced beyond 5 enemies.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 1,502 Nature damage to all enemies, and 1,175 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 106 Nature damage or 320 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 1,492 Nature damage to all enemies, and 1,188 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.


Casting Chi Burst does not prevent avoiding attacks.

Reduces the cooldown of your next 3 spell casts by 7 sec.

Increases your healing done by 20% and causes 70% of overhealing on players to be redistributed to up to 4 nearby allies for 15 sec.

Your next single target healing spell grants your target a shield that absorbs 129,287 damage and reduces their damage taken by 15% for 15 sec.

Power Word: Shield, Flash Heal, Renew, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life apply Atonement to your target for 15 sec.

Your spell damage heals all targets affected by Atonement for 28% of the damage done.

Healing increased by 125% when not in a raid.

Increases the healing done by Prayer of Mending by 40%.

All damage dealt by Smite, Holy Fire and Holy Nova increased by 40%.

Reduces the cooldown of Power Word: Life by 3 sec and allows it to be usable on targets below 50% health.

Reduces all damage taken by a friendly target by 40% for 8 sec. Castable while stunned.

Prayer of Mending casts apply a Power Word: Shield to your target at 100% effectiveness.

Guardian Spirit lasts an additional 2 sec.

Mind Blast fractures the enemy's mind, increasing your spell damage to the target by 10% for 9 sec.
Your Flash Heal, Heal, and Holy Word: Serenity are 30% more effective when cast on yourself.

Desperate Prayer lasts an additional 10 sec.

Angelic Bulwark's absorption effect is increased by 15% of your maximum health.
3 additional Penance bolts are fired at an enemy within 40 yards when healing an ally with Penance, or fired at an ally within 40 yards when damaging an enemy with Penance.
Increases the effects of Premonition by 40%.
Reduces the cooldown of Premonition by 15 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Power Word: Radiance by 3 sec.
Reduces the cast time of Power Word: Radiance by 30% and causes it to apply Atonement at an additional 10% of its normal duration.
When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed, you restore 0.5% of your maximum mana.

Create a shield on all allies within 40 yards, absorbing 62,393 damage on each of them for 10 sec.

Absorption decreased beyond 5 targets.
Summons a holy barrier to protect all allies at the target location for 10 sec, reducing all damage taken by 20% and preventing damage from delaying spellcasting.
Each Penance bolt extends the duration of Shadow Word: Pain on enemies hit by 1.5 sec.
Increases the duration of Schism by 6 sec.

Casting Premonition of Solace invokes Clairvoyance, expanding your mind and opening up all possibilities of the future.

 Premonition of Clairvoyance
Grants Premonition of Insight, Piety, and Solace at 100% effectiveness.
Shadow Word: Pain Spreads to a nearby enemy when you cast Penance on the target.
Extends Atonement on all allies by 6 sec and heals for 320,972, split evenly among them.
Casting Shadowfiend enters you into a shadowy pact, transforming Halo, Divine Star, and Penance into Shadow spells and increasing the damage and healing of your Shadow spells by 25% while active.

Atonements granted by Power Word: Shield last an additional 4 sec.

Sends a blast of cosmic void energy at the enemy, causing 6,090 Shadow damage.
Power Word: Shield absorbs 20% additional damage.
Casting Power Word: Shield increases your Haste by 4% for 4 sec.

Ascend into the air and unleash a massive barrage of Penance bolts, causing 133,572 Holy damage to enemies or 436,045 healing to allies over 5.4 sec.

While ascended, gain a shield for 100% of your health. In addition, you are unaffected by knockbacks or crowd control effects.
Atonement heals for 5% more when activated by Shadow spells.

Summoning an Entropic Rift extends the duration of your 5 shortest Atonements by 1 sec.
Void Blast increases the duration of Entropic Rift by 1.0 sec, up to a maximum of 3 sec.

Transform your Shadowfiend or Mindbender into a Voidwraith.

Voidwraith
