Your Penance bolts increase the damage of your next Smite by 20%, or the absorb of your next Power Word: Shield by 5%.

Stacks up to 8 times.
Reduces the cooldown of Shadowfiend or Mindbender by 50%.

Your damaging Shadow spells increase the damage of your next Holy spell cast within 6 sec by 15%.

Your damaging Holy spells increase the damage of your next Shadow spell cast within 6 sec by 15%.
Power Word: Radiance causes your next Penance to fire 1 additional bolt, stacking up to 2 charges.
Ultimate Penitence emits an explosion of light, healing up to 10 allies around you for 9,961 and applying Atonement at 50% of normal duration.
Penance fires one additional bolt of holy light over its duration.
Atonements granted by Power Word: Shield last an additional 4 sec.

Ascend into the air and unleash a massive barrage of Penance bolts, causing 131,661 Holy damage to enemies or 439,766 healing to allies over 5.4 sec.

While ascended, gain a shield for 100% of your health. In addition, you are unaffected by knockbacks or crowd control effects.
Increases the damage of Shadow Word: Pain by 15% and increases its duration by 2 sec.
Mind Blast fractures the enemy's mind, increasing your spell damage to the target by 10% for 9 sec.
Increases the duration of Schism by 6 sec.
Casting Shadowfiend enters you into a shadowy pact, transforming Halo, Divine Star, and Penance into Shadow spells and increasing the damage and healing of your Shadow spells by 25% while active.
Shadow Covenant increases Shadow spell damage and healing by an additional 10%.
Atonement heals for 5% more when activated by Shadow spells.

Summons a Mindbender to attack the target for 12 sec. 

Generates 0.2% Mana each time the Mindbender attacks.
Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death consume 3 sec of Shadow Word: Pain, dealing damage equal to 200% of the amount consumed.
Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death cause your Mindbender or Shadowfiend to teleport behind your target, slashing up to 5 nearby enemies for 4,647 Shadow damage and extending its duration by 0.7 sec.
Reduces all damage taken by a friendly target by 40% for 8 sec. Castable while stunned.
Pain Suppression also heals your target for 15% of their maximum health and applies Atonement.

Pain Suppression gains an additional charge.

Power Word: Shield reduces the cooldown of Pain Suppression by 3 sec.
When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed, you restore 0.5% of your maximum mana.
Shadow Word: Pain Spreads to a nearby enemy when you cast Penance on the target.
Reduces the cooldown of Power Word: Radiance by 3 sec.
Reduces the cast time of Power Word: Radiance by 30% and causes it to apply Atonement at an additional 10% of its normal duration.
Power Word: Radiance gains an additional charge.
A burst of light heals the target and 4 injured allies within 40 yards for 29,816, and applies Atonement for 60% of its normal duration.

Power Word: Shield, Flash Heal, Renew, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life apply Atonement to your target for 15 sec.

Your spell damage heals all targets affected by Atonement for 28% of the damage done.

Healing increased by 125% when not in a raid.
Shadow Word: Pain has a chance to empower your next Penance with Shadow, increasing its effectiveness by 30%.
Mind Blast has a 100% chance to grant Power of the Dark Side and its mana cost is reduced by 40%.
Each Penance bolt extends the duration of Shadow Word: Pain on enemies hit by 1.5 sec.
Extends Atonement on all allies by 6 sec and heals for 320,972, split evenly among them.
Smite extends the duration of an active Atonement by 3.0 sec.
Casting Power Word: Shield increases your Haste by 4% for 4 sec.
Flash Heal, Power Word: Shield, Penance, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life have a 20% increased chance to critically heal.
Direct critical heals create a protective shield on the target, absorbing 30% of the amount healed. Lasts 15 sec.

Flash Heal reduces the cast time of your next Heal or Prayer of Healing within 20 sec by 30% and increases its healing done by 18%.

Can accumulate up to 4 charges.
5% of healing done with Heal, Flash Heal, and Power Word: Life is replicated to 4 injured allies within 40 yards.
25% of healing done by Heal, Flash Heal, and Power Word: Life is replicated to the previous target you healed with those spells.
Your Holy Words have a 25% chance to reset the cooldown of Prayer of Mending.

Increases the damage of Holy Fire by 30%.

Holy Fire deals 75% of its initial damage to all nearby enemies within 12 yards of your target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
After your Prayer of Mending heals 50 times, gain Apotheosis for 8 sec.
Increases healing by 10% on friendly targets at or below 50% health.
Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify gain an additional charge.
Increases the healing done by your Mastery: Echo of Light by 8% and your Renew by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Holy Words by 15 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Divine Hymn by 60 sec.
While channeling Divine Hymn, place 2 stacks of Prayer of Mending on up to 3 allies within its range every 0.9 sec.
Reset the cooldown of your Holy Words, and enter a pure Holy form for 20 sec, increasing the cooldown reductions to your Holy Words by 200% and reducing their cost by 100%.
Prayer of Mending has a 15% chance to not consume a charge when it jumps to a new target.
Prayer of Mending jumps 2 additional times.
Bolster the morale of raid members within 40 yds. They each recover 30 sec of cooldown of a major defensive ability, and regain 10% of their missing mana, over 3.6 sec.
Holy Word: Chastise stuns the target for 4 sec and is not broken by damage.

Prayer of Mending and Power Word: Life reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity by 4 sec.

Halo and Divine Star reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify by 4 sec.

Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

Heals all party or raid members within 40 yards for 77,686 over 4.5 sec. Each heal increases all targets' healing taken by 4% for 15 sec, stacking.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Heal restores up to 15% additional health, based on your missing mana.
The primary target of Prayer of Healing is healed for 125% more.
Increases the critical strike chance of Heal, Flash Heal, and Power Word: Life by 15%.
Casting a Holy Word spell increases the healing of your next Flash Heal, Heal, Prayer of Healing, or Power Word: Life by 40%. Lasts 30 sec.
The cooldowns of your Holy Words are reduced by an additional 10% when you cast the relevant spells.
When Holy Word: Serenity or Holy Word: Sanctify finish their cooldown, you emit a burst of light that heals up to 5 injured targets within 40 yards for 6,843.

Releases miraculous light at a target location, healing up to 5 allies within 10 yds for 25,082.

Cooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Prayer of Healing and by 2 sec when you cast Renew.
A powerful prayer that heals the target and the 4 nearest allies within 40 yards for 17,926.
Holy Word: Sanctify reduces the cast time and cost of your Prayer of Healing by 20% for 8 sec.
Your healing on allies with your Renew is increased by 10%.
Increases the duration of Spirit of Redemption by 50% and the range of its spells by 50%.

When Guardian Spirit saves the target from death, it does not expire.

When Guardian Spirit expires without saving the target from death, reduce its remaining cooldown to 60 seconds.

After Spirit of Redemption expires, you will revive at up to 100% health, based on your healing done during Spirit of Redemption. After reviving, you cannot benefit from Spirit of Redemption for 10 min.

Calls upon a guardian spirit to watch over the friendly target for 10 sec, increasing healing received by 60%. If the target would die, the Spirit sacrifices itself and restores the target to 40% health.

Castable while stunned. Cannot save the target from massive damage.
Perform a miracle, healing an ally for 90,191.
Chastises the target for 21,090 Holy damage and incapacitates them for 4 sec.

Holy Word: Chastise causes your next 2 casts of Holy Fire to be instant, cost no mana, and incur no cooldown.

Refreshing Holy Fire on a target now extends its duration by 7 sec.
Your Prayer of Mending has a 12% chance to leave a Renew on each target it heals.
Prayer of Mending heals 4% more for each bounce remaining.

Mind Flay, Mind Spike, and Void Torrent have a chance to spawn a Void Tendril that channels Mind Flay or Void Lasher that channels Mind Sear at your target.

 Mind Flay
Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 17,972 Shadow damage over 15 sec and slowing their movement speed by 30%.

Generates 10 Insanity over the duration.

Mind Sear
Corrosive shadow energy radiates from the target, dealing 9,645 Shadow damage over 15 sec to all enemies within 10 yards of the target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Generates 10 Insanity over the duration.
Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death cause your Mindbender or Shadowfiend to teleport behind your target, slashing up to 5 nearby enemies for 4,647 Shadow damage and extending its duration by 0.7 sec.
Vampiric Touch deals 15% additional damage and has a chance to generate 1 Insanity each time it deals damage.
Increases your Devouring Plague damage by 6% and increases your maximum Insanity by 50.
Reduces the Insanity cost of Devouring Plague by 5.
Increases the damage of Devouring Plague by 20% and causes it to deal its damage over 12 sec, but increases its Insanity cost by 5.

Summons a Mindbender to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Mindbender attacks.
Devouring Plague causes your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch to deal damage 40% faster on all targets for 3 sec.
Silences the target, preventing them from casting spells for 4 sec. Against non-players, also interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 4 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Silence by 15 sec.
Terrifies the target in place, stunning them for 4 sec.
Mind Blast gains an additional charge.

Channel a torrent of void energy into the target, dealing 54,729 Shadow damage over 3 sec.

Generates 24 Insanity over the duration.
Reduces the cooldown of Void Torrent by 15 sec.
Voidform and Dark Ascension increase the critical strike chance of your spells by 10% for 20 sec, reducing by 0.5% every sec.

Increases your non-periodic Shadow damage by 20% for 20 sec.

Generates 30 Insanity.

Releases an explosive blast of pure void energy, activating Voidform and causing 8,560 Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yds of your target.

During Voidform, this ability is replaced by Void Bolt.

Casting Devouring Plague increases the duration of Voidform by 2.5 sec.

Increases the damage of Mind Flay and Mind Spike by 10%.

The duration of your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch is increased by 1 sec when enemies suffer damage from Mind Flay and 2 sec when enemies suffer damage from Mind Spike.
Dispersion heals you for an additional 25% of your maximum health over its duration and its cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Healing from Vampiric Touch and Devouring Plague when you are at maximum health will shield you for the same amount. The shield cannot exceed 10% of your maximum health.
Your Mind Flay, Mind Spike, and Void Torrent damage increase the damage of your periodic Shadow effects by 1%, stacking up to 5 times.

After casting Vampiric Touch on a target, your next Vampiric Touch within 8 sec is instant cast and deals 16,842 Shadow damage immediately.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 15 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain periodic damage has a chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Mind Blast and cause your next Mind Blast to be instant.

Disperse into pure shadow energy, reducing all damage taken by 75% for 6 sec and healing you for 25% of your maximum health over its duration, but you are unable to attack or cast spells.

Increases movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to all movement impairing effects.

Castable while stunned, feared, or silenced.

Afflicts the target with a disease that instantly causes 11,536 Shadow damage plus an additional 12,108 Shadow damage over 6 sec. Heals you for 30% of damage dealt.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Devouring Plague.

Mind Blast, Devouring Plague, and Void Bolt conjure Shadowy Apparitions that float towards all targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch for 1,644 Shadow damage. 

Critical strikes increase the damage by 100%.
Your Shadowy Apparitions deal 15% increased damage and have a chance to generate 1 Insanity.

Every 2 casts of Devouring Plague transforms your next Mind Flay or Mind Spike into a more powerful spell. Can accumulate up to 4 charges.

 Mind Flay: Insanity
Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 27,658 Shadow damage over 1.4 sec and slowing their movement speed by 70%.

Generates 12 Insanity over the duration.

Mind Spike: Insanity
Blasts the target for 18,906 Shadowfrost damage.

Generates 12 Insanity.

Hurl a bolt of slow-moving Shadow energy at your target, dealing 3,870 Shadow damage to all enemies within 8 yds.

Generates 6 Insanity.

This spell is cast at your target.

Aim a bolt of slow-moving Shadow energy at the destination, dealing 3,876 Shadow damage to all enemies within 8 yds.

Generates 6 Insanity.

This spell is cast at a selected location.

Your direct damage spells inflict 30% of their damage on all other targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch within 40 yards.

Does not apply to damage from Shadowy Apparitions, Shadow Word: Pain, and Vampiric Touch.
Increases the critical strike chance of Mind Blast, Mind Spike, Mind Flay, and Shadow Word: Death by 4% and increases their critical strike damage by 20%.
You take 2% less damage from enemies affected by your Shadow Word: Pain.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Attacks from your Shadowfiend siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 9,961.

Attacks from your Mindbender siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 3,320.
Swap health percentages with your ally. Increases the lower health percentage of the two to 25% if below that amount.
When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 15% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.
Increases the healing of your spells by 3%.

A word of holy power that heals the target for 57,903. 

Only usable if the target is below 35% health.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Reduces the cooldown of Desperate Prayer by 20 sec.
20% of Flash Heal healing on other targets also heals you.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 8%.

Throw a Divine Star forward 27 yds, healing allies in its path for 3,888 and dealing 3,110 Shadow damage to enemies. After reaching its destination, the Divine Star returns to you, healing allies and damaging enemies in its path again. Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
Creates a ring of Shadow energy around you that quickly expands to a 30 yd radius, healing allies for 8,828 and dealing 7,968 Shadow damage to enemies. Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
Power Word: Shield instantly heals the target for 2,324 and reflects 6% of damage absorbed.

Throw a Divine Star forward 27 yds, healing allies in its path for 3,893 and dealing 3,093 Holy damage to enemies. After reaching its destination, the Divine Star returns to you, healing allies and damaging enemies in its path again. Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.

Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands to a 30 yd radius, healing allies for 9,112 and dealing 7,961 Holy damage to enemies.

Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 5% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 5 sec.
When your Shadow Word: Pain expires or is refreshed with less than 5 sec remaining, a nearby ally within 40 yards is healed for 13,189.
Shadow Word: Death deals 50% less damage to you.
Your Mind Blast critical strikes reduce your target's movement speed by 75% for 4 sec.

Sanguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 Vampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
Fills you with the embrace of Shadow energy for 12 sec, causing you to heal a nearby ally for 40% of any single-target Shadow spell damage you deal.
When cast on yourself, 30% of damage you deal refills your Power Word: Shield.
Shackles the target undead enemy for 50 sec, preventing all actions and movement. Damage will cancel the effect. Limit 1.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Reduces the cooldown of Psychic Scream by 15 sec.
Psychic Scream causes enemies to tremble in place instead of fleeing in fear.
Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with Flash Heal or Penance.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal, Heal, Prayer of Healing, and Smite are reduced by 5%.
Reduces the mana cost of Purify and Mass Dispel by 50% and Dispel Magic by 10%.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Every 1 sec, the damage of your next Holy Nova is increased by 20% and its healing is increased by 20%. 

Stacks up to 20 times.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 2,283 Holy damage to enemies and up to 1,732 healing to allies within 12 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Reduces the cooldown of Leap of Faith by 30 sec.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Removes all Disease effects from a friendly target.
Purify additionally removes all Disease effects.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Each time Shadow Word: Pain deals damage, the healing of your next Flash Heal is increased by 3%, up to a maximum of 60%.
Increases the amount of damage required to break your Psychic Scream by 75%.
Summons shadowy tendrils, rooting all enemies within 8 yards for 15 sec or until the tendril is killed.
Shadow Word: Pain deals an additional 3% damage. When an enemy dies while afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain, you gain 0.5% Mana.
Controls a mind up to 1 level above yours for 30 sec. Does not work versus Demonic, Undead, or Mechanical beings. Shares diminishing returns with other disorienting effects.

Controls a mind up to 1 level above yours for 30 sec while still controlling your own mind. Does not work versus Demonic, Mechanical, or Undead beings or players. This spell shares diminishing returns with other disorienting effects.
If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 4,763 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 150% to targets below 20% health.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 0.5% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 11,554 over 15 sec.
Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 3,398 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 4 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
Prayer of Mending does 45% increased healing to the initial target.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.
After being struck by a melee or ranged critical hit, heal 20% of the damage taken over 6 sec.
For 12 sec after casting Power Word: Shield, you deal 10% additional damage and healing with Smite and Holy Nova.
Power Word: Shield absorbs 20% additional damage and lasts 5 sec longer.
Smite prevents the next 5,534 damage dealt by the enemy.

Your Shadow Word: Pain damage has a 3% chance to create Shadowy Apparitions that float towards all targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch. 

Critical strikes increase the chance to 6%.
Vampiric Touch also applies Shadow Word: Pain to the target. Shadow Word: Pain lasts an additional 5 sec.

Mind Spike increases the critical strike chance of Mind Blast by 30%, stacking up to 3 times.

Lasts 10 sec.
Shadow Word: Death consumes absorb shields from your target, dealing 14,058 extra damage to them and granting you 1% mana if a shield was present.
Atonement healing with Void Blast is 100% more effective.
Power Word: Shield absorbs 20% additional damage.
3 additional Penance bolts are fired at an enemy within 40 yards when healing an ally with Penance, or fired at an ally within 40 yards when damaging an enemy with Penance.
Increases the duration of all Renews by 40%.

Your Angelic Feathers increase movement speed by an additional 10%.

When an ally walks through your Angelic Feather, you are also granted 100% of its effect.
For 6 sec after casting Leap of Faith you may cast it a second time for free, ignoring its cooldown.
Your Power Infusion effect grants you an additional 10% haste.
Your damage dealt is increased by 12% while Dark Ascension is active and by 20% while Voidform is active.
Halo damage and healing is increased by 30%.

Creating a Halo extends the duration of Dark Ascension by 1 sec. If Dark Ascension is not active, up to 6 seconds is stored.

While out of combat or affected by a loss of control effect, the duration of Dark Ascension is paused for up to 20 sec.
Premonition causes your next Heal or Prayer of Healing cast to be instant and cost 15% less mana.
Reduces the cooldown of Power Word: Life by 3 sec and allows it to be usable on targets below 50% health.
Power Word: Fortitude grants you an additional 5% stamina.
Increases the duration of Dispersion by 2 sec.
Allies healed by your Halo receive 2% increased healing from you for 8 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

Gain access to a spell that gives you an advantage against your fate.  Premonition rotates to the next spell when cast.

 Premonition of Insight
Reduces the cooldown of your next 3 spell casts by 7 sec.

 Premonition of Piety
Increases your healing done by 20% and causes 70% of overhealing on players to be redistributed to up to 4 nearby allies for 15 sec. 

 Premonition of Solace
Your next single target healing spell grants your target a shield that absorbs 132,530 damage and reduces their damage taken by 15% for 15 sec.
Mind Blast tears open an Entropic Rift that follows the enemy for 8 sec. Enemies caught in its path suffer 3,309 Shadow damage every 0.9 sec while within its reach.
Consuming Surge of Insanity has a 100% chance to conjure Shadowy Apparitions.
Halo damage reduces enemy movement speed by 5% for 5 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Psychic Scream creates an image of you at your location. After 4 sec, the image will let out a Psychic Scream.

Casting Premonition of Solace invokes Clairvoyance, expanding your mind and opening up all possibilities of the future.

 Premonition of Clairvoyance
Grants Premonition of Insight, Piety, and Solace at 100% effectiveness.
Increases the healing done by Flash Heals affected by Surge of Light by 30%.
Guardian Spirit lasts an additional 2 sec.
Your Flash Heal, Heal, and Holy Word: Serenity are 30% more effective when cast on yourself.

Desperate Prayer lasts an additional 10 sec.

Angelic Bulwark's absorption effect is increased by 15% of your maximum health.
Prayer of Mending casts apply a Power Word: Shield to your target at 100% effectiveness.
While Entropic Rift is active, your Atonement healing is increased by 20%.
Entropic Rift slows enemies by up to 70%, increased the closer they are to its center.
While Entropic Rift is active, you move 20% faster.

Each time Penance damages or heals, Entropic Rift is empowered, increasing its damage and size by 10%.

After Entropic Rift ends it collapses, dealing 24,349 Shadow damage split amongst enemy targets within 15 yds.
Summoning an Entropic Rift extends the duration of your 5 shortest Atonements by 1 sec.
Void Blast increases the duration of Entropic Rift by 1.0 sec, up to a maximum of 3 sec.
Every 3 sec siphon an amount equal to 4% of your health from an ally within 40 yds if they are higher health than you.
You absorb 3% of all magic damage taken. Absorbing Shadow damage heals you for 100% of the amount absorbed.

Casting Halo also causes you to create a Halo around you at 100% effectiveness every 5 sec for 10 sec.

Additionally, the radius of Halo is increased by 10 yards.

Increases the healing done by Prayer of Mending by 40%.

All damage dealt by Smite, Holy Fire and Holy Nova increased by 40%.
Creating a Halo grants Surge of Light.
Increases the effects of Premonition by 40%.
Reduces the cooldown of Premonition by 15 sec.
Halo now centers around you and returns to you after it reaches its maximum distance, healing allies and damaging enemies each time it passes through them.

Entropic Rift upgrades Smite into Void Blast while it is active.

Void Blast:
Sends a blast of cosmic void energy at the enemy, causing 6,144 Shadow damage.
Shadow Word: Death has a high chance to summon a Shadowfiend for 5 sec when damaging targets below 20% health.

Transform your Shadowfiend or Mindbender into a Voidwraith.

Voidwraith
Summon a Voidwraith for 15 sec that casts Void Flay from afar. Void Flay deals bonus damage to high health enemies, up to a maximum of 50% if they are full health.

Generates 0.5% Mana each time the Voidwraith attacks.

Creates a Holy Lightwell. Every 1 sec the Lightwell will attempt to heal a nearby party or raid member within 40 yards that is lower than 75% health for 13,273 and apply a Renew to them for 6 sec. Lightwell lasts for 2 min or until it heals 15 times.

Cooldown reduced by 3 sec when you cast Holy Word: Serenity or Holy Word: Sanctify.

Holy Word: Serenity applies 12 sec of Renew to its target.

Holy Word: Sanctify applies 6 sec of Renew to allies it heals.

The effectiveness of your next Holy Word: Serenity, Sanctify, or Chastise is increased by 30% and grants a corresponding Divine Favor for 15 sec.

Chastise: Increases your damage by 20% and refunds 15 sec from the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise.

Sanctify: Blesses the target area, healing up to 5 allies for 33,493 over 15 sec.

Serenity: Flash Heal, Heal, and Renew heal for 30% more and cost 20% less mana.

Increases the healing done by Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify by 20%.

Increases the radius of Holy Word: Sanctify by 15%.
When Prayer of Mending jumps to a target affected by your Renew, that target is instantly healed for 2,075.

Your healing is increased by 10% while Apotheosis is active.

Casting Apotheosis causes your next 3 Heal or Prayer of Healing casts to be instant and heal for 25% more.
Your Holy Words extend the duration of Apotheosis by 1.0 sec.
Renew reduces the cooldown of Sanctify by an additional 6 sec and heals for 120% more when cast, but has a 12 sec cooldown.

spec_nodes:
Wake of Ashes is replaced with Hammer of Light for 20 sec after it is cast.

 Hammer of Light:
Hammer down your enemy with the power of the Light, dealing 3,083 Holy damage and 1,563 Holy damage up to 4 nearby enemies. 

Additionally, calls down Empyrean Hammers from the sky to strike 3 nearby enemies for 246 Holy damage each.

Costs 5 Holy Power.

Casting Holy Prism or Barrier of Faith causes your next 2 Holy Power spending abilities to apply Dawnlight on your target, dealing 19,120 Radiant damage or 40,356 healing over 8 sec.

8% of Dawnlight's damage and healing radiates to nearby allies or enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets.

Dawnlight's healing does not transfer to Beacon of Light.

Pierce an enemy with a blade of light, dealing 707 Holy damage.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Hammer of Light instantly calls down 2 Empyrean Hammers on your target when it is cast.
Divine Toll grants up to 100% increased damage to your next 3 Judgment when striking only 1 enemy. This amount is reduced by 20% for each additional target struck.
After casting Hammer of Light, you call down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby target every 2 sec, for 8 sec.

When Empyrean Hammer critically strikes, 100% of its damage is dealt to nearby enemies.

Enemies hit by this effect deal 5% reduced damage to you for 8 sec.

Every 5.0 sec, your next Dawnlight's damage or healing is increased by 5%, stacking up to 10 times.

Morning Star stacks twice as fast while out of combat.
While a Dawnlight is active, your Holy Power spenders deal 5% additional damage or healing.

Heals an ally for 17,432 and an additional 5,576 over 16 sec.

Healing increased by 25% when cast on self.
Critical Strike chance of Holy Shock and Light of Dawn increased by 5%.

Unleashes a whirl of divine energy, dealing 627 Holy damage to all nearby enemies. 

Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Wake of Ashes surrounds you with a Holy barrier for 10% of your maximum health.

Hammer of Light heals you for 5% of your maximum health, increased by 1% for each additional target hit. Any overhealing done with this effect gets converted into a Holy barrier instead.
Crusader Strike, Hammer of Wrath and Blade of Justice extend the duration of Shake the Heavens by 1 sec.
You receive 20% less damage from Blessing of Sacrifice and each time its target takes damage, you gain 4% movement speed up to a maximum of 40%.
Divine Steed lasts 2 sec longer and increases your movement speed by an additional 30% for the first 3 sec.
Dawnlight reduces the movement speed of enemies by 50% and increases the movement speed of allies by 20%.

Movement speed increased by 5% while above 80% health.

When your health is brought below 35%, your movement speed is increased by 40% for 5 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 1 min.
Your damage and healing over time effects have a chance to increase the healing or damage of your next Holy Shock by 200%.
Dawnlight leaves an Eternal Flame for 6 sec on allies or a Greater Judgment on enemies when it expires or is extended.
Holy Shock and Light of Dawn critical strikes cause the target to be healed for an additional 4,049 over 4 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 2 sec and Crusader Strike by 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Blade of Justice by 2 sec.
Your Blade of Justice causes the target to burn for 403 Radiant damage over 9 sec.

Judgment deals 10% increased damage and increases your movement speed by 10% for 5 sec.

If you have Greater Judgment, Judgment slows enemies by 30% for 8 sec.
Blade of Justice now has 2 charges.
Blade of Justice generates 1 additional Holy Power.

Allies affected by your Earthen Wall Totem, Ancestral Protection Totem, and Earthliving effect receive 15% increased healing from you.

Calls forth a Greater Fire Elemental to rain destruction on your enemies for 20 sec. 

While the Fire Elemental is active, Flame Shock deals damage 
33% faster, and newly applied Flame Shocks last 100% longer.

Calls forth a Greater Storm Elemental to hurl gusts of wind at your enemies for 20 sec.

While the Storm Elemental is active, casting Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning increases your haste by 4%, stacking up to 4 times.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 250% damage instead of the usual 200%.
Instantly shocks the target with concussive force, causing 30,872 Nature damage.
Harnesses the raw power of the elements, dealing 11,305 Elemental damage and increasing your Critical Strike or Haste by 3% or Mastery by 6% for 10 sec.

Causes the earth within 8 yards of your target to tremble and break, dealing 14,941 Physical damage over 6 sec and has a 5% chance to knock the enemy down. Multiple uses of Earthquake may overlap.

This spell is cast at your target.

Causes the earth within 8 yards of the target location to tremble and break, dealing 14,941 Physical damage over 6 sec and has a 5% chance to knock the enemy down. Multiple uses of Earthquake may overlap.

This spell is cast at a selected location.

Charge yourself with lightning, causing your next 2 Lightning Bolts to deal 150% more damage, and also causes your next 2 Lightning Bolts or Chain Lightnings to be instant cast and trigger an Elemental Overload on every target.

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 15 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.
Increases the critical strike chance of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 10%.
Increases the duration of Lightning Rod by 4 sec and its damage bonus by 25%.

Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon consumed has a 0.6% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into an Air Ascendant for 15 sec, immediately dealing 1,145 Nature damage to any enemy within 8 yds, reducing the cooldown and cost of Stormstrike by 60%, and transforming your auto attack and Stormstrike into Wind attacks which bypass armor and have a 30 yd range.
Dealing direct Fire, Frost, and Nature damage within 10 sec will increase all damage dealt by 10% for 10 sec. This can only occur once every 30 sec.
Increases Earth Shock and Earthquake damage by 8% and the stat bonuses granted by Elemental Blast by 25%.
Casting Frost Shock or Icefury increases the damage of your next Lava Burst by 20%.

Casting Lightning Bolt, Lava Burst, or Chain Lightning has a chance to replace your next Frost Shock with Icefury, stacking up to 2 times.

 Icefury
Hurls frigid ice at the target, dealing 25,885 Frost damage and causing your next Frost Shock to deal 200% increased damage, damage 4 additional targets, and generate 7 additional Maelstrom.

Generates 12 Maelstrom.
Casting Stormkeeper summons a powerful Lightning Elemental to fight by your side for 10 sec.
Casting Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Stormkeeper by 2.0 sec.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.
Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake have a 25% chance to refund all Maelstrom spent.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake enhance your next spell cast within 15 sec:

Flame Shock: The next cast also applies Flame Shock to 1 additional target within 8 yards of the target.

Lightning Bolt: Your next cast will cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.

Chain Lightning: Your next cast will chain to 1 additional target.

Lava Burst: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire and Storm Elemental by 4.0 sec.

Frost Shock: Freezes the target in place for 6 sec.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake can trigger your Mastery: Elemental Overload at 50% effectiveness.

Overloaded Earthquakes do not knock enemies down.

Reduces the Maelstrom cost of Earth Shock and Earthquake by 5.

Reduces the Maelstrom cost of Elemental Blast by 10.
Casting Lava Burst increases the damage or healing of your next Nature, Physical, or Frost spell by 15%.
Flame Shock damage has a chance to generate 2 Maelstrom.

Increases the duration of Flame Shock by 6 sec and its damage by 50%.

Lava Burst consumes up to 3 sec of Flame Shock, instantly dealing that damage. Lava Burst overloads benefit at 50% effectiveness.
Flame Shock damage increases the damage of your next Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake by 1.5%, stacking up to 10 times.
When your Storm Elemental or Fire Elemental expires, it leaves behind a lesser Elemental to continue attacking your enemies for 10 sec.
Imbuing your weapon with Flametongue increases your Fire spell damage by 5.0% for 1 hour.
Reduces the cooldown of Flame Shock by 1.5 sec and Flame Shock deals damage 15% faster.

Lightning Bolt, Elemental Blast, Primordial Wave and Chain Lightning make your target a Lightning Rod for 8 sec.
 
Lightning Rods take 10% of all damage you deal with Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning.
Increases the damage dealt by your Elemental Overloads by 40%.
Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 29,214 Elemental damage.
Casting Lava Burst has a 60% chance to cause your next Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning cast to trigger Elemental Overload an additional time, stacking up to 2 times.

Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 50.

Increases Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake damage by 5%.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.

Casting Lava Burst increases the healing of your next Healing Surge by 30%, stacking up to 2 times.

Healing Surge applies Flame Shock to a nearby enemy when empowered by Master of the Elements.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.

Summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec that heals an injured party or raid member within 40 yards for 3,743 every 1.8 sec.

If you already know Healing Stream Totem, instead gain 1 additional charge of Healing Stream Totem.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Healing Surge or Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.
Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 14,467 and an additional 8,071 over 18 sec.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and its healing is increased by 8%.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and casting Chain Heal on a target affected by Riptide consumes Riptide, increasing the healing of your Chain Heal by 30%.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.8 sec, healing all party or raid members within 40 yards for 9726.1.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 10 yards by 10%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.
Every third Healing Wave or Healing Surge heals for an additional 50%.

Unleash elemental forces of Life, healing a friendly target for 17,411 and increasing the effect of your next healing spell.

Riptide, Healing Wave, or Healing Surge: 35% increased healing.

Chain Heal: 15% increased healing and bounces to 1 additional target.

Healing Rain or Downpour: Affects 2 additional targets.

Wellspring: 40% of overhealing done is converted to an absorb effect.
Your critical heals have 215% effectiveness instead of the usual 200%.
Deal 3,695 Nature damage every 1 sec to up to 5 enemies inside of your Healing Rain.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 12,615 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.
Every 10 sec, the cast time of your next Chain Heal is reduced by 50%, and jump distance increased by 100%. Maximum of 2 charges.
Every 100,000 mana you spend brings a High Tide, making your next 2 Chain Heals heal for an additional 10% and not reduce with each jump.

When you heal with your Healing Wave, Healing Surge, or Riptide you have a 30% chance to summon an Ancestral spirit to aid you, instantly healing an injured friendly party or raid target within 40 yards for 25% of the amount healed. Critical strikes increase this chance to 60%.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.
Healing Tide Totem now additionally grants 80% increased mana regeneration to allies.
After using Healing Tide Totem, the cast time of your next 3 Healing Surges within 30 sec is reduced by 100% and their mana cost is reduced by 50%.
Summons a totem at the target location with 118,404 health for 15 sec. 1,936 damage from each attack against allies within 10 yards of the totem is redirected to the totem.

Summons a totem at the target location for 30 sec. All allies within 20 yards of the totem gain 10% increased health. If an ally dies, the totem will be consumed to allow them to Reincarnate with 20% health and mana.

Cannot reincarnate an ally who dies to massive damage.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.
Healing Stream Totem heals for 100% more, decaying over its duration.

Summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec that collects power from all of your healing spells. When the totem expires or dies, the stored power is released, healing all injured allies within 40 yards for 24% of all healing done while it was active, divided evenly among targets.

Casting this spell a second time recalls the totem and releases the healing.

Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for 1 hour. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal healing a 20% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for 5,778 over 6 sec.

Earthliving receives 150% additional benefit from Mastery: Deep Healing.

Healing Surge always triggers Earthliving on its target.

Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon consumed has a 0.6% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into an Air Ascendant for 15 sec, immediately dealing 1,148 Nature damage to any enemy within 8 yds, reducing the cooldown and cost of Stormstrike by 60%, and transforming your auto attack and Stormstrike into Wind attacks which bypass armor and have a 30 yd range.
Creates a surge of water that flows forward, healing friendly targets in a wide arc in front of you for 15,783.
For each Riptide active on an ally, your heals are 0.5% more effective.

Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 49,573. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Purify Spirit additionally removes all Curse effects.

Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon consumed has a 0.6% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into an Air Ascendant for 15 sec, immediately dealing 1,128 Nature damage to any enemy within 8 yds, reducing the cooldown and cost of Stormstrike by 60%, and transforming your auto attack and Stormstrike into Wind attacks which bypass armor and have a 30 yd range.

Transform into an Air Ascendant for 15 sec, immediately dealing 1,131 Nature damage to any enemy within 8 yds, reducing the cooldown and cost of Stormstrike by 60%, and transforming your auto attack and Stormstrike into Wind attacks which bypass armor and have a 30 yd range.
Reduces the cooldown of Healing Tide Totem by 45 sec.
The lowest health target of Healing Tide Totem is healed for 30% more and receives 15% increased healing from you for 4 sec.
Healing Rain instantly restores 2,848 health to 5 allies within its area, and its radius is increased by 2 yards.
Reduces the cooldown of Nature's Guardian by 15 sec and causes it to heal for an additional 10% of your maximum health.
Earth Shield has an additional 3 charges and heals you for 25% more.
Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.

Successfully removing a harmful effect with Tremor Totem or Poison Cleansing Totem, or controlling an enemy with Capacitor Totem or Earthgrab Totem reduces the cooldown of the totem used by 5 sec.

Cannot occur more than once every 20 sec per totem.

Increases your maximum mana by 5%.

Tidal Waves can now stack up to 4 times.
Using spells with a cast time increases the duration of Spiritwalker's Grace and Spiritwalker's Aegis by 1 sec, up to a maximum of 4 sec.
Your Ancestors' spells are 25% more powerful.
Ancestors have a 20% chance to call another Ancestor for 6 sec when they depart.

You have a chance to get struck by lightning, increasing your movement speed by 50% for 5 sec. The effectiveness is increased to 100% in outdoor areas.

You call down a Thunderstorm when you Reincarnate.
Tempest increases your movement speed by 20% for 5 sec.
Increases the healing done by Surging Totem by 25%.

Learn a new weapon imbue, Tidecaller's Guard.

 Tidecaller's Guard
Imbue your shield with the element of Water for 1 hour. Your healing done is increased by 2.0% and the duration of your Healing Stream Totem and Cloudburst Totem is increased by 3.0 sec.
Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning have a chance to strike your target for 11,117 Nature damage. Every 3 times this occurs, your next Lightning Bolt is replaced by Tempest.

Gain the effects of the Lightning Rod talent:

 Lightning Rod
Lightning Bolt, Elemental Blast, Primordial Wave and Chain Lightning make your target a Lightning Rod for 8 sec.
 
Lightning Rods take 10% of all damage you deal with Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning.
Lava Burst gains an additional charge and deals 5% increased damage.
Crash Lightning and Chain Lightning damage increased by 15%.
Increases the duration of your Earthliving effect by 3 sec.

Your Healing Stream Totems now also heals a second ally at 50% effectiveness. 

Cloudburst Totem stores 25% additional healing.
Lightning Bolt, Tempest, and Chain Lightning have a 35% chance to refund 2 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.
While Surging Totem is active, your damage and healing done is increased by 3%.
Surging Totem deals 50% more damage during Ascendance.

When an Ancestor departs, they cast Hydrobubble on a nearby injured ally.

 Hydrobubble
Surrounds your target in a protective water bubble for 10 sec.

The shield absorbs the next 34,864 incoming damage, but the absorb amount decays fully over its duration.
Summons a totem at the target location that creates a Tremor immediately and every 5.4 sec for 312 Flamestrike damage. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets. Lasts 24 sec.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects. 

Water: Your next Healing Wave or Healing Surge also heals an ally inside of your Healing Rain at 100% effectiveness.

Air: The cast time of your next healing spell is reduced by 40%.

Earth: Your next Chain Heal applies Earthliving at 150% effectiveness to all targets hit.
Lightning Shield reduces the damage you take by 3%.
When you cast Tempest you gain Surging Currents, increasing the effectiveness of your next Chain Heal or Healing Surge by 20%, up to 100%.
Chain Heals from Lively Totem and Totemic Rebound are 25% more effective.
Allies affected by your Earthen Wall Totem, Ancestral Protection Totem, and Earthliving effect receive 15% increased healing from you.
When you summon a Healing Tide Totem, Healing Stream Totem, Cloudburst Totem, Mana Tide Totem, or Spirit Link Totem you cast a free instant Chain Heal at 100% effectiveness.
Increases the healing done by Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Wellspring, Downpour, and Chain Heal by 15%.
Riptide has a 15% chance to call an Ancestor to your side for 6 sec.

Tempest causes your next Chain Lightning or Lightning Bolt to be instant cast, deal 40% increased damage, and cast an additional time.

Can accumulate up to 2 charges.

Spending Maelstrom Weapon stacks grants you 1% haste for 15 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.
When an Ancestor is called, they reduce the cooldown of Riptide by 2 sec.

Benefiting from Undulation calls an Ancestor to your side for 6 sec.

Casting Unleash Life calls an Ancestor to your side for 12 sec.

Whenever you cast a healing or damaging spell, the Ancestor will cast a similar spell.
Tempest summons a Nature Feral Spirit for 15 sec.

Chain Heal now jumps to a nearby totem within 20 yards once it reaches its last target, causing the totem to cast Chain Heal on an injured ally within 30 yards for 8,475. Jumps to 2 nearby targets within 20 yards.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 11,840 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.
Every 40 Maelstrom Weapon stacks spent replaces your next Lightning Bolt with Tempest.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature damage spells by 5% and the critical strike damage of your Nature spells by 5%.

Your next healing or damaging spell is instant, costs no mana, and deals 10% increased damage and healing.

If you know Nature's Swiftness, it is replaced by Ancestral Swiftness and causes Ancestral Swiftness to call an Ancestor to your side for 6 sec.
Increases Riptide's duration by 3.0 sec and its healing over time by 10%.
Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal heal for an additional 15% on targets affected by your Healing Rain or Riptide.
Targets you heal with Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Chain Heal, or Riptide's initial heal gain 5% increased health for 10 sec.
Earth Shield reduces damage taken by 3% and its healing is increased by up to 150% as its target's health decreases. Maximum benefit is reached below 50% health.
Spirit Link Totem reduces damage taken by an additional 5%, and it restores 43,165 health to all nearby allies 1 second after it is dropped. Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.
Your haste is increased by 25% while Ascendance is active and its duration is increased by 3 sec.
When you cast Healing Rain, each ally with your Riptide on them is healed for 9,961.
Earth Shield and Water Shield no longer lose charges and are 115% effective.

When refreshing Earth Shield, your target is healed for 8,231 for each stack of Earth Shield they are missing.

When refreshing Water Shield, you are refunded 285 mana for each stack of Water Shield missing.

Additionally, Earth Shield and Water Shield can consume charges 1.0 sec faster.
Every 4 casts of Riptide also applies Riptide to another friendly target near your Riptide target.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 sec.
While transformed into a Ghost Wolf, you gain 5% increased movement speed and 5% damage reduction every 1 sec, stacking up to 4 times.
Ghost Wolf removes snares and increases your movement speed by an additional 25% for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 20 sec.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 4,048 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.

Your Lava Burst casts restore 150 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.

Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.
Heals the friendly target for 12,604, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Grips the target in lightning, stunning and dealing 38,738 Nature damage over 5 sec while the target is lassoed. Can move while channeling.

Summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec that heals an injured party or raid member within 40 yards for 3,716 every 1.8 sec.

If you already know Healing Stream Totem, instead gain 1 additional charge of Healing Stream Totem.
Removes all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Reduces the cooldown of Totemic Recall by 60 sec.
Totemic Recall affects an additional totem.
Summons a totem at your feet that shakes the ground around it for 10 sec, removing Fear, Charm and Sleep effects from party and raid members within 30 yards.
Your Healing Surge is 25% more effective on yourself.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 4,945 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time. Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 7,642 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.

Your Hex target is slowed by 70% during Hex and for 6 sec after it ends.

Reduces the cooldown of Hex by 15 sec.
Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 837 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them away from the Shaman. Usable while stunned.
Chills the target with frost, causing 3,986 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 30%.
Wind Rush Totem's cooldown is reduced by 30 sec and its movement speed effect lasts an additional 2 sec.
Wind Rush Totem's movement speed bonus is increased by 10% and now removes snares.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
Summons a totem at your feet that removes all Poison effects from a nearby party or raid member within 30 yards every 1.5 sec for 6 sec.
Cleanse Spirit, Wind Shear, Purge, and totem casts no longer cancel Ghost Wolf.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
Astral Shift reduces damage taken by an additional 20%.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.

Increases the movement speed bonus of Ghost Wolf by 10%.

When you have 3 or more totems active, your movement speed is increased by 15%.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Summons a totem at the target location for 20 sec. The totem pulses every 2 sec, rooting all enemies within 8 yards for 8 sec. Enemies previously rooted by the totem instead suffer 50% movement speed reduction.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.
When Capacitor Totem fades or is destroyed, another Capacitor Totem is automatically dropped in the same place.
Frost Shock snares its targets by an additional 10% and its duration is increased by 2 sec.
Enemies within 10 yds of your Frost Shock are snared by 30%.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Thunderstorm now can be cast on allies within 40 yards, reduces enemies movement speed by 60%, and knocks enemies 25% further.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Transforms the enemy into a frog for 1 min. While hexed, the victim is incapacitated, and cannot attack or cast spells. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1. Only works on Humanoids and Beasts.
Purges the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.
Purges the enemy target, removing 2 beneficial Magic effects.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
When you cast Spiritwalker's Grace, you become immune to Silence and Interrupt effects for 5 sec.
Summons a totem at the target location for 15 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 10 yards 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 199,224 damage for 15 sec, and an additional 19,922 every 5 sec for 30 sec.

While a Storm Elemental is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 10%.

While a Fire Elemental is active, your Fire damage dealt is increased by 10%.
While Lightning Shield is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 8%.
Your Earth, Fire, and Storm Elementals are drawn from primal elementals 80% more powerful than regular elementals, with additional abilities, and you gain direct control over them.
Increases the duration of your Elementals by 20%.
Your damaging spells incite the earth around you to come to your aid for 6 sec, repeatedly dealing 1,731 Nature damage to your most recently attacked target.
Your next Chain Lightning or Lightning Bolt has 30% reduced cast time after casting Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake. Can accumulate up to 2 charges.
Imbue your shield with the element of Lightning for 1 hour, giving Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning a chance to call down 2 Thunderstrikes on your target for 3,956 Nature damage.

Summons a totem at the target location that erupts dealing 5,441 Fire damage and applying Flame Shock to 3 enemies within 8 yards. Continues hurling liquid magma at a random nearby target every 0.9 sec for 6 sec, dealing 2,718 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
After casting Icefury, the next time you cast a damaging Nature and Fire spell, you additionally cast an Elemental Blast at your target at 60% effectiveness.
Elemental Fury increases critical strike damage by an additional 25%.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.
Your haste is increased by 25% while Ascendance is active and its duration is increased by 3 sec.

After casting Earth Shock, your next Earthquake deals 120% additional damage.

After casting Elemental Blast, your next Earthquake deals 140% additional damage.
Increases your attack speed by 15% for your next 3 melee swings after dealing a critical strike with a spell or ability.

The cooldown of Sundering is reduced by 10 sec, but it can no longer Incapacitate. 

Sundering has a 40% chance to reset its own cooldown, increased by 12% for up to 5 targets. Each consecutive reset reduces these chances by half.

Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning have a high chance to make your next Flame Shock become Voltaic Blaze.

Voltaic Blaze
Instantly shocks the target and 5 nearby enemies with blazing thunder, causing 22,234 Nature damage and applying Flame Shock.

Generates 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Chain Heal's mana cost is reduced by 10% and Chain Heal increases the initial healing of your next Riptide by 75%, stacking up to 2 times.
15% of Healing Wave's healing from you and your ancestors is duplicated onto each of your targets with Riptide.

spec_nodes:
Wake of Ashes is replaced with Hammer of Light for 20 sec after it is cast.

 Hammer of Light:
Hammer down your enemy with the power of the Light, dealing 3,055 Holy damage and 1,557 Holy damage up to 4 nearby enemies. 

Additionally, calls down Empyrean Hammers from the sky to strike 3 nearby enemies for 246 Holy damage each.

Costs 5 Holy Power.
Hurls your shield at an enemy target, dealing 399 Holy damage, interrupting and silencing the non-Player target for 3 sec, and then jumping to 2 additional nearby enemies.
Hammer of Light instantly calls down 2 Empyrean Hammers on your target when it is cast.
Divine Toll grants up to 100% increased damage to your next 3 Judgment when striking only 1 enemy. This amount is reduced by 20% for each additional target struck.
After casting Hammer of Light, you call down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby target every 2 sec, for 8 sec.

When Empyrean Hammer critically strikes, 100% of its damage is dealt to nearby enemies.

Enemies hit by this effect deal 5% reduced damage to you for 8 sec.
Your block chance is increased by 20%, you are able to block spells, and your successful blocks deal 59 Holy damage to your attacker.

Hammers the current target for 526 Physical damage.

Generates 1 Holy Power.

Throws a Blessed Hammer that spirals outward, dealing 87 Holy damage to enemies and reducing the next damage they deal to you by 159.

Generates 1 Holy Power.

Wake of Ashes surrounds you with a Holy barrier for 10% of your maximum health.

Hammer of Light heals you for 5% of your maximum health, increased by 1% for each additional target hit. Any overhealing done with this effect gets converted into a Holy barrier instead.
Crusader Strike, Hammer of Wrath and Blade of Justice extend the duration of Shake the Heavens by 1 sec.
You receive 20% less damage from Blessing of Sacrifice and each time its target takes damage, you gain 4% movement speed up to a maximum of 40%.
Divine Steed lasts 2 sec longer and increases your movement speed by an additional 30% for the first 3 sec.
When Shield of the Righteous expires, gain 10% block chance and deal 120 Holy damage to all attackers for 4 sec.
Shield of the Righteous increases your Strength and Stamina by 2% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3.
When you avoid a melee attack or use Crusader Strike, you have a 15% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Avenger's Shield.
Every 3 Shields of the Righteous make your next Word of Glory cost no Holy Power. Maximum 2 stacks.
Calling down an Empyrean Hammer has a 10% chance to reset the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.

Casting Judgment increases the damage of Empyrean Hammer by 10% for 10 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.

Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm calls down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby enemy.

While Shake the Heavens is active, this effect calls down an additional Empyrean Hammer.
Hammer of Light applies Judgment to its targets, and increases your Haste by 12% for 6 sec.
Your chance to block spells is increased by 8%.
Grand Crusader's chance to occur is increased to 20% and it grants you 2% strength for 8 sec.

Reduces all damage you take by 20% for 8 sec.

While Ardent Defender is active, the next attack that would otherwise kill you will instead bring you to 20% of your maximum health.
When you use Avenger's Shield, your block chance is increased by 10% for 10 sec.
Consecration's benefits persist for 4.0 seconds after you leave it.

You gain a stack of Light's Deliverance when you call down an Empyrean Hammer.

While Wake of Ashes and Hammer of Light are unavailable, you consume 60 stacks of Light's Deliverance, empowering yourself to cast Hammer of Light an additional time for free.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to magical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Protection.

Word of Glory heals for an additional 20% over 10 sec.

Increased by 100% if cast on yourself while you are afflicted by a harmful damage over time effect.
Lay on Hands' cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec per Holy Power spent.
Consecration lasts 2 sec longer and its damage is increased by 20%.

Will the Light to coalesce and become manifest as a Holy Armament, wielded by your friendly target.

 Holy Bulwark:

While wielding a Holy Bulwark, gain an absorb shield for 15.0% of your max health and an additional 2.0% every 2 sec. Lasts 20 sec.

Becomes Sacred Weapon after use.
Your Avenger's Shield is imbued with holy fire, causing it to deal 43 Holy damage to all enemies within 5 yards of each target hit.
Spending Holy Power grants you 1% haste per finisher for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 20% for 20 sec.

Call upon the Light and gain 15 stacks of Divine Resolve, increasing your maximum health by 1% and reducing your damage taken by 2% per stack for 16 sec. After 1 sec, you will begin to lose 1 stack per second, but each 3 Holy Power spent will delay the loss of your next stack by 1 sec.

Combines with Avenging Wrath.
When you cast Word of Glory on someone other than yourself, you are also healed for 50% of the amount healed.
Casting Word of Glory grants you an additional 15% block chance for 6 sec.

Imbue your weapon with the power of the Light, increasing your armor by 5% and your primary stat by 2%.

Lasts 1 hour.

Imbue your weapon with the power of the Light, increasing your Stamina by 3% and causing your Holy Power abilities to sometimes unleash a burst of healing around a target.

Lasts 1 hour.

If you bestow an Armament upon an ally, you also gain its benefits.

If you bestow an Armament upon yourself, a nearby ally also gains its benefits.
For each Holy Power ability cast, your next Consecration deals 25,567 damage or healing immediately, split across all enemies and allies.
Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing of your next Crusader Strike by 200%.
Avenger's Shield jumps to 2 additional targets.
Your Crusader Strike deals 20% increased damage.
Empowers you with the spirit of ancient kings, reducing all damage you take by 50% for 8 sec.
When you cast Word of Glory on someone other than yourself, its healing is increased by up to 100% based on the target's missing health.
Judgment now has 2 charges, and Grand Crusader now also reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 3 sec.
When an Armament fades from you, the cooldown of Lay on Hands is reduced by 15.0 sec and you gain Infusion of Light.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to manifest a Holy Armament for a nearby ally.
The cooldown of Holy Armaments is reduced by 20%.
Successfully interrupting an enemy spellcast reduces your Rebuke's cooldown by 1.0 sec. Effect increased by 100% while wielding a Holy Armament.

When you or an ally wielding a Holy Bulwark are healed above maximum health, transfer 100% of the overhealing to your ally.

When you or an ally wielding a Sacred Weapon drop below 40% health, redistribute your health immediately and every 1 sec for 4 sec. May only occur once per cast.
When Avenger's Shield strikes a single enemy, it deals 100% additional Holy damage.

Each enemy hit by Avenger's Shield reduces the remaining cooldown on Guardian of Ancient Kings by 1.0 sec.

Avenging Wrath and Avenging Crusader reduce Holy Shock's cooldown by 50%, and have 25% increased duration.
Your Lay on Hands, Divine Shield, Blessing of Protection, and Blessing of Spellwarding have 15% reduced cooldown.
The effect of your active Aura is increased by 33% on targets with your Armaments.

During Divine Shield, all targets within 15 yds are taunted.
Holy Power abilities reduce the remaining cooldown on Avenging Wrath and Guardian of Ancient Kings by 1.5 sec.

Enrages you and unleashes a series of 4 brutal strikes for a total of 1,443 Physical damage.

Mastery increased by 1% and if you are Enraged, Bloodthirst extends your Enrage by 0.5 sec.

For each damage over time effect from Upheaval, gain 3% haste, up to 9%.
Living Flame is enhanced with Bronze magic, repeating 25% of the damage or healing you dealt to the target in the last 5 sec as Arcane, up to 13,835.
Tip the Scales overloads you with temporal energy, increasing your haste, movement speed, and cooldown recovery rate by 30%, decreasing over 30 sec.

spec_nodes:
Increase your 4 nearest allies' primary stat by 5.0% of your own, and cause you to deal 20% more damage, for 10 sec.

May only affect 4 allies at once, and does not affect tanks and healers.

Eruption, Deep Breath, and your empower spells extend the duration of these effects.
Cause a violent eruption beneath an enemy's feet, dealing 15,495 Volcanic damage split between them and nearby enemies.
Your Living Flame has a 20% chance, and your Azure Strike has a 15% chance, to make your next Eruption cost no Essence.
Quell's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.
Your Living Flame and Emerald Blossom are 30% more effective on yourself.
Eruption deals 30% more damage per enemy struck, up to 150%.
When cast at an enemy, Living Flame strikes 1 additional enemy for 100% damage.
Azure Strike deals 15% increased damage and has a 10% chance per target hit to echo, casting again.

Gather earthen power beneath your enemy's feet and send them hurtling upwards, dealing 23,571 Volcanic damage to the target and nearby enemies.

Empowering expands the area of effect.

I:   3 yd radius.

II:  6 yd radius.

III: 9 yd radius.

Fly to the targeted location, exposing Temporal Wounds on enemies in your path for 10 sec.

Temporal Wounds accumulate 10% of damage dealt by your allies affected by Ebon Might, then critically strike for that amount as Arcane damage.

Removes all root effects. You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects while flying.

Fatal attacks are diverted into a nearby timeline, preventing the damage, and your death, in this one.

The release of temporal energy restores 70,316 health to you, and 24,198 to 4 nearby allies, over 9 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.

May only occur once every 6 min.
Upheaval reaches maximum empower level 20% faster and has a 60% chance to grant Essence Burst.
Eruption's Essence cost is reduced by 1.
Breath of Eons reduces enemies' movement speed by 70%, and reduces their attack speed by 50%, for 10 sec.
When allies deal damage with Temporal Wounds, they gain a shield for 100% of the damage dealt. Absorption cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.
While flying during Deep Breath, 50% of damage you would take is instead dealt over 10 sec.

Enchant an ally to appear out of sync with the normal flow of time, reducing threat they generate by 30% for 30 min. Less effective on tank-specialized allies. 

May only be placed on one target at a time.

Conjure a pair of Weyrnstones, one for your target ally and one for yourself. Only one ally may bear your Weyrnstone at a time.

A Weyrnstone can be activated by the bearer to transport them to the other Weyrnstone's location, if they are within 100 yds.

Protect an ally with 15 explosive dragonscales, increasing their Armor by 20% of your own.

Melee attacks against the target cause 1 scale to explode, dealing 1,660 Volcanic damage to enemies near them. This damage can only occur every few sec.

Blistering Scales can only be placed on one target at a time. Casts on your enemy's target if they have one.

Learn to attune yourself to the essence of the Black or Bronze Dragonflights:

Black Attunement: You and your 4 nearest allies have 2% increased maximum health.

Bronze Attunement:You and your 4 nearest allies have 10% increased movement speed.

Grant an ally the gift of foresight, increasing their critical strike chance by 3% for 18 sec.

Affects the nearest ally within 25 yds, preferring damage dealers, if you do not have an ally targeted.
Upheaval cannot be interrupted, and has an additional 10% chance to critically strike.
Upheaval deals 50% increased damage to the primary target, and launches them higher.
Blistering Scales has 5 more scales, and casting Eruption restores 1 scale.
When cast, Blistering Scales grants the target a shield that absorbs up to 49,806 damage for 30 sec based on their missing health. Lower health targets gain a larger shield.
Consuming Essence Burst grants you 5% Intellect for 6 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.

Obsidian Scales activates Black Attunement, and amplifies it to increase maximum health by 3.0% for 12 sec.

Hover activates Bronze Attunement, and amplifies it to increase movement speed by 25% for 4 sec.
The range of your helpful magics is increased by 5 yards.
Prescience grants the ally a chance for their spells and abilities to echo their damage or healing, dealing 15% of the amount again.
Emerald Blossom increases targets' healing received by 3% for 10 sec.
Each time Blistering Scales explodes it deals 15% more damage for 12 sec, stacking 10 times.
Your empower spells' maximum level is increased by 1, and they reach maximum empower level 20% faster.
Essence Burst has a 20% chance to not be consumed.
Essence Burst reduces the cast time of Eruption by 40%.
Prescience has a 35% chance to grant Essence Burst.
Your effects that extend Ebon Might also extend Symbiotic Bloom.
Emerald Blossom no longer has a cooldown, deals 35% increased healing, and increases the duration of your active Ebon Might effects by 1 sec, but costs 3 Essence.
Eruption reduces the remaining cooldown of Upheaval by 1.0 sec.
Deep Breath reduces the Essence cost of Eruption by 1 and increases its damage by 10% for 15 sec after you land.
Surge forward in time, causing your cooldowns to recover 1,000% faster for 2 sec.
Eruption has a 25% chance to form a mote of diverted essence near you. Allies who comes in contact with the mote gain a random buff from your arsenal.
Fire Breath grants the inferno's blessing for 8 sec to you and your allies affected by Ebon Might, giving their damaging attacks and spells a high chance to deal an additional 4,869 Fire damage.
Upheaval causes an aftershock at its location, dealing 30% of its damage 2 additional times.
Deep Breath grants you Fury of the Aspects for 15 sec after you land, without causing Exhaustion.
Time Skip channels for 1 sec longer.
The cooldowns of your spells are reduced by 10%.
Deep Breath casts an Eruption at the first 3 enemies struck. These Eruptions have a 100% chance to create a Mote of Possibility.
Fire Breath causes enemies to take up to 40% increased damage from your Black spells, increased based on its empower level.

Essence spells extend the duration by 1 sec.

Castable while stunned, disoriented, incapacitated, or silenced.

Temporal Anomaly applies Echo at 30% effectiveness to the first 5 allies it passes through.
Temporal Anomaly reduces the cooldowns of your empower spells by 5 sec.

Deep Breath resets the cooldown of Hover.
Entering combat grants a charge of Burnout, causing your next Living Flame to cast instantly.
Engulf gains 1 additional charge and deals 20% increased damage and healing.
Engulf quickens your pulse, reducing the cast time of your next spell by 30%. Stacks up to 2 charges.

Casting an empower spell during Temporal Burst causes a nearby ally to gain a Thread of Fate for 10 sec, granting them a chance to echo their damage or healing spells, dealing 15% of the amount again.

Hover now causes you to briefly warp out of existence and appear at your destination. Hover's cooldown is also reduced by 5 sec.

Hover continues to allow Evoker spells to be cast while moving.
Critical strike chance against targets above 50% health increased by 15%.
Engulf your target in dragonflame, damaging them for 26,618 Fire or healing them for 28,223. For each of your periodic effects on the target, effectiveness is increased by 50%.
For each damage over time effect from Upheaval, gain 3% haste, up to 9%.
Bombardments reduce the cooldown of Deep Breath by 1 sec for each target struck, up to 3 sec.

Essence abilities are enhanced with Flame, dealing 20% of healing or damage done as Fire over 8 sec.
Fire Breath's damage over time is increased by 30%. Dream Breath's heal over time is increased by 30%.
Empower spells cause your next Eruption to strike up to 3 targets. When striking less than 3 targets, Eruption damage is increased by 15% for each missing target.
Essence Burst increases the effectiveness of your next Essence ability by 25%.
Reversion healing has a chance to cause your next Living Flame to cast instantly and deal 50% increased healing or damage. Stacks up to 2 charges.
Engulf reduces the cooldown of Fire Breath by 6 sec.
